S04bsu018_u:4_2: tadā nānāvarṇaraśmayo niścaritā yatprabhābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturmahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu018_u:4_3: tena cāvabhāsena lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakāratamisrāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4_4: yatremau candrasūryau eva maharddhikau mahānubhāvau maheśākhyau nābhipatato na virocatastatra ye sattvā upapannāste svakasvakamapi bāhuprasāritaṃ na paśyanti sma,

S04bsu018_u:4_6: sarvāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi ca parisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma yāvad avīcirmahānirayo yāvadbrahmalokaṃ parisphuṭaṃ dṛśyate sma /
S04bsu018_u:4_7: ye ca teṣu sarveṣu kṣetreṣu ṣaṭsu gatiṣu sattvāste sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /

S04bsu018_u:4_10: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anekavividhāśravaṇārambaṇādhimuktihetukāraṇopāyakauśalyairbodhicaryācāriṇaste 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /

S04bsu018_u:4_12: ye ca teṣu parinirvṛtānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ratnamayadhātustūpāste 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu018_u:4_15: sarvaścāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram aṣṭādaśamahānimittam akampat prākampat saṃprākampat,

S04bsu018_u:4_18: araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat, agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat /

S04bsu018_u:7_1_1: nāma lokadhāturnānāguṇavibhūṣitā nānāpuṣpasamīritā nānāgandhaiśca sphuṭā ratnavṛkṣairalaṅkṛtā
S04bsu018_u:7_2: nīlavaiḍūryamayī tatra bhūmir [KpSū_8] bodhisattvairākīrṇā dharmaśabdena sphuṭā;
S04bsu018_u:7_6: nānāpadmaiścākīrṇā / tatra ca saptaratnamayā vṛkṣāḥ saptayojanānyuccatvena;
S04bsu018_u:7_9: teṣu ca vṛkṣeṣu nānāśakuntā indriyabalabodhyaṅgamanojñāṃ śabdāṃ pravyāharanti;
S04bsu018_u:7_10: teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ patrāṇi parasparaṃ spṛśya divyātikrāntaṃ pañcāṅgikatūryaśabdaṃ niścārayanti;
S04bsu018_u:7_11: ekaikasya ca vṛkṣasya divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena yojanasahasraṃ sphurati;
S04bsu018_u:7_22: te rātryāḥ prathame yāme teṣu padmakeśareṣupapadyante,
S04bsu018_u:7_25: tatra ca rātryāḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye śītalā vāyavaḥ sugandhikā mṛdukāḥ sukhasaṃsparśacalitāḥ pravāyante,
S04bsu018_u:7_27: te ca bodhisattvāḥ samādhito vyutthāya vimuktiprītisukhaṃ pratiprasrabhya padmakeśareṣvavatīryā,
S04bsu018_u:7_28: teṣu ca kūṭāgāreṣu praviśya saptaratnamayeṣvāsaneṣu paryaṅkeṇa niṣaṇṇā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:7_29: teṣu ca vṛkṣakūṭāgārāntariteṣu ca caturdiśaṃ jāmbunadamayāḥ parvatā,
S04bsu018_u:7_31: teṣu ca parvateṣu anekaśatasahasrāṇi sūryakāntacandrakāntendranīlajyotīrasāśca maṇayo 'ntarāntare dṛśyanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:7_33: tayā ca buddhābhayā ca maṇiprabhayā sarvā sā padmā lokadhāturnityodāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā /

S04bsu018_u:7_35: nānyatra yadā padmāḥ saṃkucanti pakṣiṇaścālpaśabdā bhavanti tadā rātrīti saṃjñā bhavati,
S04bsu018_u:7_36: viparyayāddivasaṃ / teṣāṃ ca [KpSū_10] parvatānāmupari nīlavaiḍūryamayāḥ kūṭāgārāḥ ṣaṣṭiyojanānyuccatvena viṃśatiyojanāni vistāreṇa,
S04bsu018_u:7_37: tebhyaśca kūṭāgārebhyaścaturdiśaṃ saptaratnamayāstoraṇāstebhyaḥ kūṭāgārebhyaśca saptaratnamayāḥ paryaṅkā yatraikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
S04bsu018_u:7_38: padmāyāṃ kulaputra lokadhātau indro nāma bodhivṛkṣastrīṇi yojanasahasrāṇyudvedhena pañcayojanaśatāni vistāreṇa,
S04bsu018_u:7_40: tasya ca bodhivṛkṣasya mūle padmo raupyamayo nālaḥ pañcayojanaśatānyudvedhena,
S04bsu018_u:7_45: tasya buddhāsanapadmasya samantataḥ padmā yatra bodhisattvā niṣaṇṇāḥ padmottarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prātihāryāṇi paśyanti sma” /
S04bsu018_u:8_0: evamukte, ratnavairocano bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - “kiyadrūpāṇi bhagavān padmottarastathāgato [KpSū_11] mahāprātihāryāṇi kṛtavān?” /
S04bsu018_u:8_1: evamukte, bhagavān ratnavairocanaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - “adyarātryāḥ paścime yāme padmottareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā,
S04bsu018_u:8_5: ye punastasmin samaye ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi sthitā bodhisattvā adhodiśam avalokayanti,

S04bsu018_u:8_9_0: añjaliṃ pragṛhya padmottarasya tathāgatasyātmabhāvaṃ vyavalokayitvā dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
S04bsu018_u:8_9_1: samalaṅkṛtagātraṃ aśītibhiścānuvyañjanairdṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ bodhisattvaparṣadaṃ padmāṃ

S04bsu018_u:8_10: sa ca kulaputra padmottarastathāgato jihvendriyaṃ mukhānnirnāmayitvā sarvāvatīmimāṃ cāturdvīpikāṃ lokadhātuṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ sthitāścaṅkramanto jihvendriyeṇa paricchāditavān /

S04bsu018_u:8_13_1: ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niścārayitvā daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ

S04bsu018_u:8_14_1: 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svakasvakabuddhakṣetrābhayā ṛddhibalena padmāṃ lokadhātuṃ

S04bsu018_u:9_1: arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca mahāyānasya paripūraṇārthaṃ” /

S04bsu018_u:11_0: atha khalu ratnavairocano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - “kathaṃ bhadanta bhagavan padmāyāṃ lokadhātau rātriṃdivaṃ prajñāyate?,
S04bsu018_u:11_3: katamena vā vihareṇa viharanti?” bhagavān āha - “nityāvabhāsitā kulaputra padmā lokadhāturbuddhābhayā /
S04bsu018_u:11_5: pakṣiṇaścālpaśabdā bhavanti, bhagavāṃśca te ca bodhisattvā dhyānaiḥ krīḍanti vimuktiprītisukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti,
S04bsu018_u:11_6: tadā rātrīti prajñāyate / yadā punaste puṣpā vāteneritā bhavanti,
S04bsu018_u:11_7: śakunāśca manojñāni kūjanti, puṣpavṛṣṭiścābhipravarṣati, caturdiśaṃ paramasugandhā manojñā mṛdukāḥ sukhasaṃsparśā vāyavaḥ pravāyanti,
S04bsu018_u:11_8: bhagavāṃśca samādhervyutthāya padmottaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmatikramya śrāvakapratyekabuddhakathāṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu018_u:11_10: avirahitāśca tatra kulaputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena [KpSū_15] saṅghaśabdena,
S04bsu018_u:11_12: nityaṃ te bodhisattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:11_13_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ padmāyāṃ lokadhātau pratyājātāḥ
S04bsu018_u:11_13_1: pratyājāyiṣyanti vā sarve te dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatā yojanaprabhā
S04bsu018_u:11_14_0: sarve te bodhisattvā maitracittāḥ snigdhacittā akaluṣacittā dāntacittāḥ kṣamācittāḥ
S04bsu018_u:11_14_1: samāhitacittāḥ prasannacittā apratihatacittāḥ śuddhacittāḥ kalyāṇacittā dharmaprīticittāḥ
S04bsu018_u:11_14_2: sarvasattvānāṃ kleśapraśamanacittāḥ pṛthivīsamacittā laukikāyāṃ kathāyām anabhiratacittā
S04bsu018_u:11_16_0: nidhyaptibalinaḥ kuśalamūlabalinaḥ samādhānabalinaḥ śrutabalinaḥ śīlabalinaḥ tyāgabalinaḥ
S04bsu018_u:11_16_1: kṣāntibalino vīryabalino dhyānabalinaḥ prajñābalinaḥ śamathabalino vipaśyanābalino
S04bsu018_u:11_17: te ca bodhisattvā ye padmāyāṃ lokadhātau pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā bahubuddhaśatasahasrakṛtādhikārā hi avaruptakuśalamūlā;
S04bsu018_u:11_18_0: ye ca tatra padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti
S04bsu018_u:11_18_1: vā dhyānāhārāste bodhisattvā dharmāhārā gandhāhārāstadyathāpi nāma devā [KpSū_17]

S04bsu018_u:11_24: peyālaṃ na kleśaśabdo na parigraho na cātrāndhakāraṃ na durgandhaṃ na cittaklamatā na kāyaklamatā na narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:11_25_0: apāyaprajñaptirapi nāsti, na kaṇṭakagahanapāṣāṇaśarkarā na cāgnirna candrasūryā na
S04bsu018_u:11_25_1: tārakārūpā na mahāsamudrā na sumerucakravāḍā na lokāntarikā na kālaparvatā na mīḍhapāṣāṇā
S04bsu018_u:11_27: sarvathāpāyaśabdo nāsti, sarvathākṣaṇaśabdo nāsti / atha ca punaḥ padmā lokadhāturnityaṃ buddhābhayā bodhisattvābhayā puṇyābhayā ratnābhayā udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā /
S04bsu018_u:11_28: saphalāścātra nāma pakṣiṇomanojñāḥ snigdhāḥ svakasvakena svareṇa indriyabalabodhyaṅgāni pravyāharanti sma”
S04bsu018_u:12_0: atha khalu ratnavairocano bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - “kiyanmahatī bhagavan sā padmā lokadhātuḥ?,
S04bsu018_u:12_1: [KpSū_18] kiyacciramasau padmottarastathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati yenādyarātrāvanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiracirābhisaṃbuddhā?,
S04bsu018_u:12_3: kiyaccirasthāyinaste bodhisattvā ye padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā?,
S04bsu018_u:12_4: kin te bodhisattvā virahitā buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānena utāhosvinneti?,
S04bsu018_u:12_5: kiṃ nāma cāsītpūrve sā padmā lokadhātuḥ?,
S04bsu018_u:12_6: kiyaccireṇa vā tatra jinasūryāstaṃgataḥ yasyānantareṇa padmottarena tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?,
S04bsu018_u:12_7: kiṃ pratyayamapyekatyā buddhavikurvāṇān buddhaprātihāryān paśyanti ye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ prātihāryān kurvanti,

S04bsu018_u:53_0: bhagavān āha / “praṇidhānavaśena kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇanti,
S04bsu018_u:53_2: mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatatvāt kulaputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā apariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhaṇanti /
S04bsu018_u:53_3: tat kasmād dhetos?, tathā mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yenāham etarhy evaṃ pratikaṣṭe pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetra upapannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:53_4: tac cṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣīṣye 'haṃ te śāntimate” /
S04bsu018_u:53_5: “sādhu bhagavān” niti śāntimatir bodhisattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt /
S04bsu018_u:54_0: bhagavāṃs tān idam avocat / “bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputraikagaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu asaṃkhyeyeṣv atikrānteṣu asmin buddhakṣetre dhāraṇo nāma mahākalpo babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:54_1: tasmiṃś ca mahākalpe buddhakṣetre tasyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ araṇemī nāma rājābhūc caturdvīpakaḥ cakravartī /
S04bsu018_u:54_2: tasya khalv āraṇeminaḥ samudrareṇur nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt purohitaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:54_3: tasya putro jāto dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ aśītibhir anuvyañjanair virājitaḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇo vyāmaprabhaḥ nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalo 'secanakadarśanaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:54_4: jātamātrasya ca devaśatasahasraiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā samudragarbha iti nāma sthāpitaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:54_5: so 'pareṇa samayena niṣkramya keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya [KpSū_53] anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:54_7: dharmacakrapravartanena sa bhagavān bhahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ svargamokṣaphale pratiṣṭhāpitavān /
S04bsu018_u:54_8: so 'pareṇa samayena bahuśrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto grāmanagaranigama janapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu caryāṃ cañcūryamāṇo 'nupūrveṇānyataraṃ nagaraṃ anuprāpto,
S04bsu018_u:54_10: tatra “bahir nagarasya nātidūre jambūvano nāmodyāne ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati sārdham anekaiḥ śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrair” iti aśroṣīd,
S04bsu018_u:54_11: rājāraṇemī “ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyakasaṃbuddho 'smākaṃ vijitam anuprāpto jambūvanodyāne viharati anekaiḥ śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:54_13: upasaṃkramya taṃ tathāgatam satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:54_14: athāraṇemī rājārājarddhyā mahatā ca rājānubhāvenānekaiḥ prāṇikoṭīnayutāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto nagarān nirjagāma,
S04bsu018_u:54_16: yāvad eva yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena yātvā padbhyām evārāmaṃ prāviśad,
S04bsu018_u:54_18: upetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdad,
S04bsu018_u:54_19: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānam araṇeminaṃ ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
S04bsu018_u:54_20: anekaparyāyeṇa dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā tūṣṇīm abhūt /
S04bsu018_u:55_0_0: atha rājāraṇemī utthāyāsanād ekāṃśaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya yena ratnagarbhas
S04bsu018_u:55_0_1: tathāgatas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ratnagarbham tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham
S04bsu018_u:55_1: “adhivāsayatu me bhagavān idam traimāsaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:55_3: adhivāsayati kulaputra ratnagarbhas tathāgato rājño 'raṇeminaḥ tūṣṇībhāvena /
S04bsu018_u:55_4: atha rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:56_2: so 'haṃ yo me kaścid upabhogaparibhoga upasthānaṃ paricaryāntaḥpuraṃ ca gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato nivedayāmi bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:56_3: yad api yuṣmākaṃ paudgalikaṃ upabhogaparibhogopasthānaparicaryāntaḥpuraṃ gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato niryātayata bhikṣusaṅghasya ca” /
S04bsu018_u:56_4: tairapi niryātitaṃ / gṛhapatiratnamapi bhadramudyānaṃ sarvaṃ jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayaṃ kṛtvā,
S04bsu018_u:56_5: tasmin nevodyāne bhagavato 'rthāya kūṭāgāraṃ māpayati saptaratnamayaṃ samantataḥ caturdiśaṃ cātra saptaratnamayāni dvārāṇi māpayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:56_7: te ca vṛkṣā nānāprakārairvastrairalaṅcakre nānāduṣyairnānācchatrairnānāvidhaiśca muktāhārairnānāprakāraiścābharaṇairnānāratnamayaiścābharaṇairvividhaiḥ [KpSū_56] sugandhaiḥ,
S04bsu018_u:56_11: tad api cakraratnaṃ bahiḥ kūṭāgārasya bhagavata evābhimukhaṃ puruṣamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe sthitaṃ jvalati /
S04bsu018_u:56_13: bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitvā bhagavata upari ratnavṛkṣaṃ dhārayati /
S04bsu018_u:56_14: sa ca vṛkṣo 'laṅkṛtaḥ saptabhī ratnairnānāvidhaiśca muktāhārairvicitraiścābharaṇairnānāvidhaiśca mālyairnānāraṅgaiśca paṭṭairnānāvidhaiśca duṣyairuparacitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:56_16: yā cāraṇemino rājño 'gramahiṣī sā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitā,
S04bsu018_u:56_19: tataḥ svayameva bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthāpayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:56_20: tatastayā maṇiratnābhayā sarvaṃ tadudyānaṃ satatasamitamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭaṃ abhūt,
S04bsu018_u:56_21: buddhābhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvamidaṃ [KpSū_57] satatasamitaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:56_22: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya gauśīrṣasyaiva candanasya pādapīṭhaṃ sthāpitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:56_23: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvaśveto hastināgaḥ sthāpita uparyevaṃrūpameva cakraratnaṃ puruṣapramāṇaṃ sthāpitaṃ yathā bhagavatastathā,
S04bsu018_u:56_24: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasyāgrataḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā kanyā sthāpitā gośīrṣoragasāracandanacūrnairavakirati,
S04bsu018_u:56_27: bahiścodyānasya samantena pariṇāyakaratnaṃ vijahāra sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
S04bsu018_u:57_0: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī divasedivase nagarānniryāti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu018_u:57_1: tasya yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevodyānaṃ prāviśat,
S04bsu018_u:57_2: praviśya yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopajagāmopetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ trīnvārān pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā,
S04bsu018_u:57_4: svayaṃ ca praṇītena prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyena lehyapeyena svahastaṃ [KpSū_58] saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
S04bsu018_u:57_5: svahastaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhagavataṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātrapāṇiṃ svayameva vyajanamādāya bhagavantaṃ vījayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:57_6: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya rājaputrasahasraṃ koṭṭarājasahasraṃ caivaṃrūpamupasthānaṃ kṛtvā vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvakān vījayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:57_8: gaganatale cānekairdevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭirabhivṛṣṭā divyāni vādyāni abhivādayanti,
S04bsu018_u:57_9: divyāni ca chatrāṇi vāsāṃsi ābharaṇāni ca pralambayanti /
S04bsu018_u:57_10: nīlavāsasaṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ catvāriṃśacchatasahasrāṇi ye candanadīpāt gośīrṣasya candanasya kāṣṭhānyānayanti,
S04bsu018_u:57_12: rātrau svayameva rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purato bhikṣusaṅghasya cānekāni dīpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi jvālayati /
S04bsu018_u:57_13: atha kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā ekāṃ dīpasthālikāṃ śirasyupasthāpayitvā dvāvaṃśayordvau pāṇyordvau caraṇayordīpasthālīḥ,
S04bsu018_u:57_16: tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorevamaklāntakāyaḥ aklāntacitto māsatrayaṃ bhagavantamupasthitavān /
S04bsu018_u:57_17: evaṃ sahasraṃ rājāputrāṇāṃ caturaśītiśca koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi anyāni ca prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu018_u:57_19: yathā rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhan tathāgatamupasthitavān tathāgramahiṣī devī māsatrayaṃ gandhapuspairupasthitavatī /
S04bsu018_u:58_0: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiṃ jāmbūnadamayāni niṣkasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:58_1: cakraratnacakrapūrvaṃgamāni ca suvarṇamayāni caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:58_4: maṇiratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītiḥ sūryakāntimaṇisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:58_6: upasthānāya pariṇāyakaratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītikoṭṭarājasahasrāṇi bhagavata upasthānāya niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:58_7: añcuranagarapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītinagarasahasrāṇi bhagavata upajīvyāni niryātayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:58_8_1: chatrasahasrāṇi caturaśītyudārāṇāṃ rājārhanāṃ vastrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturaśītisahasrāṇi
S04bsu018_u:58_9: ratnamayāḥ śakunā ratnamayāśca mṛgāścaturaśītivyajanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:58_10: caturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:58_12: kṣamatu me bhagavān, asmākamupavane 'bhiramatu, bhagavān asminnupavane ramatu nityaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:58_13: punarapyahaṃ bhagavantamupasaṃkramiṣye darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca” /
S04bsu018_u:58_14_0: [KpSū_61] yacca rājño 'raṇeminaḥ putrasahasraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya bhagavantamekaikamidamavocat
S04bsu018_u:58_16: teṣāṃ adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā viditvātha rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triskṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavanto 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:58_17: atha teṣāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭho 'nimiṣo nāmā bhagavantaṃ traimāsamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopastiṣṭhati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:58_18: tadyathā rājāraṇemī tathaivamanimiṣapramukhaṃ rājakumārasahasraṃ dinedine bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ /
S04bsu018_u:59_0: atha kulaputra bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā samudrareṇurnāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:59_1: sa sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācate,
S04bsu018_u:59_2: sa taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ parigṛhītastaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpanivāsilokaṃ triśaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S04bsu018_u:59_4: tenaivamanvāhiṇḍatā na sa kaścijjambūdvīpe manuṣyabhūto [KpSū_62] 'sti yaḥ samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena piṇḍakena na parigṛhīto,
S04bsu018_u:59_7: yo vā nānuttare jñāne samādāpito na pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:60_0: animiṣo 'pi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ māsatrayamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā,
S04bsu018_u:60_1_0: so 'pi trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi niryātayati sarvasauvarṇāni
S04bsu018_u:60_3: ekaikaśaścaturaśītisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitavanta evaṃ bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:61_1: atha sa rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpitavān bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:61_2: animiṣo rājakumāro bhagavantamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā tathaiva dakṣiṇā dattā anantā /
S04bsu018_u:61_3: evamindragaṇena māsatrayaṃ bhagavān upasthito vibhavaśca parityaktaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:61_4_0: peyālaṃ, tathaivānaṅgaṇaḥ, abhayaḥ, ambaraḥ, aśajaḥ, middhaḥ, miṣaḥ, mārdavaḥ, paṅgagaṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:61_4_1: mādhvavaḥ, mānavo, māsaṃvo, mājavaḥ, aravaḥ, ājñavaḥ, mukhavaḥ, arthabahuḥ, alindraḥ,
S04bsu018_u:61_4_2: neravaḥ, reṇajaḥ, candranemī, sūryanemī, indranemī, vajranemī, kṣāntinemī, sthānanemī,
S04bsu018_u:61_4_3: javanemī, raṇemī, rāhuḥ, rāhubalaḥ, rāhucitraḥ, dāmacitraḥ, rājadhānaḥ, rāgabhramaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:61_4_4: rāndhavaḥ, rakṣakaḥ, kāyaḥ, śayamāḥ, yatravaḥ, syajalaḥ, yārmathaḥ, yadhvajaḥ, yamānaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:61_4_5: yasyanaḥ, namajyotiḥ, arañjanadhvaḥ, yāvad araṇemino rājñaḥ putrasahasreṇa ekaikena
S04bsu018_u:61_5: evaṃrūpeṇa bhagavata upasthānenopasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairmāsatrayaṃ yathā jyeṣṭhena rājaputreṇa,
S04bsu018_u:61_6: tathaivaikaikaścaturaśītiḥ svarṇamayāścakrasahasrāṇi vistareṇa yāvaccaturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitāni bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:61_7_0: evaṃrūpeṇa mahāprasādena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā kecid devatvaṃ kecicchakratvaṃ kecin māratvaṃ
S04bsu018_u:61_7_1: keciccakravartirājyaṃ kecin mahābhogatāṃ kecicchrāvakayānaṃ kecit pratyekabuddhayānaṃ
S04bsu018_u:61_8: adhiṣṭhamānāśca dvau varṣaśatau pañcapañcāśacca varṣāṇi bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayanti [KpSū_65] bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca /
S04bsu018_u:61_9: tatkāle samudrareṇurbrāhmano 'grapurohito 'bhyāgato 'drākṣīt taṃ bhagavantaṃ tai rājaputrairupasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupanimantrayate,
S04bsu018_u:61_12: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa evaṃrūpeṇa sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannenopasthānena bhagavata upasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena
S04bsu018_u:62_0: atha khalu kulaputrāpareṇa samayena samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ cetasaḥ parivitarka udapādi /
S04bsu018_u:62_3: kim ayaṃ prārthayati devatvaṃ vā uta śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā mahābhogatāṃ vā śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vānuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim ākāṅkṣate /
S04bsu018_u:62_7_0: kaccit svapne nivedayatu devo vā yakṣo vā nāgo vā buddho vā śrāvako vā brāhmaṇo vā
S04bsu018_u:62_7_1: kin tāvad rājā devaśriyaṃ kāṅkṣate uta manuṣyaśriyaṃ atha śrāvakatvamatha pratyekabuddhabhūmimatha
S04bsu018_u:63_0: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ agrapurohitaḥ svapne tathārūpamavabhāsamadrākṣīt,
S04bsu018_u:63_1: yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:63_2: te ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ tasya brāhmaṇasya padmāni svarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni aśmagarbhakeśarāṇi preṣayanti /
S04bsu018_u:63_3: sarveṣu ca teṣu padmeṣu sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu018_u:63_5: ekaikasmācca sūryamaṇḍalāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo niścerustā raśmayaḥ sarvāstasya brāhmaṇasya vaktre praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:63_7: svakāyasya ca kukṣau ṣaṣṭibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭāṃ dhyāyamānāṃ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:63_9: chatraṃ copari cākāśe [KpSū_67] yāvad brahmalokaparyante sthitaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:63_11: tebhyaśca padmebhyo divyānyatikrāntamānuṣāṇi tūryāṇi niścaranti śṛṇoti ca /
S04bsu018_u:63_13: rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena dhāvantaṃ sūkaramukhena vividhān bahuprāṇino bhakṣayante,
S04bsu018_u:63_15: vividhāśca prāṇinaḥ samāgamya taṃ rājānaṃ bhakṣayanti yāvad asthiśaṅkalāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtvā chorayanti /
S04bsu018_u:63_16: evaṃ punaḥ punastathaiva prādurbhavantaṃ sūkaramukhaṃ rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena bahuvidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:63_18: punaraparaṃ rājaputrān paśyati sūkaramukhenāpare gajamukhenāpare mahiṣamukhenāpare siṃhamukhenāpare vṛkamukhenāpare śṛgālamukhenāpare śvamukhenāpare markaṭamukhena paśyati,
S04bsu018_u:63_19: śoṇitābhyukṣitagātrānanekavidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍavṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇān vividhaiḥ prāṇibhirbhakṣyamāṇān asthiśaṅkalāvaśiṣṭānutsṛṣṭān /
S04bsu018_u:63_20: punarapi tenaiva kāyena sthitān tathaiva prāṇino bhakṣayataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:63_21: anyāṃśca rājaputrān paśyati mahiṣarathābhirūḍhān sumanāpuṣpābhyalaṅkṛtān [KpSū_68] kupathena dakṣiṇābhimukhān gacchataḥ /
S04bsu018_u:63_24: bhāgaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ prathamaṃ rājñaḥ saṃvibhāgamekaṃ padmamanuprayaccha,
S04bsu018_u:64_0: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ padmāni bhājayamāna eva pratibuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:64_2_0: “hīnapraṇidhirayaṃ rājā cakravartī saṃsārasukhābhirato hīnā vāsyādhimuktiḥ sārdhamekatyai
S04bsu018_u:64_2_1: rājaputrairekatyāḥ punā rājaputrāḥ śrāvakayānamākāṅkṣanti ye mayā mahiṣarathābhirūḍhā
S04bsu018_u:64_4: yacca mayādhatriyāṃ varṣaśatāṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvat pratiṣṭhāpiṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:64_5: tad evaṃ mayā sarvajambūdvīpe gatānekāni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu samādāpitāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S04bsu018_u:64_6: tasyaitannimittaṃ yena mayā svapne mahāvabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ [KpSū_69] daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:64_7_0: yacca mayā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācayitvā
S04bsu018_u:64_8: yacca mayā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saptavarṣāṇyupanimantritaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:64_9: tena mama daśabhyo digbhyaḥ anyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ padmānyanupreṣitāni /
S04bsu018_u:64_11: tena te buddhā saptaratnamayāni chatrāṇi visarjayanti /
S04bsu018_u:64_16: yacca kukṣau bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāni dhyāyamānāni,
S04bsu018_u:64_17: imā evaṃrūpāḥ svapnā dṛṣṭāḥ, yacca me śakrabrahmalokapāla dṛṣṭā ājñāpayantīmāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kuru,
S04bsu018_u:64_18: yacca mayā tāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kṛtvā dattāni /
S04bsu018_u:64_19: yannvaham imāḥ svapnā buddhāya bhagavata ākhyāsye,
S04bsu018_u:65_0: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ tasyā eva rātryā atyayena bhojanaṃ sajjīkṛtvā kālyate eva yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma,
S04bsu018_u:65_1: upetya svayameva bhagavato hastaśaucamupanāmayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:65_2: hastaśaucamupanīya prabhūtena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
S04bsu018_u:65_3_0: saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhikṣusaṅghamanekaparyāyena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu018_u:65_3_1: viditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcamāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:65_4: atha rājāraṇemī tatraivābhyāgataḥ sārdhaṃ putrasahasreṇānekaiśca prāṇisahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:65_5: sa yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat,
S04bsu018_u:65_6: praviśya ca yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāmopetya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghasya ca bhagavataḥ purataḥ niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu018_u:65_7: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yathādṛṣṭāṃ svapnāṃ bhagavato nivedayati /
S04bsu018_u:66_0: bhagavān āha - “yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt mahāntamavabhāsaṃ yenāvabhāsena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu [KpSū_71] buddhā bhagavanto dṛṣṭā tava padmāni visarjayanti,
S04bsu018_u:66_1: teṣu ca padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛṣṭā raśmayaḥ pramuñcamānāste ca raśmayastava mukhe praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:66_3: tena tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāstriṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāśca,
S04bsu018_u:66_4: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:66_5: yacca tvayā sarvasattvārthaṃ mahāyajñasyārambhaḥ kṛtastena tvaṃ brāhmaṇa buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:66_6: ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:66_7: yaiśca tava padmāni visarjitāni suvarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni asmagarbhakeśarāṇi,
S04bsu018_u:66_8: teṣu ca sarveṣu padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛśyante /
S04bsu018_u:66_10: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt svapne ye daśausu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:66_12: yāni chatrāṇi copari cākāśe yāvad [KpSū_72] brahmalokaparyantaṃ saṃtiṣṭhanti /
S04bsu018_u:66_13: yasyāṃ eva rātrau tvaṃ brāhmaṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase tasyāṃ eva rātrau daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣūdāraḥ kīrtiśabdaśloko 'bhyudgacchate,
S04bsu018_u:66_14: upari ca yāvad brahmalokaparyantaṃ kṛtvā na śakyante tava mūrdhānaṃ vyavalokayituṃ brahmādibhirdevalokairapi /
S04bsu018_u:66_16: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣit mahāntamātmabhāvaṃ yāvad brahmalokaṃ yacca sūryamaṇḍalānāṃ mālā śīrasi baddhā,
S04bsu018_u:66_17: tadye tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:66_18: te ca tavābhisaṃbuddhabodherbrāhmaṇa buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu deśasu dikṣu sthitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S04bsu018_u:66_19: sarve ye tvayā bodhau samādāpitā te tavābhīkṣṇaṃ varṇaṃ udāhariṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:66_20: “anena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vayaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,
S04bsu018_u:66_23: te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān visarjayiṣyanti tava pūjākarmaṇe,
S04bsu018_u:66_26: tatra tava sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā nānāvidhāḥ samādhirdhāraṇīḥ kṣāntiśca pratilapsyante /
S04bsu018_u:66_27: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā tava varṇaṃ uccārayiṣyanti ghoṣamanuśrāvayiṣyanti /
S04bsu018_u:66_29: yattvayā brāhmaṇa svapne dṛṣṭā bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tāni tava kukṣau praviśya padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭā dhyāyanti,
S04bsu018_u:66_30: abhisaṃbuddhabodhiśca tvaṃ brāhmaṇa bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayiṣyasi avaivartikāni sthāpayiṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:66_31_0: te tava parinirvṛtasya brāhmaṇānuttareṇa parinirvāṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu
S04bsu018_u:66_31_1: kalpeṣu paścāddaśāsu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu te buddhā bhagavanto dharmeṇa rājyaṃ
S04bsu018_u:66_32: “evam asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣvatikrānteṣu evaṃnāmā tathāgato abhūd arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:66_33: tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃboddhau samādāpitā vinītā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā avaivartikāśca sthāpitā,
S04bsu018_u:66_37_0: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇa svapne dṛṣṭavān sūkaramukhena yāvacchvamukhena rudhiramrakṣitena
S04bsu018_u:66_37_1: gātreṇānekavidhāṃ prāṇino bhakṣayitvā hīna eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇāste 'pyanye vividhaiḥ
S04bsu018_u:66_38: punarapyāpyāyitakāyā rudhirābhyaktena kāyena yāvacchvamukhena bahuvidhāṃ prāṇino bhakṣayitvā punarhīnasyairaṇḍavṛkṣasya mūle niṣaṇṇā vividhaiśca prāṇibhiḥ khādyante /
S04bsu018_u:66_39: te tvayā mohapuruṣāstrividhe puṇyakriyāvastuni samādāpitā prātiṣṭhāpitā dāne yame saṃyame ca,
S04bsu018_u:66_42: trividhe ca puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpitā deveṣu devarājyamabhilaṣanti manuṣyeṣu caikadvīpaiśvaryamākāṅkṣante /
S04bsu018_u:66_45: evaṃ te mohapuruṣāḥ sarve tvayā trividhe puṇyakriyāvastuni
S04bsu018_u:66_48: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇa svapnamadrākṣīt apare manuṣyā mahiṣarathābhirūdhāḥ sumanāmālālāṅkṛtaśirasaḥ apathena dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu018_u:66_49: te 'pi tvayā brāhmaṇa kulaputrāḥ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ kevalamātmadamanārthaṃ ātmaśamanārthaṃ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:67_0: atha khalu kulaputra brāhmaṇaḥ samudrareṇū rājānamāraṇeminametadavocat - “durlabhaṃ mahārāja manuṣyatvaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:67_1: durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpat, durlabhamudumbarapuṣpasadṛśānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ prādurbhāvo loke,
S04bsu018_u:67_9: dakacandropamā bālāḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇairatṛptā viṣayeṣu mattā devamāṇuṣāṃ śriyamabhilaṣanti /
S04bsu018_u:67_10_0: te bālāḥ punaḥ punarnarakeṣu kāraṇāduḥkhamanubhavanti tiryakṣu saṃmohaduḥkhaṃ preteṣu
S04bsu018_u:67_10_1: kṣutpipāsāduḥkhaṃ manuṣyeṣu priyaviprayogaduḥkhaṃ deveṣu cyavanaduḥkhaṃ punargarbhavāsaduḥkhaṃ
S04bsu018_u:67_12: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?, kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ na kurvanti na vyāyamanti aprāptasya prāptaye 'nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai /
S04bsu018_u:67_13: evaṃ mūrkhā bālāḥ khidyante bodhicittena yatra sarvaduḥkhakṣayo bhavati,
S04bsu018_u:67_14: saṃsāreṇa ca na khidyante nodvijanti yatra punaḥ punarduḥkhotpattirbhavati /
S04bsu018_u:67_15: parīkṣasva mahārāja yathā saṃsāraḥ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ bhājanabhūtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:67_16: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ mahārāja kṛtādhikāro bhagavataḥ śāsane 'varopitakuśalamūlastriṣu ratneṣu labdhaprasādaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:67_17: bhagavato dattadāno [KpSū_77] mahābhogatāyai rakṣitaśīlaḥ svargopapattipratilābhāya śruto bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ prajñāmahādharmapratilābhāya te saṃpatsyante /
S04bsu018_u:67_19: āha, “alaṃ brāhmaṇa, nāhaṃ brāhmaṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhilaṣāmi saṃsārābhirataḥ,
S04bsu018_u:67_20: yanmahābrāhmaṇa mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ dharmaḥ śrutaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:68_3: ṛjuḥ sa mārgaḥ aśaṭhaḥ / śuddhaḥ sa mārgaḥ kleśapravāhakatvāt /
S04bsu018_u:68_32: rājā prāha - “ayaṃ brāhmaṇa tathāgataḥ aśītivarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ loka utpanno,
S04bsu018_u:68_34: ye sattvā avaruptakuśalamūlaste sattvāḥ phale sthitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:68_36: utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāstu ye sattvāste bodhau avaivartyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:68_39: katame sattvā bhagavatā vinītāḥ sadekasattvasyāpi duḥkhaṃ na praśāntaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:68_42: utpādayāmyahaṃ bodhicittaṃ / bodhisattvacaryāṃ caraṃstenāhaṃ mahājñānasamucchrayeṇa acintyenodāreṇa dharmamukhapraveśena sattvān vinayeyaṃ buddhakāryaṃ ca kuryāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:68_43: na kevalamasmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhāya cittaṃ [KpSū_80] pariṇāmayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:68_45: tadāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yadāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca spṛśeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:68_46: sarvaṃ ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ praśamayeyaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:69_0: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastādṛśamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān tadādarśavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:69_1: tathā samāhitena bhagavatā ādarśavyūhe samādhau tathārūpāvabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:69_2: yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaḥ sarvaguṇavyūhā dṛṣyante;
S04bsu018_u:69_5: yatra ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇā māraṃ parājayanti,
S04bsu018_u:69_8: yatra ca buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sphuṭāṃ buddhakṣetrāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:69_11: yatra ca śūnyaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ buddhebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ [KpSū_81] śrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:69_14: kvacidutkṛṣṭāḥ sattvāḥ, kvaciddhīnāḥ, kvaciddīrghāyuṣkāḥ, kvacidalpāyuṣkāḥ; kānicidbuddhakṣetrānyagninā saṃvartante,
S04bsu018_u:69_15: kānicidudakena, kānicidvāyunā; kvacidvivartante, kvacidvivṛttāstiṣṭhanti; te sarva udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu018_u:69_16: sarvāvatī sā parṣattāṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhān,
S04bsu018_u:70_0: athāraṇemī rājā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - “kena bhagavan karmaṇā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S04bsu018_u:70_1: kena karmaṇāpariśuddhaṃ; utkṛṣṭāḥ sattvāḥ kena karmaṇā,
S04bsu018_u:70_3: bhagavān āha - “praṇidhānavaśena mahārāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti apagatapañcakaṣāyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:70_4: praṇidhānenāpariśuddhaṃ” / rājā prāha - “ahaṃ bhadanta [KpSū_82] bhagavan nagaraṃ praviśyaikāgre niṣadya praṇidhānaṃ cintayiṣyāmi,
S04bsu018_u:70_5: tathārūpaṃ me buddhakṣetramapagatapañcakaṣāyaṃ rocate tatremā subhavacaryā pariṇāmayiṣyāmi” /
S04bsu018_u:70_7: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:70_8: nagaraṃ praviśya svake gṛha ekāgraḥ pratisaṃlīno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:71_2: yacca tvayā tribhiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ śubhaṃ caratā puṇyamārjitaṃ tatsarvamanuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayā” /
S04bsu018_u:71_3: sa prāha - “ahamapyupādhyāya svagṛhaṃ gatvaikākī rahogato niṣadya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃścintayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:71_6: ataḥ so 'pi rājaputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:71_7: [KpSū_83] svakaṃ niveśanaṃ gatvā ekākī rahogato niṣadya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ cintayati /
S04bsu018_u:71_8: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimantrayitvovāca,
S04bsu018_u:71_10: vistareṇa peyālaṃ yāvat, sarvarājaputrasahasraṃ bodhau samādāpayati,
S04bsu018_u:71_12: anyāni ca navatiḥ koṭyaḥ sattvānāṃ bodhau samādāpayati /
S04bsu018_u:71_13: te 'pi sarva evamāhuḥ, “vayamapi svasvagṛhaṃ gatvaikākino niṣadya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ cintayiṣyāmaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:71_14: evamuktvā sarva eva svagṛhāṇi gatvaikākino niṣaṇṇāḥ saptavarṣāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānāni cintayanti /
S04bsu018_u:72_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ apareṇa samayena cetasaḥ parivitarka udāpādi /
S04bsu018_u:72_2: ayaṃ ca mayā buddho bhagavān saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakarṇairupanimantritaḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena /
S04bsu018_u:72_3: yadi ca mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā paripūryate tathā cāyaṃ praṇidhānaṃ saṃpadyate yad ahaṃ devāsuragandharvayakṣarākṣasakumbhāṇḍān asmin mahāyajñe samādāpayāmi” /
S04bsu018_u:73_1: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ purohito vaiśravaṇamākāṅkṣate darśanāya /
S04bsu018_u:73_2_0: atha khalu vaiśravaṇo mahārājānekairyakṣaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastenopajagāmopetya
S04bsu018_u:73_2_2: brāhmaṇaḥ prāha - “ko bhavān?” vaiśrāvaṇaḥ prāha - “śrutaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇāsti vaiśravaṇo
S04bsu018_u:73_3: so ahaṃ; brāhmaṇa kim ājñāpayasi kiṃ karavāṇi?” /
S04bsu018_u:73_5: tvamatrautsukyamāpadyasva” / sa prāha - “tathāstu yathā tvaṃ brāhmaṇākāṅkṣase” /
S04bsu018_u:73_6: “tena hi tvaṃ mahārāja yākṣān asmākaṃ vacanenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpaya /
S04bsu018_u:73_7: evaṃ ca punaḥ samādāpaya, sacedyūyaṃ yakṣā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvarthikā gacchata,
S04bsu018_u:73_11: “evamastu brāhmaṇa”, vaiśravaṇo mahārājā tasya brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya tatraivāntarhitaḥ bherīmāhatya yakṣarākṣasāṃ sannipātyaitadavocat [KpSū_85] - “yat khalu mārṣā jānīyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:73_13: taṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupasthāsyati /
S04bsu018_u:73_15: tena ca yūyaṃ kuśalamūlenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatā” /
S04bsu018_u:73_16: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahuyakṣarākṣasakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi añjaliṃ kṛtvocuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:73_18: tatsarvaṃ vayaṃ puṇyaskandhamanumodāmastena ca kuśalamūlenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyemahi” /
S04bsu018_u:73_20: yaḥ kaścid yuṣmākaṃ kuśalamūlenārthikaḥ puṇyārthī sa saptavarṣān pārāt samudrasya gośīrṣoragasāracandanamānayatu,
S04bsu018_u:73_21: yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo bhagavato bhikṣusaṅghasya cāhāraṃ sajjīkuryāt” /
S04bsu018_u:73_24: [KpSū_86] yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo bhagavato 'rthāyāhāraṃ sajjīkariṣyati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca” /
S04bsu018_u:74_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo viruḍhakasya mahārājasyākāṅkṣati darśanaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:74_1: tato virūḍhako mahārājā yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastenopajagāmopetya yāvad anekakumbhāṇḍakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayanti /
S04bsu018_u:74_3: atha khalu dvitīyikāyāścāturdvīpikāyā lokapālā buddhānubhāvenāgatāḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya sakāśat,
S04bsu018_u:74_5: te 'pi gatvā svakaṃ svakaṃ parṣadamanuttarāyāṃ [KpSū_87] samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti,
S04bsu018_u:74_6: yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasrāt koṭīśataṃ vaiśravaṇānām saparṣatkānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti,
S04bsu018_u:74_7: koṭīśataṃ vīrūḍhakānām koṭiśataṃ virūpākṣāṇāṃ koṭiśataṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sapārṣadyānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti /
S04bsu018_u:75_1: “yadyahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ āśā ca samṛdhyeta yadi ca me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyeta,
S04bsu018_u:75_5: sacedahamanena puṇyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyañchakro mamādya devānāmindro darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatu,
S04bsu018_u:75_6: suyamo devaputraḥ saṃtuṣito devaputraḥ sunirmito devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputraḥ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatu” /
S04bsu018_u:75_7: sahacittotpādādeva kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya śakro devānāmindro darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:75_8: suyāmaśca [KpSū_88] devaputraḥ saṃtuṣitaśca devaputraḥ sunirmitaśca devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputraḥ taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:75_13_0: “yāni yuṣmākaṃ devaloke sarvaviśiṣṭāni ratnamayāni kūṭāgārāṇi ratnavṛkṣā vā kalpavṛkṣā
S04bsu018_u:75_13_1: vā gandhavṛkṣā vā puṣpavṛkṣā vā phalavṛkṣā divyāni cīvarāṇi divyāsanāni divyāni prajñapanāni
S04bsu018_u:75_14_0: “evam astu mārṣāste” pañcadevarājāno brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya brāhmaṇasyāntikāt prākāntā
S04bsu018_u:75_14_1: devalokaṃ gatā gatvā veṭakaṃ devaputramāveṭukaṃ devaputraṃ rohiṇaṃ devaputraṃ korabhanandaṃ
S04bsu018_u:75_15: “ gacchata yūyaṃ mārṣā jambūdvīpamavatīrya jambūvanaṃ udyānamevaṃvidhenālaṅkāraviśeṣenaivaṃvidhairāsanaiḥ saṃstatairalaṅkuruta yathaivāyaṃ [KpSū_89] devaloko 'laṅkṛtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:75_16: evaṃvidhameva bhagavato 'rthāya ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayata yādṛśo 'yaṃ ratnaniryūhaḥ kūṭāgāra īdṛśaṃ mārṣā kūṭāgāraṃ kārayata” /
S04bsu018_u:75_17: te pañcadevaputrā devarājñaḥ pratiśrutya jambūdvīpamavatīrya ekarātryā sarvaṃ jambūvanamudyānamevaṃrūpeṇālaṅkāreṇa ratnavṛkṣairyāvaddhvajairalaṅkṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:75_18_0: evaṃrūpaḥ kūṭāgāro bhagavato 'rthāya kṛtastadyathā śakrasya devānāmindrasya ratnaniryūhaḥ
S04bsu018_u:75_18_1: kūṭāgāraḥ sarvākārapariniṣṭhitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ ca jambūvanaṃ divyenālaṅkāreṇālaṅkṛtya devarājānāṃ
S04bsu018_u:75_19: “yat khalu mārṣā jānīyuryathaivāyaṃ devalokaḥ svabhyalaṅkṛtaḥ tathaiva jambūvanodyānaṃ divyairalaṅkāraviśeṣaiḥ svalaṅkṛtaṃ sarvākārapariniṣṭhitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:75_20: evaṃrūpaśca sarvaratnamayaḥ kūṭāgāro bhagavato 'rthāya kṛtaḥ tadyathā śakrasya devānāmindrasya ratnaniryūhaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ /
S04bsu018_u:75_21: na hi mārṣā devalokasya jambudvīpe ca jambūvanasyodyānasya kiṃcidapyasti nānākaraṇaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:75_22: atha te pañcadevarājānaḥ śakrasuyāmasaṃtuṣitāḥ sunirmitaparanirmitavaśavartī jambūdvīpamavatīrya samudrareṇuṃ brāhmaṇamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ
S04bsu018_u:75_25: evamukte samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ pañcadevaputānetadavocat - “yūyaṃ khalu pañcadevarājānaḥ pṛthagdevanikāye rājyaṃ kārayata tatra yuṣmākaṃ vaśo vartate,
S04bsu018_u:75_27: sannipātayata jambūdvīpe, bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmata vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhiksusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:75_29_0: atha te pañcadevarājānaḥ svakasvakeṣu sthānāntareṣu gatvā śakro devānāmindro devāṃstrayastriṃśān
S04bsu018_u:75_29_1: sannipātyaivamāhuḥ - “yut khalu mārṣā jānīyurjambudvīpe 'raṇemino rājñaḥ samudrareṇurnāma
S04bsu018_u:75_30: sa ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupanimantrya pratimānayati sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena /
S04bsu018_u:75_31: asmābhiśca bhagavato 'rthāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca sarva ārāmo 'laṅkṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:75_32: tadyūyaṃ kuśalamūlamanumodyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayata samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya samādāpanayā” /
S04bsu018_u:75_33: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahavastrayastriṃśaddevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācamudīrayanti /
S04bsu018_u:75_34: “anumodāmo mārṣā evaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tayā cānumodanayā [KpSū_91] yatpuṇyamasmākaṃ syāttatsarvaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:75_35_0: suyāmo devaputro yāmān devān sannipātya vistareṇa peyālaṃ tuṣitanirmāṇaratidevaputraḥ
S04bsu018_u:75_35_1: paranirmito devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devān sannipātya yāvad bahūni devaputrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyañjaliṃ
S04bsu018_u:75_36: “anumodāmo vayaṃ mārṣā yat kuśalamūlaṃ tasmācca kuśalamūlatyatpuṇyaṃ tatsarvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:75_37: tena hi mārṣā gacchāmo jambudvīpamavatarāmaḥ bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca” /
S04bsu018_u:75_38_1: sārdhaṃ jambudvīpamavatīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca bhagavato
S04bsu018_u:76_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarka udapādi /
S04bsu018_u:76_2: tadayaṃ mama praṇidhiḥ saṃpadyate yadidamasurāṃ bodhau samādāpayeyaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:76_4: upasaṃkramya yāvadbahvasurakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi brāhmaṇasya vacanena sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayanti,
S04bsu018_u:76_6: vistareṇa peyālaṃ / evaṃ sa brāhmaṇo māramākāṅkṣate /
S04bsu018_u:76_7_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pūrṇo nāma māra āgatya yāvadanekairmārakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairmārakāyikairdevaputrasiḥ
S04bsu018_u:77_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ ketapuriṃ nāma mahābrahmāṇamākāṅkṣate upasaṃkramaṇāya /
S04bsu018_u:77_3: tataścāvataranti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca,
S04bsu018_u:77_5_0: [KpSū_93] atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo dvitīyāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ śakramākāṅkṣate
S04bsu018_u:77_5_1: suyāmaṃ saṃtuṣitaṃ sunirmitaṃ paranirmitavaśavartinaṃ ca devaputramākāṅkṣate darśanāya /
S04bsu018_u:77_6: te 'pi pañcadevarājāno bhagavato 'nubhāvena brāhmaṇasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntastān brāhmaṇaḥ samanuśiṣṭavān /
S04bsu018_u:77_7: te 'pi svakāni bhavanāni gatvā svakāṃ parṣadaṃ brāhmaṇahastena samādāpayanti /
S04bsu018_u:77_8_1: sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikaiste ca sahaśakreṇemāṃ cāturdvīpikāmāgatā bhagavantaṃ darśanāya
S04bsu018_u:77_10_0: evaṃ suyāmaḥ saṃtuṣitaḥ sunirmitaḥ paranirmitavaśavartī devaputraḥ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartikān
S04bsu018_u:77_10_3: bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:77_12: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ asurendrā mārā brahmāṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:77_13_1: mārā brahmāṇaḥ buddhānubhāvenemāṃ cāturdvīpikāṃ āgatāḥ sapariṣaṭkā yāvan te dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu018_u:77_14: evaṃ yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrādbuddhakṣetrāt koṭīśataṃ śakrāṇāṃ koṭiśataṃ suyāmānāṃ koṭīśataṃ saṃtuṣitānāṃ koṭīśataṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ koṭīśataṃ paranirmitavaśavartīnāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:77_15_0: koṭīśatamasurendrāṇāṃ koṭīśataṃ mārāṇāṃ koṭīśataṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ ekaiko mahābrahmānekaiḥ
S04bsu018_u:77_15_2: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagavadanubhāvenemāṃ cāturdvīpikāmāgato bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkramaṇāya
S04bsu018_u:77_15_3: vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca bhagavataścāntikāddharmaṃ śrotuṃ /
S04bsu018_u:77_16: tadā ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrayāṃ lokadhātau nāsti sa kāścit pṛthivīpradeśo yo na sphuṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu018_u:78_1_1: yāvat koṭīśataṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ māmanuvartanti tathaivaṃ [KpSū_95] me bhagavān anuvartate /
S04bsu018_u:78_2: yadevaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ kuryāt yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ tiryāñco yāmalokikā nairayikāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ duḥkhāvedanā praśāmyeta sukhāvedanotpadyeta,
S04bsu018_u:78_3: teṣāṃ caikaikakasyāgrato buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhet yastāṃ sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayet” /
S04bsu018_u:78_4: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya cetasā cittamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pratāpaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:78_5_0: yathā samāhitena cittena bhagavān pratāpe samādhau bhagavataḥ kāyādaikaikasmād romakūpād
S04bsu018_u:78_5_1: gaṇanāsamatikrāntā raśmaya udgatāstaiśca raśmibhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ
S04bsu018_u:78_6: sa tatra kecid raśmayo narakaṃ gatvā śītanarakopapannānāṃ sattvānāmuṣṇā vāyavo vānti,
S04bsu018_u:78_7: ye uṣṇanarakopapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti yena teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvaṃ kṣuttarṣaśramaduḥkhaṃ praśāmyati sukhāvedanotpadyate /
S04bsu018_u:78_8: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya nirmito buddhavigraho 'gratastiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairalaṅkṛtagātraḥ aśītibhiranuvyañjanaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaśarīraḥ /
S04bsu018_u:78_12: te taṃ dṛṣṭvaivamāhuḥ / “asya mahākāruṇikasya mahātmano 'nubhāvena vayamevaṃ sukhinaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:78_14: teṣāṃ bhagavānāha - “sādhu yūyaṃ sattvā namo buddhāyeti vācaṃ bhāṣatāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:78_16: evaṃ yuṣmākaṃ duḥkhāvedanā na bhūya utpadyate,
S04bsu018_u:78_17: nityaṃ ca sukhāyā vedanāyā lābhino bhaviṣyatha” /
S04bsu018_u:78_18: ta evaṃ āhuḥ / “namo buddhāyotpādayāmo vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:78_21: ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā dahyante teṣāṃ te raśmayaḥ śītalān vāyūn pramuñcanti,
S04bsu018_u:78_23: yāvat kecit tataścyāvitvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ upapadyante /
S04bsu018_u:78_24: evaṃ tiryagyonirvaktavyā evaṃ yāvan manuṣyā vaktavyāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:78_25: sā ca prabhā pratinivṛtyā bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ [KpSū_97] pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavata uṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitā,
S04bsu018_u:78_26: dṛṣṭvā ca gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā avaivartikāḥ sthāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:78_28: yairjambūdvīpakairmanuṣyaiḥ śrutamañjure nagare rājadhānyāṃ jambūvanodyānaṃ bhagavato 'rthāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca devairdivyairalaṅkāravibhūṣaṇairalaṅkṛtaṃ
S04bsu018_u:78_30: tatra ca ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyema bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca /
S04bsu018_u:78_31: tatra gatvā bhagavataḥ sakāśād dharmaṃ śṛṇuyāmaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:78_32_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena divasedivase 'nekāni devamanuṣyebhyaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikākoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu018_u:78_32_1: mañjurakaṃ nagaramāgacchanti bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkramaṇāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ
S04bsu018_u:78_33: taṃ codyānāṃ didṛkṣavaḥ / tasya codyānasya viṃśaddvārasahasrāṇi saptaratnamayānyabhūvan /
S04bsu018_u:78_36: ye te sattvā gatāstamudyānaṃ praviśanti tāṃste māṇavakā buddhasāraṇaṃ gamayanti dharmaśaraṇaṃ gamayanti saṅghaśaraṇaṃ gamayanti,
S04bsu018_u:78_38: āsanasthā ye dūrasthāyinaḥ paścāttamudyānaṃ praviśanti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca darśanāya /
S04bsu018_u:79_0: evaṃ samudrareṇumā brāhmaṇenāgrapurohitena tāni saptavarṣāṇi gaṇanātikrāntā devā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā vinītā niveṣitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā,
S04bsu018_u:79_1: gaṇanātikrāntā nāgāḥ asurā yakṣarākṣasāḥ kumbhāṇḍā gandharvāḥ pretāḥ piśācā nairayikā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā vinītā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:79_2: yāvat tiryagyonigatā iti / sa teṣāṃ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturaśītiścakrasahasrāṇi sthāpayitvā divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:79_5: teṣāṃ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāṃ atyayena rājño 'raṇeminaḥ na rāgacchanda utpadyate,
S04bsu018_u:79_6_0: na dveṣacchandaḥ na mohacchandaḥ na rājacchandaḥ na dhanacchandaḥ na [KpSū_99] putracchandaḥ
S04bsu018_u:79_6_1: na devīcchandaḥ nāhāracchandaḥ na pānacchandaḥ na vastracchandaḥ na gandhacchandaḥ
S04bsu018_u:79_7: na paracchandaṃ kṛtavān / saptavarṣāṇi na pārśvaṃ nikṣiptavān /
S04bsu018_u:79_9: na divasasaṃjñā utpannā, na rūpasaṃjñāṃ na śabdasaṃjñāṃ na rasasaṃjñāṃ na gandhasaṃjñāṃ na sparśāsaṃjñāṃ utpāditavān /
S04bsu018_u:79_11: nityaṃ satatasamitaṃ daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi sahasraṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paramāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:79_13: nānye parvatāḥ na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ na lokāntarikā na candrādityau na divyāni vimānāni cakṣuṣo 'vabhāsaṃ āgacchanti /
S04bsu018_u:79_16: yathāraṇemī rājā īdṛśena sukhaguṇavihāreṇa saptavarṣāṇi viharati,
S04bsu018_u:79_20: nimuḥ, indragaṇaḥ, evaṃ tadrājñaḥ sarvaṃ putrasahastaṃ ca caturaśītikoṭṭarājasahasrāṇi aparāṇi ca dvānavatiprāṇakoṭyaḥ sarvāṇyevameva saptavarṣāṇi ekākino rahogatāḥ pratisaṃlīnāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:79_21: daśasu dikṣvaikaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn paśyanti /
S04bsu018_u:79_22: na ca teṣāṃ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāṃ antareṇa rāgacchanda utpanno na dveṣacchando na mohacchandaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:79_24: satatasamitaṃ ca daśasu dikṣvaikaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti /
S04bsu018_u:79_26: na cānye parvatā yāvanna divyāni vimānāni cakṣuṣo 'vabhāsamāgacchanti /
S04bsu018_u:79_27: yathaiva te buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ tathaiva pariśuddhabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānaṃ cintayanti /
S04bsu018_u:80_0: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastāni saptavarṣāṇi nirgatāni niṣṭhitāni viditvā saptaratnaṃ niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:80_1: [KpSū_101] yena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - “mayā bhadanta bhagavan rājāraṇemī anutarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:80_2: sa gṛhaṃ gatvaikākī rahogataḥ pratisaṃlīno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:80_3: na cātra kasyacin manuṣyasya praveśo dīyate /
S04bsu018_u:80_4: evaṃ tatsahasraṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:80_5: evameva pratiprati svagṛhāṇi gatvā ekākinaḥ pratisaṃlayananiṣaṇṇaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:80_7: evaṃ yāvaccaturaśītiḥ koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi evamapare dvānavatiḥ prāṇakoṭyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:80_8: sarve svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gatvā hyekākino rahasi gatā niṣadya pratisaṃlīnā,
S04bsu018_u:80_10: bhagavāṃścaināṃ samanvāharatu yāvad rājāraṇemī tasmāt pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāyehāgacchet;
S04bsu018_u:80_11: te 'pi sarva ihagaccheyuḥ ye mayā sarve bodhau samādāpitāḥ acalāṃ ca buddhimanugṛhṇeyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:80_12: bhagavataścāntikādvyākaraṇaṃ prāpnuyurgotraṃ ca nāma ca buddhakṣetraṃ ca pratigṛhṇīyuḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:81_0: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan [KpSū_102] samyaksaṃbuddho nirhārapatiṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:81_2: yāṃ niśṛtya teṣāṃ pratisaṃlīnānāṃ viharatāmagrato brahmanirmitaḥ sthita evamāha /
S04bsu018_u:81_3: “uttiṣṭhata mārṣā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramata vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:81_9: prasthitasya ca tasya rājño devatā gaganatale bherīmṛdaṃgapaṭahādīn vādyāni pravādayanti /
S04bsu018_u:82_0_0: atha khalu rājāraṇemī rathābhirūḍhaḥ tena putrasahasreṇa caturaśītibhiśca koṭṭarājasahasrairdvānavatibhiśca
S04bsu018_u:82_0_1: prāṇakoṭibhiḥ parivṛto nagarānniryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya
S04bsu018_u:82_1: sa yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena yātvā yānād avatarati,
S04bsu018_u:82_4: upetya bhagavataḥ pādau śīrasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghasya caikānte nyaṣīdat sārdham anekaiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:82_5_0: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo rājānamaraṇeminaṃ prāha - “anumodatu mahārājemaṃ yacca
S04bsu018_u:82_5_1: tvayā māstrayaṃ bhagavataḥ upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ aparimitasya bhikṣusaṅghasya
S04bsu018_u:82_5_2: ca nānāvicitrāṇi ca ratnāni niryātitāni caturaśītiśca nagarasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu018_u:82_6: tadevānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ yacca parityāgasahagataṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ sarvaṃ pariṇāmayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:82_7: evaṃ tad rājñaḥ putrasahasraṃ samādāpayati tathaiva caturaśītiḥ koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi aparāśca bahuprāṇakoṭyaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:83_3: dānasyāsya phalaṃ tu bhaktimahato yan me ha tenāpnuyāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:86_0: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitad abhavat /
S04bsu018_u:86_1_1: niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā avaivartikabhūmau sthāpitāste ca mayā vyākartavyā buddhakṣetrāśca
S04bsu018_u:86_2: atha khalu bhagavān bodhicittāsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:86_3_0: smitaṃ ca prāviṣkṛtavān, yena smitāviṣkaraṇenānantā paryantā buddhakṣetrā udareṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya
S04bsu018_u:86_3_1: rājño 'raṇemino 'nyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ prāṇakoṭināṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ ādarśayati /
S04bsu018_u:86_4_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśasu dikṣu gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā
S04bsu018_u:86_4_1: mahāsattvāḥ tamavabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhānubhāvenemāṃ lokadhātuṃ samāgatā bhagavato
S04bsu018_u:86_5: te ca vividhairbodhisattvavikurvitairbhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ paryupāsya purato niṣaṇṇā bodhisattvapraṇidhānaṃ śrotukāmāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:87_1: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohitaḥ rājānamaraṇeminamāha - “tvaṃ tāvan mahārāja prathamaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva” /
S04bsu018_u:87_2: atha rājānaṇemī yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - “ahaṃ bhagavan bodhyarthikaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:87_3: yanmayā māsatrayaṃ bhagavato nānāvidhairupakaraṇairupasthānaṃ kṛtamaprameyasya ca bhikṣusaṅghasya tanmayā kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:87_4: imāni ca bhagavan mayā saptavarṣāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāścintitā;
S04bsu018_u:87_5: yatrāhaṃ bhagavan buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yatra na nirayā syurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:87_8: sarveṣāṃ tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ na syāt /
S04bsu018_u:87_10: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa divyena cakṣuṣā samanvāgatāḥ syuryad buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ ca deśayataḥ paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:87_15: sarvasattvāḥ tathāvidhenarddhikauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ syuryadekacittotpādena buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi atikrameyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:87_16: mā ca tatra sattvā bhaveyuḥ parigrahavanto 'ntataḥ svaśarīre 'pyanāgṛhītamānasāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:87_20: na tatra sattvānāṃ āyuḥ pramāṇaparyantaḥ syād,
S04bsu018_u:87_21: anyatra praṇidhānavaśena / na tatra sattvānāmakuśalasya nāmāpi syāt /
S04bsu018_u:87_26: sthāpayitvā praṇidhānaṃ / sarvasattvāstatraikapūrvāhṇena buddhānubhāvena gaṇanātikrāntān buddhān paryupāsīran,
S04bsu018_u:87_27: yāvad vividhena bodhisattvavikurvitenākāṅkṣeyuḥ buddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathaiva teṣāṃ siddhyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:87_31: na kaścit sattvo buddhakṣetraguṇālaṅkārasya varṇaparyantaṃ śaktaḥ syādgṛhītumantaśo divyenāpi cakṣuṣā /
S04bsu018_u:87_33: asaṃkhyeyapratibhānāḥ / ekaikasya ca bodhisattvasya yojanasahasrapramāṇaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:87_36: ye cātra sattvā upapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparyantena brahmacāriṇaḥ syuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:87_41: sarvasattvāśca tatra navāni vastrāṇi kāśāyāṇi dhārayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:87_42: sahopapannāśca tatra sattvāḥ suvibhaktivatīṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:87_43: yasya samādheḥ pratilābhādgaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā buddhān paryupasīran yāvad bodhiparyantenānupaśyeyuḥ
S04bsu018_u:87_44: / ye ca tatra bodhisattvā upapadyeyuḥ te yādṛgjātīyāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛgjātīyān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ [KpSū_109] teṣu ratnavṛkṣeṣu paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:87_45_0: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuryasya samādheḥ pratilābhāt daśasu dikṣu
S04bsu018_u:87_45_1: gaṇanātikrānteṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāstiṣṭhato yāpayato nityaṃ paśyeyurye
S04bsu018_u:87_45_2: tatra sattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ te sarva evaṃrūpeṇa cīvaravimānālaṅkārābharaṇavarṇarūpeṇa
S04bsu018_u:87_46: na tatra buddhakṣetre pāṃśuśilā kālaparvatā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:87_49: tatra narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdo na syānnākṣaṇaśabdo na duḥkhaśabdaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:88_1: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvaduṣkaracaryāṃ cariṣye yāvannaivaṃrūpairguṇairbuddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣye;
S04bsu018_u:88_6: apramāṇā ca me prabhā syāt buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇām [KpSū_110] avabhāsayanti /
S04bsu018_u:88_7: aparimāṇā ca mamāyurbhavedaprameyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ na śakyaṃ kenacid gaṇayitumanyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
S04bsu018_u:88_9: yanna śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
S04bsu018_u:88_10: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇabhāṣaṇaṃ kuryurghoṣaṃ cānuśrāvayeyuryaśa udīrayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:88_11: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste sarve buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlapariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:88_13: bodhiprāptasya me 'nyāsu gaṇanātikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu sattvā bodhicittotpādaṃ kuryuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:88_17: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ prasādaṃ ca mamāntika utpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:88_20: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāste 'smākaṃ sakāśādaśrutapūrvāṃ dharmadeśanāmākāṅkṣeyuḥ śrotuṃ te yādṛśīmākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:88_21: bodhiprāptasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te 'vaivartikāḥ syuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:88_23: yādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ cākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:88_24_0: parinirvṛtasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu paścād gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04bsu018_u:88_24_1: bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā paramāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ ca prāpnuyurmāmeva
S04bsu018_u:88_25: bodhisattvabhūtena ca yadā mayā buddhakāryaṃ abhiniṣpāditaṃ tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:88_26: abhisaṃbuddhasya ca mama paramaprasādapratilabdhā bodhisattvāḥ prathamāyāḥ kṣāntyā lābhinaḥ syurdvitīyāyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:88_27: yādṛśīṃ ca samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:88_29: bodhiprāptasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ [KpSū_112] śṛṇuyustāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:88_32: parinirvṛtasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu gaṇanātikrāntā yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ tāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ prasādaṃ ca prāpnuyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:89_0: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājño 'raṇeminaḥ sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu018_u:89_1: “sādhu sādhu mahārāja, gambhīraste mahārāja praṇidhānaṃ pariśuddhaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:89_2: paśya mahārāja paścimāyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ atikramya indrasuvirājitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:89_3: tatrendraghoṣeśvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:89_4: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ [KpSū_113] prajñaptirapyasti,
S04bsu018_u:89_7: sarva evopapādukāḥ sattvā, na ca tatra mātṛgrāmasya nāmāpi jñāyate /
S04bsu018_u:89_8_0: sarva ete guṇāstatra buddhakṣetre yathā mahārājenāparimitaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānam
S04bsu018_u:89_8_1: kṛtamamitāśayāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstena tvaṃ mahārāja indraghoṣeśvararājatathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:89_8_2: parinirvṛtasya tasmin saddharme 'ntarhite ṣaṣṭīnāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sā lokadhāturmeruprabhā
S04bsu018_u:89_12: yadācintyamatiguṇarājastathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya ṣoḍaśāntarakalpāḥ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati,
S04bsu018_u:89_13: tasya saddharme 'ntarhite sahasrāntarakalpātyayena viratirnāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:89_16: evaṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ saddharme 'ntarhite aparā nāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:89_17: tara ratneśvaraghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utpatsyate /
S04bsu018_u:89_18: samo buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ samaṃ cāntarakalpā sthāsyati yāpayiṣyati dharmaṃ ca deśayiṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:89_21: peyālaṃ pūrvavat / evaṃ cāprameyāparimāṇān tathāgatāṃstatra buddhakṣetra upapannān paśyāmi parinirvṛtāṃśca,
S04bsu018_u:89_23: tatrānāgate 'dhvani atikrānta ekasmin gaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye nadīgaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatī nāma bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:90_0: rājāraṇemyāha - “kutra te bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'smākaṃ prathamataraṃ tatra buddhakṣetre [KpSū_115] 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante?” /
S04bsu018_u:90_1_0: bhagavān āha - “ime te mahārāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'prameyairasaṃkhyeyairatulyairaparimāṇairdaśabhyo
S04bsu018_u:90_1_1: digbhyaḥ tābhyastābhyo lokadhātubhya āgatā maṃ vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya,
S04bsu018_u:90_2: ye mama purato niṣaṇṇā ete 'tītairbuddhairvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:90_3: pratyutpannairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirete kulaputrā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:90_5: ekaikaścaiṣa mahārāja bodhisattvo 'nekeṣāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ antike kṛtādhikāro 'varuptakuśalamūlo bhāvitaprajñaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:90_6: ta ete mahārāja kulaputrā ye tatra prathamataraṃ buddhakṣetre buddhā bhaviṣyanti” /
S04bsu018_u:90_7_0: rājāraṇemyāha - “ayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yenāhaṃ sapariṣatko
S04bsu018_u:90_7_1: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ sa kiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate?” /
S04bsu018_u:91_0: rājā āha - “yadyeṣa me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyati yathāhaṃ [KpSū_116] bhagavatā vyākṛtāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:91_1: tadyathāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādavandanaṃ kuryāṃ pañcamaṇḍalena tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ prakampantu pracalantu /
S04bsu018_u:91_2: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti te ca māṃ vyākuryuḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:92_0: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādayornipatitaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:92_1: yadaiva rājñaḥ śirasā pṛthivī spṛṣṭā tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrāḥ kampitāḥ calitāḥ pracalitāḥ kṣubhitāḥ saṃprakṣubhitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:92_3: “santīraṇe buddhakṣetre dhāraṇe kalpe 'śītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānamaraṇeminaṃ vyākaroti /
S04bsu018_u:92_5: samantato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn avabhāsayiṣyasi” /
S04bsu018_u:95_0: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī tuṣṭa udagraḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:96_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo rājño 'raṇemino jyeṣṭhaputramanimiṣaṃ nāma rājakumāramāmantrayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:97_0: animiṣo 'vocat / peyālaṃ pūrvavat, “avalokitā mayāpāyā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ pracaṇḍaghoraṃ duḥkhaṃ anubhavanti /
S04bsu018_u:97_1: avalokitā mayā svargā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ saṃkliṣṭacittāḥ punarapyapāyeṣu prapatanti /
S04bsu018_u:97_5: sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:97_6: yad ahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ ye kecanasattvā duḥkhotpīḍā bhayatarjitā dharmadurbhikṣāndhakāre praviṣṭā līnā dīnā atrāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā māmanusmareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:97_7: nāma ca parikīrtayeyuḥ / yadyahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śṛṇuyāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:97_8: na ca tāṃ sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:97_10: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sattvahetościrapraṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa ciraṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi tadā me āśāparipūrirbhavatu /
S04bsu018_u:97_11: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahārājāraṇemī atikrānte ekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04bsu018_u:97_13: pariśuddhe buddhakṣetre pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:97_14: yāvatyāmitāyustathāgataḥ aparimāṇān kalpān buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā pariniṣṭhitabuddhakāryo 'nupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pravekṣyate,
S04bsu018_u:97_15: tasya praviṣṭasya yāvat saddharmaḥ sthāsyati [KpSū_119] tāvacciramahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi,
S04bsu018_u:97_17: yadāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya rātryāḥ prathame yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme 'hamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:97_19_0: evamevāhaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti
S04bsu018_u:97_19_1: dhriyanti yāpayanti tān api buddhān bhagavataḥ svareṇa vijñapayāmi vyākurvantu māṃ
S04bsu018_u:98_1: evaṃ cāha - “yattvayā kulaputrāvalokitā apāyāḥ avalokitāḥ svargā avalokitaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃjanitaṃ kāruṇyacittaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamocanārthaṃ kleśapraśamanārthaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:98_6_0: yasyāmeva rātryāṃ prathame [KpSū_120] yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ
S04bsu018_u:98_6_1: paścime yāme tvaṃ kulaputrānekavyūhe bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ anuttarāṃ
S04bsu018_u:99_0_0: avalokiteśvara āha - “yadi bhagavan nimā mamāśā paripūryate tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:99_0_1: pādābhivandanaṃ karomi tadā ye buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu
S04bsu018_u:99_0_2: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te vyākurvantu māṃ,
S04bsu018_u:99_1: calatu ca dharaṇī sarvagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu,
S04bsu018_u:99_4: yadā cāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditastadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_121] buddhakṣetreṣu dharaṇī pracalitā,
S04bsu018_u:99_5: te ca buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvanti peyālaṃ pūrvavat,
S04bsu018_u:101_1: prakampitā dharaṇīsakṣetra ṣaḍvikāro bhaviṣyasi jināgrapugalo maharṣī” //
S04bsu018_u:102_0: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimirnāmāmantrayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:102_2: yacca tvayā śubhamupārjitaṃ tatsarvaṃ sattvahetoḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmaya,
S04bsu018_u:103_0: atha nimī rājakumāro bhagavataḥ purastānniṣadyedamavocat - “yat mayā bhagavān upasthitaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:103_2: yacca kāyavāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ puṇyaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:103_3: na kevalamasmin kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhimahaṃ spṛśeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:103_5: tamahaṃ adhyeṣayeyaṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ yāvaccāsau tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayet tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:103_9: evameva parinirvāpayeyaṃ, evameva parinirvṛtasya saddharmaściraṃ tiṣṭhet,
S04bsu018_u:103_10: sarva eva guṇavyūhaḥ yathā samantaraśmyabhyudgataśrīkūṭarājasya tathāgatasya” /
S04bsu018_u:104_1: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ sthānaṃ yathā svayaṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:104_2: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputra tasmin buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ /
S04bsu018_u:105_1: tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena kāyena pādau vandāmi tadā me daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu,
S04bsu018_u:105_2_0: sumanāvarṣaśca pravarṣatu” / yadā kulaputra mahāsthāmaprāptena satpuruṣeṇa ratnagarbhasya
S04bsu018_u:105_2_1: pañcamaṇḍalakena pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhirvyākṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:106_2: calitā mahāpṛthivī vṛṣṭirvṛṣṭā sumanā varṣairbhaviṣyasi tvaṃ suranarabrahmabhūtaḥ” //
S04bsu018_u:107_2: peyālaṃ pūrvavat, pratigṛhyāñjaliṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatametadavocat - “yanmayā bhagavān sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:107_7: na cātikṣipraṃ prāpnuyāṃ / na yāvaccāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tāvadbodhicaryāṃ caran,
S04bsu018_u:107_8: daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:107_9: ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitā yeṣāṃ mayā tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_10: pāramitāsu ca ye mayā samādāpitā niveśitā pratiṣṭhāpitā bodhicaryāṃ caratā,
S04bsu018_u:107_11: tān ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālikāsame buddhakṣetre paramāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavato dharman deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:107_14: tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ sattvānāmāśayapariśodhayamānaḥ yāvantaḥ kecit sattvā [KpSū_125] mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran ta evaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ tadyathā brahmakāyikā devāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:107_15: tathā ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:107_16: tasya ca buddhakṣetrasya bhavāgraparyantāni prākārāṇi anekaratnasaṃsthitāni nānāratnapratyuptāni ca syuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_17: sarvā ca tatra buddhakṣetre śuddhavaiḍūryamayī pṛthivī syāt,
S04bsu018_u:107_20: sarvasattvāścopapādukāḥ syurna tatra sattvāḥ kavadīkārāhārāḥ syuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_21: sarve ca tatra sattvā prītyāhārā dharmāhārāḥ syuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:107_22: na tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñaptiḥ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:107_23: śuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmapagatakhilamaladveṣamrakṣāṇāṃ śuddhānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:107_24: sarve tatra bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastradhāriṇaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_26: teṣāṃ dakṣiṇe haste ratnapātrī nānārasapūrṇā prādurbhavet;
S04bsu018_u:107_27: samanantaraprādurbhūtānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyurnāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ ye vayaṃ kavaḍīkārāhāramāharema,
S04bsu018_u:107_28: [KpSū_126] yannūnaṃ vayamanyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato 'nenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmo buddhaśrāvakāṃśca duḥkhitaṃ ca janaṃ pratimānayāmaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_29: pretabhavaneṣu ca gatvā kṣuttarṣaprajvalitagātrān sattvān anenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:107_30: sahacittotpādena te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā acintyacāritravatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_31: tasya ca samādheḥ pratilābhādasajjanā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_32: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavata āhāreṇa pratimānayeyuḥ śrāvakāṃścānyāṃśca sattvāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:107_33: prītyā pratimānya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svabuddhakṣetraṃ āgaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:107_34: evaṃ cīvararatnāni, yāvat tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svakaṃ buddhakṣetramāgatyānyonyaṃ cīvareṇa prāvarayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:107_35: yāvanti ca tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmupabhogaḥ paribhogā
S04bsu018_u:107_36: bhaveyustaiḥ sarvairbuddhaiḥ śrāvakaiścānyaiśca sattvaiḥ sahasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā paścādātmanā paribhuñjeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:107_43: yāni maṇiratnāni daśasu dikṣvadṛṣṭapūrvāṇi tāni aśrutapūrvāṇi tāni maṇiratnāni pracareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_44: yeṣāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ nāmadheye nirdiśyamāne varṣakoṭyo 'pi kṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:107_45: yaśca bodhisattvaḥ ākāṅkṣeta svarṇamayaṃ eva buddhakṣetraṃ paśyeyaṃ tasya svarṇamayaṃ eva tiṣṭheta /
S04bsu018_u:107_48: peyālaṃ pūrvavat / ya ākāṅkṣeta sphatikamayaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ aśmagarbhamayaṃ lohitamuktāmayaṃ musālagalvamayaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ paśyema,
S04bsu018_u:107_49: ityākāṅkṣeyuḥ / agarumayaṃ tagaramayaṃ tamālapatramayaṃ yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣeduragasāracandanamayaṃ goṣīrṣacandanamayaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭuṃ tasya tathaiva syāt /
S04bsu018_u:107_50: yathā yathā yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathā tathā tādṛśaṃ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:107_53: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sūryācandramasau [KpSū_128] prajñāyeyātāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:107_57: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre rātridivasānāṃ nāmadheyamapi prajñāyate,
S04bsu018_u:107_58_0: anyatra kusumavikasanatayā / na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śītoṣṇaṃ prajñāyate na vyādhirna
S04bsu018_u:107_58_1: glānyaṃ na jarāmaraṇamanyatra yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣedbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ so 'nyatra
S04bsu018_u:107_62: sarvatra ca buddhakṣetre gaganatale tūryakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrā vādyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:107_63: na ca tebhyastūryebhyaḥ kāmopasaṃhitāḥ śabdā niścareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_67_2: liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tāni sthānāni tāni praṇidhānāni sarva eva mama buddhakṣetre
S04bsu018_u:107_69: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre narakatiryakpretāḥ prajñāyeyurna sumerurna cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na śīlāpāṃśuparvatāḥ prajñāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_71: syāt, anyatra divyaiḥ kusumairmāndāravamahāmāndāravairna ca tatra durgandhaṃ syānnānāgandhairudārodāraistadbuddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:107_75: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvannaivaṃvidhaṃ mahāpuruṣakāramabhiniṣpādayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:107_77: evaṃrūpaiḥ śuddhāśayaiḥ sattvairekajātipratibaddhairbodhisattvaiḥ [KpSū_130] sārdhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetramākīrṇaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:107_78: na tatra bodhisattvaḥ syād yo na mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitaḥ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:107_79: sarve te tatra bodhisattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāḥ pāramitāsu niveśitāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:107_80: tatraivedaṃ buddhakṣetramantargataṃ kuryāṃ sarve cāmī duḥkhā praśamayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:107_81: bodhisattvabhūto 'haṃ bhadanta bhagavan evaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ niṣpādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:107_86: tasya ca bodhivṛkṣasya gandhenābhayā ca kṛtsanaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:107_87: tasya mūle pañcacāturdvīpikapramāṇaṃ me nānāratnavicitraṃ vajrāsanaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:107_90_1: parinirvāṇakālaṃ tatparyaṅkaṃ na [KpSū_131] bhindyāṃ na muceyaṃ na tasmād bodhivṛkṣamūlāduttiṣṭheyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:107_91: bodhivṛkṣamūlastha evāhaṃ vajrāsane niṣaṇṇo 'haṃ nirmitān buddhān bodhisattvāṃśca gaṇanātikrānteṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:107_92: ekaiko buddha ekapūrvabhaktena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet,
S04bsu018_u:107_93: tenaiva pūrvabhaktena gaṇanātikrāntān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ avaivartikāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_95: bodhiprāptasya me gaṇanātikrānteṣu daśasu dikṣvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu mama kāyo dṛṣyet,
S04bsu018_u:107_96: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mama kāyo lakṣaṇālaṅkṛtaścakṣurindriyasyābhāsamāgacchet sarve te sattvā niyatā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:107_97: yāvad bodhiparinirvāṇena te sattvā avirahitā bhaveyurbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:107_98: na tatrendriyavikalā bhaveyurye ca tatra bodhisattvā māṃ draṣṭuṃ iccheyuste yena yenaiva gaccheyuḥ parivarteyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyuḥ tiṣṭheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_99: sarve te bodhisattvāḥ samanantarotpāditena buddhanamaskāracittena māṃ bodhivṛkṣaniṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_100: dṛṣṭvā ca yasya dharmasaṃśayaḥ syāt so 'sya sahadarśanena vigacchettīrṇavacikitsāḥ syādanupadiṣṭasya dharmapadasyārthamājāneyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:107_101: apramāṇaṃ me [KpSū_132] āyurbhavet na śakyate kenacid gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena,
S04bsu018_u:107_103: yasmiṃśca kṣaṇe 'haṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe tatra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastrāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:107_104: yāvan mama parinirvāṇānna cātra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo 'pi dīrghakeśaḥ syāt śuklaprāvaraṇo vā,
S04bsu018_u:108_1: tvamapi paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī atīvaśobhanaṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:108_3: yatastvaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvānāmarthāyaivaṃrūpāṃ pravarāṃ praśastāṃ matiṃ kṛtavān pravaro buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:108_5_1: praviṣṭe ca tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuddhavirajaḥsannicayo nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:108_9: [KpSū_133] samantadarśī nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:108_10: evaṃrūpā ca te bodhisattvaparṣadbhaviṣyati sarve caite praṇidhānāstvayi saṃpatsyante yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:108_13: ye ca te mañjuśrīssattvā nāmaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakṣayo bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:109_0_0: mañjuśrīrāha - “yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśāparipūrirbhavediti yathā me praṇidhānaṃ
S04bsu018_u:109_0_1: kṛtaṃ tathā caiva māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:109_0_2: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu018_u:109_5: tebhyaśca māndāravebhya evaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaratu yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ [KpSū_134] pāramitāśabdaḥ balavaiśāradyaśabdaśca niścaratu /
S04bsu018_u:109_6: yadā cāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeya tadā caivaṃrūpaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhavet” /
S04bsu018_u:109_7: yadā ca mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā tatkṣaṇādevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhakṣetrāḥ prakaṃpitā,
S04bsu018_u:109_9: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā abhavanyathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:109_10: ye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti te tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti,
S04bsu018_u:109_11: “ko 'tra hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ evaṃrūpāṇāṃ nimittānāṃ prādurbhāvāya?” te ca buddhā bhagavanto mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:110_2: calitā kṣitiḥ tarpitāḥ sattvāḥ saukhyaiḥ puṣpāḥ pravṛṣṭā bheṣyase buddha loka” // iti //
S04bsu018_u:110_4: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturthaṃ rājaputramānaṅgaṇaṃ nāmāmantrayati /
S04bsu018_u:110_7: “sādhu sādhu kulaputra, bodhisattvabhūtastvaṃ kulaputrāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kleśaparvatāṃ bhetsyasi,
S04bsu018_u:110_8: buddhakāryaṃ ca kariṣyasi, tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
S04bsu018_u:110_9: tena tvaṃ kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsaśrīrnāma bodhisattvo bhavasva /
S04bsu018_u:110_12: samantabhadro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno bhaviṣyasi yāvad buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu018_u:110_13: evaṃrūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetramanekaguṇavyūhitaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:111_1: samanantaravyākṛtaśca kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:112_0_0: sa āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu018_u:112_1: ye ca tatra lokadhātuṣu sattvā upapannā bhaveyuḥ nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā devā vā manuṣyā vā te sarve taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:112_2: teṣāṃ kāyavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittavyādhiḥ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca tāvacciraṃ praśāntaṃ bhavedyāvadahaṃ śīrṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:113_0: atha khalu kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandate /
S04bsu018_u:113_1: atha tavadeva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavo divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena sphuṭā babhūvuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:113_2: sarveṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kāyavyādhiścittavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca praśāntaṃ pratiprasrabdhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:115_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ rājaputramabhayaṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /
S04bsu018_u:115_2: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yatra na narakā bhaveyurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:115_3: yatra nīlavaiḍūryamayī bhūmirvistareṇa yathā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhā tathā vaktavyāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:115_4: abhayaśca rājaputro ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrataḥ padmaṃ sthāpayitvāha /
S04bsu018_u:115_5: “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:115_6_0: yenāhaṃ bhagavato 'grato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsaṃkhyai
S04bsu018_u:115_6_1: rathacakrapramāṇamātraiḥ [KpSū_138] padmaiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣet vayaṃ ca paśyema” /
S04bsu018_u:115_7: sahodīrate vākye buddhānubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabdhavān,
S04bsu018_u:115_8: daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamai rathacakrapramāṇāmātraiḥ padmaiḥ padmavarṣaṃ pravarṣitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:116_0: bhagavān āha - “atīva kulaputra śobhanaṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:117_0: sa āha - “yadi mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvāśāparipūrirbhaveta tadete padmā gagane tiṣṭhantu tathaiva gagane sthitā varṣantu” /
S04bsu018_u:118_1: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra gaganamudro nāma bhavasva /
S04bsu018_u:118_4: [KpSū_139] padmottaraśca nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān aprameyena śuddhena bodhisattvasaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:118_7: gaganamudro bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā nipapāta /
S04bsu018_u:120_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ rājaputramambaraṃ nāmāntrayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:120_2: yāvad yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:120_3_0: “yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tad daśadiśī gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu [KpSū_140]
S04bsu018_u:120_3_1: lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganeṣu saptaratnamayāḥ chatrāḥ prādurbhavantu hemajālapraticchannāḥ
