S04bsu018_u:120_4: tatra chatraghaṇṭājālairevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaret yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ pāramitāśabdo balaśabdo 'bhijñāśabdo vaiśāradyaśabdaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:120_5: sarve ca te sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te śrutvā sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:120_6: ye cātra sattvāḥ pūrvamutpāditabodhicittāste 'vaivartikā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:120_7: samanantaravyāhṛte 'smiṃ vyāhāre atha daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganatalāt peyālaṃ evaṃrūpāḥ śabdā niścaranti /
S04bsu018_u:120_9: punarevaṃ āha - “sacenme bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ bhagavataḥ purato jñānavairocanaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheya,
S04bsu018_u:120_11: pratilabdhe ca samādhau māṃ bhagavāṃ vyākuryāt” /
S04bsu018_u:121_1: udāraṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, tena tvaṃ puṇyābhisyandena daśasu [KpSū_141] dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrā bahavaścaikapramāṇāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:121_4_2: ādityasomā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra tvaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04bsu018_u:121_5: dharmavaśavartīśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvad buddho bhagavān” /
S04bsu018_u:121_6: sa ca vegavairocano bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalena vandati ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ /
S04bsu018_u:122_1: “uttiṣṭha suvrata surata dāntacitta sattvebhyaḥ tīvrakaruṇā mahatī pravṛttā /
S04bsu018_u:122_2: tāre hi sattvān duḥkhārṇavatīraṃ saṃsthā yāvanna budhyasi anuttarabuddhabodhiṃ” //
S04bsu018_u:123_1: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ saptamaṃ rājaputramaṅgajamāmantrayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:123_2: peyālaṃ, “na cāsmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre tatrāhaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbuddheyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:123_3: yatra ca na narakā na tiryagyoniḥ na yamalokaḥ prajñāyate,
S04bsu018_u:123_4: na mātṛgrāmo na ca sattvānāṃ garbhavāsaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_5: na sumeruḥ na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na pāṃśuśailaparvatā notsadaśarkarakaṭhallakaṇṭakagahanā na kāṣṭhavṛkṣā na mahāsamudrā,
S04bsu018_u:123_6: na ca tatrādityacandrā na tārakarūpā na rātridivasā na tamaskandhā,
S04bsu018_u:123_7: na ca tatra sattvānāmuccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇakaṃ na kāyakhedadurgandhaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:123_8: na ca sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet na cittaklamatā;
S04bsu018_u:123_10: sarvā ca tatra bhūmiraśmagarbhamayī bhavet anekaratnaśatasahasrālaṅkṛtā bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:123_11: māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca tad buddhakṣetraṃ nānāratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtaṃ bhavet;
S04bsu018_u:123_13: nānāratnaduṣyā nānāratnavastrā nānāratnamālā nānāratnābharaṇālaṅkārālaṅkṛtā nānāmālyebhyo nānāvādyairnānāratnabhājanairnānāpuṣpaiśca te ratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtā [KpSū_143] bhaveyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:123_14: na tatra rātriḥ prajñāyeta, anyatra yadā puṣpāḥ saṃkuceyurvādyāśca vādyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_16: samāpannāśca tatra bodhisattvā darśanavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_17: yena samādhinā pratilabdhena daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:123_19: yena daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_20: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ sarve jātismarā bhaveyuste ca buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān anusmareyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_21: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarve evaṃrūpaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_22: yat samantāddaśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_23: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarva evaṃrūpeṇa paracittajñānakauśalyena samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_24: yadekakṣaṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāṃ vijāneyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāṃ [KpSū_144] te sattvāstāṃ samādhiṃ praṇāmeyū;
S04bsu018_u:123_25: rātryāḥ pratyuṣakālasamaye caturdiśaṃ sugandhāḥ prītikarāśca mṛdusukhasaṃsparśā vāyavo vāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_26: ye tān puṣpān vikāsayeyuḥ / te ca bodhisattvāstābhyaḥ samādhibhyo vyutthihitvā tebhyaḥ puṣpakeśarebhya uttiṣṭheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:123_27: tathārūpaṃ ca ṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratilabheran yad ekacittakṣaṇene buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānyekaikāṃ diśaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_28: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavato vanditvā paryupāsitvā tadā nivarteyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_30: dharmasukhamanasikāreṇa tathāgataṃ prekṣeyuryena yena ca niṣīdeyuḥ parivarteyurvā sarvadiśāsu ca māmeva paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_31: yathārūpaṃ ca tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kāṅkṣāvimatidharmeṣu saṃśayotpadyeta tatsarvaṃ mama darśanavyavalokanamātreṇa vigaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_32: yathārūpaṃ ca dharmadeśanān te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathārūpaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ mama vyavalokanamātreṇājāneyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_34: sarve ca tatra bodhisattvā avaivartikā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_35: na tatrākuśalasya nāma [KpSū_145] bhavenna ca tatra buddhakṣetre śikṣāgrahaṇasya nāma bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:123_36: na cāpattivyūtthāpanakathā, yathā yāvatsarvasattvā dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_39: sarve ca tatra sattvā muṇḍā navakāṣāyacīvaraprāvṛtāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:123_43: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhiduḥkhaṃ prajñāyeta /
S04bsu018_u:123_44: yeṣāṃ sattvānāmāyuḥparikṣayo bhavet te sarve paryaṅkena parinirvāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_46: caturdiśaśca vāyava āgaccheyuḥ ye tāni bodhisattvaśarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu kṣipeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_47: evaṃrūpāśca mahāmaṇiratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ tadyathā rājñaścakravartinaḥ prabhāsvaraṃ maṇiratnaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:123_48: ye ca tatra sattvāstāṃ maṇiratnaprabhāṃ paśyeyuḥ taṃ vā maṇiratnaṃ paśyeyuḥ spārśeyurvā te sarve narakatiryagyamalokaduḥkhāni yāvadbodhinirvāṇena mā pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_49: te ca tataścyavitvā tatropapadyeyuḥ yatra tiṣṭhanto [KpSū_146] yāpayanto buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu018_u:123_50: tatropapannāśca te sattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuste ca bodhicittamutpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_52: na kaścitsattvo mama buddhakṣetre 'samāhitaḥ kālaṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu018_u:123_53: na duḥkhavedanāyā na parasparavyāvadhacittāviprayogamaraṇāya tataśca mārākṣaṇeṣupapadyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_54: yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ buddhadarśanenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_55: sarve ca tatra sattvā apagatakhiladveṣamrakṣerṣyāmātsaryā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_58: snigdhacittā mṛducittā avairacittā akilviṣacittāḥ śāntacittāḥ samāhitacittāśca bhaveyuḥ tatra ye sattvā upapadyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_61: daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ lokadhātubhirdṛśyeta gandhena ca sphuret /
S04bsu018_u:123_63: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre duḥkhaśabdaḥ śrūyeta /
S04bsu018_u:123_64: tāvaccāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaścaivaṃrūpābhirbuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhasaṃpadābhiḥ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi,
S04bsu018_u:123_66: tataḥ paścād ahaṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:123_68: sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu ca daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lakṣanālaṅkṛto me kāyaḥ saṃdṛśyediti
S04bsu018_u:123_69: / ye ca tatra sattvā māṃ paśyeyuḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamayet,
S04bsu018_u:123_72: yathāvidhāśca samādhidhāraṇīrākāṅkṣeta tathārūpā māṃ dṛṣṭvā pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_73: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ śītanarake pratyājātā bhaveyusteṣāṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhāvedanā prādurbhavet,
S04bsu018_u:123_74_0: tathārūpāṃ ca sukhāṃ vedanāṃ pratilabheran yathāpi nāma dvitīyadhyānasamāpannasya
S04bsu018_u:123_74_1: bhikṣoste ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā parameṇa kāyacaitasikena sukhena samarpitā bhaveyuste ca
S04bsu018_u:123_76: ye ca sattvāḥ pretabhavaneṣūpapannāḥ mama paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_79: evaṃ devāḥ dviguṇā ca me prabhāsayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:123_80: apramāṇā ca me āyurbhavet, yanna śakyaṃ kenacidgaṇayituṃ anyatra sarvajñajñānena /
S04bsu018_u:123_81: bodhiprāptasya ca me daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto mama varṇaṃ bhāṣeranyeṣāṃ anuśrāvayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:123_82: ye ca tatra sattvā mama varṇaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te tatra mama buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_83: te kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ sthāpayitvānantaryakārakāṃ saddharmapratikṣepakāṃ āryāpavādakāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:123_84: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ mama ca buddhakṣetra upapattiṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_85: teṣāmahaṃ maraṇakālasamayeṣvanekagaṇaparivṛto vitimirasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ tathārūpeṇa subhāṣitena tān sattvān saṃtoṣayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:123_89: kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:123_90_0: ye ca punaranyatra buddhakṣetreṣu saptadhanavirahitāḥ sattvā anarthikāḥ tribhiryānairanarthikā
S04bsu018_u:123_93: bodhau ca samādāpayeyaṃ / te sattvā mamāntike paramaprītiprasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ bodhau ca cittānyutpādyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:123_96: mohapraṇāhaṃ caiṣāṃ bhavet, kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:124_2: sa prāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣatu /
S04bsu018_u:124_3: ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ te sarve bodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:124_4: ahaṃ caitarhi [KpSū_150] praṇītadyutiṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:124_5_0: yat svayaṃ eva paśyeyaṃ / utpāditaśca kulaputra praṇītadyutiḥ samādhiḥ svayamevādrākṣīt
S04bsu018_u:124_6: daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ prāñjalibhūtā adrākṣuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:125_1: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā bodhau samādāpitāstena tvaṃ kulaputra siṃhagandho bhavasva /
S04bsu018_u:125_2_0: atikrānte siṃhagandha ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsaṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye uparimāya diśāyeto
S04bsu018_u:125_4: prabhāsavirajaḥsamucchrayagandheśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān” /
S04bsu018_u:126_1: atha khalu kulaputra siṃhagandho bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditavān /
S04bsu018_u:127_2: chittvā tvaṃ bhavaduḥkhakleśabandhanāṃ bheṣyasi narajina āryapudgalaḥ” //
S04bsu018_u:128_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'ṣṭamaṃ rājaputramamighaṃ nāmāmantrayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:128_1: peyālaṃ, “tāvadahaṃ bhagavan kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhisattvabhūto bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ daśasahasrān kliṣṭān buddhakṣetrānevaṃrūpāṃ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi,
S04bsu018_u:128_5: tathārūpāmahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā nānye bodhisattvāścaranti /
S04bsu018_u:128_6: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannimāni saptavarṣāṇi buddhaguṇabodhisattvaguṇapariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇapariśuddhaṃ rahogata ekākī saṃcintayamāno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:128_7: darśanavyūhasamādhipūrvaṃgamena ekadaśabodhisattvasamādhisahasrāṇi yāni mayātrotpāditāni pratilabdhāni bhāvitāni,
S04bsu018_u:128_8: eṣā mama bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvabhūtasya bodhisattvacārikā;
S04bsu018_u:128_9: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣvanantāparyantāsvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:128_10: ye trādhvasamatikrāntā dhvajāgrākeyūrā buddhakṣetrāstāṃ paripūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ paśyeyaṃ āvarteyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:128_11: tena ca samādhināhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan paramāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavato bodhisattvaśrāvakagaṇaparivṛtān paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:128_13: [KpSū_153] ekaikena cāhaṃ kāyenānuttarairvicitrai ratnaiḥ puṣpairanuttarairvicitrairgandhairmālyaiśca curṇavilepanairvādyaiḥ sarvābhiścānuttarābhirvyūhābhirekaikaṃ pūjayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:128_15: yadā cāhaṃ sarvakāyavibhāvanena samādhinaikakṣaṇenaikaikasya buddhasya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhagocarān ājāneyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:128_17: animiṣasamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekarajāgracittapramāṇena sarvabuddhakṣetrān pūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:128_18: araṇāsamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekacittakṣaṇena sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānatītānāgatapratyutpannān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:128_21: bodhāya ca samādāpayeyaṃ, tatastān sattvān bodhāya cittamutpādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:128_22: tataścyavitvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sahabhāvyatāyāmupapadyeyuḥ [KpSū_154] yatra buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:128_24: evaṃ tiryakṣu, evaṃ preteṣu, evaṃ yakṣeṣu, evaṃ rākṣaseṣu, evamasureṣu, evaṃ nāgeṣu, evaṃ kinnaramahorageṣu, evaṃ piśācapūtanakaṭapūtaneṣu,
S04bsu018_u:128_25: evaṃ manuṣyacaṇḍāleṣu, evaṃ vaṇijeṣu gaṇikāsu; yathārūpeṣu ca bhagavan sattvāḥ kuleṣūpapadyante,
S04bsu018_u:128_27: yathārūpeṇa ca sattvāḥ karmapratyayena sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhāṃ vā pratisaṃvedayanti,
S04bsu018_u:128_31: dharmaṃ ca deśayeyaṃ, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:128_33_0: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā daśasu sarvabuddhakṣetrasahasreṣu
S04bsu018_u:128_33_1: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantatiṃ tathā pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā pūrvakarmakleśāṃ na kuryuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:128_37: evaṃ mayā svabuddhakṣetrasya svaparṣāyā ca yathā siṃhagandhena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:128_38: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā daśasu buddhakṣetrasahasreṣu sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni praśāmyantu,
S04bsu018_u:128_39: sarve ca mṛducittā bhavantu, karmaṇyacittā bhavantu, svakasvakāyāścaturdvīpikāyāḥ tiṣṭhanto buddhān paśyantu /
S04bsu018_u:128_41: yena te sattvāḥ tān buddhān pūjayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:128_43: ahaṃ ca bhagavan darśanavyūhasamādhānabalena svayaṃ paśyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:128_44: sahodīritayāṃ vācāsminnevameva svayaṃ paśyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” iti /
S04bsu018_u:129_1: yastvaṃ kulaputra samantake ca svake ca buddhakṣetre daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇi pariśuddhāni sthāpayiṣyasi /
S04bsu018_u:129_4: tena tvaṃ kulaputra samantabhadro nāma bhavasva /
S04bsu018_u:129_5_1: parivartāvaśiṣṭe dvitīya uttarāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāt ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni
S04bsu018_u:129_7: jñānavajravijṛmbhiteśvaraketurnāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
S04bsu018_u:130_0: atha khalu kulaputra samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādayoḥ śirasā nipapāta /
S04bsu018_u:131_1: “uttiṣṭha surata suvrata dāntacittā sattvāna santati viśodhya dṛḍhapratijñatvaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:131_3: sattvān tāraya kleśanadīsughorān tvaṃ jñāna ulkadhara bheṣyasi buddha loke” //
S04bsu018_u:132_0: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputra samayena daśakuśīdaprāṇasahasrāṇi ekakaṇṭhena vācaṃ babhāṣire /
S04bsu018_u:132_1: “bhaviṣyāma vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan te pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:132_2: yāṃ suviśuddhāśayāḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carāmāṇaḥ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayati /
S04bsu018_u:132_3: evaṃ ca vayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayitvā tatra buddhakṣetra upapadyema” /
S04bsu018_u:133_0: evaṃ kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena daśaprāṇisahasrā vyākṛtāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:133_1: “yadā samantabhadro 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate tadā yūyaṃ teṣu sāmantakeṣu lokadhātuṣvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyadhve /
S04bsu018_u:133_2: sahasraikanāmakāstathāgatā bhaviṣyathaḥ yaduta sahasraṃ jvālakuṇḍeśvaraghoṣā nāma bhaviṣyatha tathāgatāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:133_7: pañcaśatā ekaṃ nāmadheyāḥ yaduta sūryaghoṣanāmā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu018_u:133_10_0: ) akṣayajñānakūṭaḥ, ratnāvabhāsaḥ, jñānavimalaḥ, jñānapravāḍaḥ, siṃhakīrtiḥ, abhijñāguṇarājaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:133_10_3: vaśavartī, asaṅgahiteṣī, jñānasaṃbhavaḥ, mahāmeruḥ, balagarbhaḥ, guṇākaraḥ, latākusumadhvajaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:133_10_4: gaṇaprabhāsaḥ, viguṇamoharājā, vajrottamaḥ, dharmaketuḥ, ghoṣendrarājā, svaguptaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:133_10_5: vajradhvajaḥ, ratneśvaraḥ, abhyudgatadhvajaḥ, śailakalpaḥ, ratimeghaḥ, dharmakārisālarājā,
S04bsu018_u:133_10_7: udumbarapuṣpaḥ, kāñcanadhvajaḥ, dharmadhvajaḥ, vinarditarājaḥ, candanaḥ, supratiṣṭhitasthāmavikramaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:133_10_9: guṇārciḥ, jñānaprabhaḥ, jñānapradīpaḥ, kṣemarājā, jñānaghoṣaḥ, dhvajasaṃgrahaḥ, [KpSū_160]
S04bsu018_u:133_10_10: vajrapradīpaḥ, vyūharājā, jayasaṃkhyā, supratiṣṭhitaḥ, maticandrarājā, kramavinarditarājā,
S04bsu018_u:133_12: bhaviṣyati / aparaṃ sahasraṃ visṛṣṭadharmarājāno nāgendravimuktibuddhalokasāgaralocanaśailanāmā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:133_15: te 'pi daśaprāṇasahasrā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā nipetuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:135_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo navamaṃ rājaputramāmantrayate sma amighaṃ nāma /
S04bsu018_u:135_1_0: peyālaṃ, sa prāha - “tathārūpamahaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā me daśasu
S04bsu018_u:135_1_2: buddhā bhagavanto bodhicārikāṃ carataḥ sākṣibhūtā bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:135_2: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan tvatpurato bodhāya cittamutpādayāmi,
S04bsu018_u:135_4: atrāntareṇa me bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya na vipratisāracittamutpadyeta,
S04bsu018_u:135_9_0: mā styānamiddhasahagatā mauddhatyasahagatā mā kaukṛtyasahagatā na vicikitsāsahagatā
S04bsu018_u:135_9_1: na prāṇātipātaṃ nādattādānaṃ nābrahmacaryaṃ na mṛsāvādaṃ na paiśunyaṃ na pāruṣyaṃ
S04bsu018_u:135_9_2: nābhidhyā na vyāpādaṃ na mithyādṛṣṭiḥ na saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ na mātsaryasahagataṃ na
S04bsu018_u:135_10: yāvadbodhiparyantān mama bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya ime dharmā na saṃvidyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:135_12: yāvadbodhiparyantena nāhaṃ buddhadarśanena virahito bhaveyaṃ na dharmaśravaṇena na saṅghopasthānena /
S04bsu018_u:135_15: traicīvarikaḥ vṛkṣamūlikaḥ naiṣadyikaḥ āraṇyakaḥ piṇḍapātikaḥ alpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ dharmadeśakaḥ ādeyavākyaḥ aparimāṇapratibhānasaṃpanno bhaveyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:135_16: na ca mūlāpattimāpadyeyaṃ / na mṛṣāvādasahagatairmantraiḥ parapravādino vimardeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:135_18: śūnyatāmanaskāreṇa ca mātṛgrāmasya na dantavidarśanaṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu018_u:135_21: yasya cāhaṃ dharmabhāṇakasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ śāstṛsaṃjñān tasyāntike utpādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:135_22: satkṛtya cāhaṃ taṃ dharmabhāṇakaṃ yathā tathāgataṃ tathā satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyaṃ yāvadātmamāṃsairapi dharmabhāṇakamupasthiteyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:135_23: na cāhaṃ pātramapātraṃ cāvekṣya dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:135_26: svavīryabalapraṇidhānopārjitena cāhaṃ dravyena vyasanagatān sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:135_27: na cāhaṃ pravrajitaliṅginaṃ vā gṛhasthaliṅginaṃ vā āpattyānāpattyā vā codayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:135_29: / yadi ca me bhadanta bhagavannime praṇidhānā yāvadbodhiparyantamupādāya saṃṛdhyeyuḥ yathā bhagavataḥ purataḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:135_30: tadubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ divyāścakraratnāḥ prādurbhavantu sahasrārāḥ sanābhikāḥ sanemikāḥ ādityavarṇaprabhāsvarāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:135_31: sahabhāṣitāyāṃ asyāṃ vāci amighena rājaputreṇobhāyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ tathārūpāṇi cakrāṇi [KpSū_164] prādurbhūtāni yathāyācitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:135_32: punarāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yāvadbodhiparyantena tadime cakrāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gacchantu,
S04bsu018_u:135_33_0: evaṃrūpeṇoccaśabdena yathā nandopanandā nāgarājā gacchanti tathā sarvāvantaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
S04bsu018_u:135_34: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrotrendriyeṣvayaṃ dharmaparyāyamābhāsamāgacchatu,
S04bsu018_u:135_35: nipatitamātre ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamatu,
S04bsu018_u:136_0: preṣitau ca kulaputrāmighena rājaputreṇa tau dvau cakraratnau tau caivaṃrūpeṇa javena gacchatastadyathā buddhā bhagavanto buddhajavena gacchanti;
S04bsu018_u:136_1_0: evameva tau dvau cakraratnau gacchataḥ daśasu diśāsvaprameyeśvasaṃkhyeyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:136_3: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rāgo yāvan mātsaryacittacaitasikāḥ praśāntāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:136_4: sarve ca buddhajñānaviṣayaṃ manaskāreṇānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditavanto,
S04bsu018_u:136_5: muhūrtamātreṇa ca te cakrāḥ pratinivṛtyāmighasya rājaputrasya purataḥ sthitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:137_0: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ amighasya rājaputrasya sādhukāramadāt,
S04bsu018_u:137_1: “sādhu sādhu kulaputra, tvayātīva śobhanaḥ praṇidhiḥ kṛta,
S04bsu018_u:137_2: ime ca divyāścakraratnāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣitā,
S04bsu018_u:137_4: bodhau ca samādāpitāni / tena tvaṃ kulaputrākṣobhyo nāma bhavasva /
S04bsu018_u:138_0: akṣobhya āha - “tādṛśamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhamākāṅkṣāmi yathā sarvalokasvarṇabhūrbhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_1: samāpāṇitalopamā divyamaṇiratnavyavakīrṇā apagataśarkarakaṭhallā apagataśilāstaṃbhapāṣāṇaparvatā mṛdukā kācalindikasukhasaṃsparṣā,
S04bsu018_u:138_4: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre durgandhā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_7: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_8: na ca parasparabhayaṃ na ca parasparaviheṭhā na ca sattvānāmakālamaraṇaṃ vipratisāramaraṇaṃ nāsamāhitamaraṇaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:138_10: na ca durgatiṣūpapadyeyuḥ, na pañcakaṣāyeṣu śūnyesu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāt buddhadarśanāvirahitā bhaveyurdharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā /
S04bsu018_u:138_12: sarve ca tatra daśakuśalāṃ karmapathān samādāya varteyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_13: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ śīlpagrahaṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_14: na nāmanimittaṃ, na ca tatra sattvānāṃ mārāvatāraṃ mārgena /
S04bsu018_u:138_15: na ca tatra sattvā durvarṇā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_16: na ca tatra sattvā vaimātra bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_17: yadutāryo vā dāso vā, amamā aparigrahāśca tatra sattvā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_18: na ca tatra śrāvakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vā śuklamokṣaṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_20: [KpSū_167] sarve ca tatra sattvā dharmakāmā dharmaparyeṣṭiparā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_21: na ca tatra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo 'pi viparītadṛṣṭiko bhavet na cānyatīrthiko,
S04bsu018_u:138_22: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet cittaklamatā vā bhavet;
S04bsu018_u:138_23: sarve ca te tatra sattvāḥ pañcābhijñā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_24: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇā vā bhukṣā vā viheṭhayet,
S04bsu018_u:138_25: yādṛśaṃ cāhāramākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśaṃ ratnabhājaneṣu purataḥ prādurbhavet yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:138_26: na coccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇamaśru vā kāye svedo vā bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_27: na ca tatra śītaṃ noṣṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_28: sugandhaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ bhavet, mṛdusaṃsparśāśca vāyavo vāyuyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_29: te ca tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gandhakṛtyaṃ kurvīranyadākāṅkṣeyuḥ yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_33: apare kālānusārigandhaṃ, apare tagaragandhaṃ, apare 'garugandhaṃ, apare sarveṇa sarvaṃ vāyunākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_36: tatra ca sattvānāṃ saptaratnamayāḥ kūṭāgārā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_37: teṣu ca kūṭāgāreṣu saptaratnamayāḥ paryaṅkāḥ stritāḥ [KpSū_168] tūlikopadhānairmṛdukācalindikasaṃsparśāḥ prādurbhaveyuryatra manuṣyā vihareyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_42: yathārūpā ca tatra sattvā vastrābharaṇaṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ te tān tebhyaḥ kalpavṛkṣebhyo gṛhītvā prāvareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_46: vāyusamīritaśca tato bodhivṛkṣāddivyātikrāntaḥ snigdho manojñaḥ pāramitā abhijñendriyabalabodhyaṅgaśabdo niścaret,
S04bsu018_u:138_47: ye ca sattvāstaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuste virāgacittāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_48: sarvaguṇopetaśca tatra buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo bhavet tadyathā tuṣitadevanikāye 'psarāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_49: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmo durgandho bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_51: na ca tatra manuṣyā mātṛgrāmeṇa [KpSū_169] sārdhaṃ maithunakāyasaṃsargamāpadyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_53: gatvā mātṛgrāmaṃ sarāgena cittena prekṣate muhūrtena puruṣasya rāgaḥ praśāmyeta,
S04bsu018_u:138_54: mahatodvegena ca prakramet, śubhavirajaṃ ca samādhiṃ pratilabheta,
S04bsu018_u:138_57: yā ca tatra strī puruṣaṃ sarāgaṃ nirīkṣeta gurviṇī bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_59: ye garbhavāsairdārakadārikā evaṃ kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_60: tadyathā devāstrayastriṃśā nandanti pramodanti kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti /
S04bsu018_u:138_61: evaṃrūpaśca tatra buddhakṣetre garbhavāsā dārakadārikāḥ saptarātriṃdivasāni sukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_62: tāśca striyo garbhiṇyaḥ evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_64: na ca te sattvā aśucinā garbhamalena kliśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_65: saptame ca divase paramasugandhena parameṇa ca sukhopadhānena samarpitāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_66: na caiva sā strī duḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaved,
S04bsu018_u:138_67: ubhau ca puṣkariṇīmavataritvā snātvā ca sā strī evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheta,
S04bsu018_u:138_70_0: satatasamāhitā bhavet / yacca pūrvajanmani tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavedyena
S04bsu018_u:138_70_1: ca bahukalpakoṭīstrībhāvamanubhavitavyaṃ tena samādhinābhinirvṛtena strībhāvaṃ ca
S04bsu018_u:138_71: yāvat parinirvāṇaṃ na bhūyaḥ strībhāvaṃ pratilabhet /
S04bsu018_u:138_72: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavet yad gaṇanātikrāntān kalpān nityagarbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavitavyaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:138_73_0: te bodhiprāptasya me nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ prasādaṃ ca pratilabheyuste tataścyavitvā
S04bsu018_u:138_73_1: mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyurgarbhavāsena ca pratyājāyeyustatra sarveṇa sarvaṃ tatkarmaparikṣayaṃ
S04bsu018_u:138_73_2: gaccheyuryāvadbodhiparyantena na bhūyaste sattvā garbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurye sattvā
S04bsu018_u:138_75: karmaparikṣayena mama buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo vā garbhavāso vā prajñāyeta ekāntasukhasamarpitāste sattvāstatra buddhakṣetre bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_77: niścareyuḥ / tena ca śabdena tatra [KpSū_171] manuṣyā ulkāvatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā te sattvāḥ śūnyatāvabhāsāṃ gambhīrān dharmān avabudhyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_78: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre kāmopasaṃhitaḥ śabdo bhavet /
S04bsu018_u:138_79: bodhivṛkṣamūlaniṣaṇṇaścāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan muhūrtenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpnūyāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:138_80: bodhiprāptasya ca me tatra buddhakṣetre na bhūyaścandrasūryāṇāṃ prabhā prajñāyeta,
S04bsu018_u:138_81: anyatra kusumasaṃkocanena; evaṃrūpāṃ cāhaṃ prabhāṃ pramuñceyaṃ yena divyena cakṣuṣāprameyāsaṃkhyeyairanyairbuddhakṣetraistiṣṭhato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:138_82: bodhiprāptaścāhamevaṃrūpeṇa svareṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yena svareṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetramāpūrayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:138_83: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ syuḥ te sarve buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste yena yena gaccheyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyurvā parivarteyurvā,
S04bsu018_u:138_84: te satatasamitaṃ māṃ paśyeyuryathārūpeṣu dharmeṣu dharmasaṃśayā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ mama darśanamātreṇa vyavalokanamātreṇa ca teṣāṃ saṃśayā vigaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:138_85: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vānuttarayānikā vā mama nāmaṃ vā varṇaṃ va śṛṇuyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_87: te tatra mama dharmaṃ śrutvā ye śrāvakayānikāste 'ṣṭavimokṣadhyāyino 'rhanto bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_88: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ te pratyekāṃ bodhimabhigaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_89: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā mahāyānikāste mat sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā gambhīrāṃ samādhikṣāntidhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_91: aprameyaśca me śrāvakasaṅgho bhaved yo na śakyaṃ kenacidgaṇayituṃ anyatra svayaṃ tathāgatena /
S04bsu018_u:138_92: bodhiprāptaścāhaṃ yena yena gaccheyaṃ yatra yatra ca pādatalena pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ tatra tatra sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_93: te ca padmāḥ śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā mama varṇaśabdaṃ ghoṣaṃ niścārayeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:138_94: te ca sattvā mama nāma varṇaṃ yaśaśca śrutvā prītiprasādaprāmodyamutpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_99: apagataśramaṇavākyāpagataśramaṇakauṭilyāpagataśramaṇaśāṭhyā apagataparṣā [KpSū_173] bhaveddharmagurukā na pariṣkāragurukā na lābhasatkāragurukā,
S04bsu018_u:138_100: anityaduḥkhānātmaśūnyatābhiratā ārabdhavīryā ca sā parṣadbhaveddharmaśravaṇā saṅghaprāgbhārā /
S04bsu018_u:138_101: ye ca tatrāvaivartikā bodhisattvā bhaveyuste 'nāgatapraviṣṭāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste jātivyativṛttā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:138_102: yāvadbodhiparyantena te dharmā na saṃpramoṣaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:139_2: bhaviṣyasi tvamakṣobhyānāgate 'dhvani atikrānte hyekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeya 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye purastimāyāṃ diśi,
S04bsu018_u:139_4: evaṃrūpayā guṇavyūhayā saṃpannā yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:139_6: evamevākṣobhyo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
S04bsu018_u:140_0_0: akṣobhya āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvatra lokadhātuṣu
S04bsu018_u:140_0_1: sattvāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaparigṛhītā [KpSū_174] ye ca sattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītāste
S04bsu018_u:140_0_2: sarve maitracittā bhavantvavairacittā akaluṣacittāste evaṃrūpaṃ kāyasukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ
S04bsu018_u:140_0_3: tadyathāpi nāma daśabhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya padmasamādhiṃ samāpannasya yenāśayaprahāṇaviśuddhirbhavati,
S04bsu018_u:140_1: evaṃrūpeṇa sattvāḥ kāyacaitasikena sukhena samārpitā bhavantu /
S04bsu018_u:140_2: yadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeta tadā sarvapṛthivī svarṇāvabhāsā bhavatu” /
S04bsu018_u:140_3: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā ca tasmin samaye sarvasattvā evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:141_2: sthāpitā bahutṛṣṇā karuṇacitte bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ śubhamati jagati śāstā” //
S04bsu018_u:142_1: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo daśamaṃ rājaputraṃ himaṇiṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /
S04bsu018_u:142_2: peyālaṃ himaṇī rājaputra evaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānamakārṣīt tadyathākṣobhyena kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:142_3: “yadi me bhadanta bhagavan nevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvasattvā buddhālaṃbanamanaskāraṃ pratilabhantu /
S04bsu018_u:142_5: te ca sarve taṃ gandhaṃ buddhavigraheṣu pariṇāmayantu” /
S04bsu018_u:143_1: udāraṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, yacca tvayā sarvasattvā uragasāracandanahastā sthāpitā buddhamanaskāraścāśayenotpāditaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:143_3_2: parinirvṛte saddharme 'ntarhite saptame dviase tvaṃ gandhahaste tatra lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ
S04bsu018_u:143_4: suvarṇapuṣpo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
S04bsu018_u:144_0_1: tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeyaṃ tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣaṃ
S04bsu018_u:144_1: yadā khalu kulaputra gandhahastirbodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat /
S04bsu018_u:145_2: darśaya śubhapatha varapraṇītaṃ sthāpaya bahujagamabhaye pāre” //
S04bsu018_u:146_0: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa ekādaśamaṃ rājaputraṃ siṃhaṃ nāmāmantrayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:147_1_0: ratnaketurnāma bhavasva, bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ ratnaketo 'nāgate [KpSū_177] 'dhvani atikrānte
S04bsu018_u:147_1_2: lokadhātau parinirvṛte svarṇapuṣpe tathāgate tasya ca saddharme 'ntarhite trayāṇāṃ
S04bsu018_u:147_2: tatra tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase nāgavinarditeśvaraghoṣo nāma bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān /
S04bsu018_u:147_3: evaṃrūpaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhena yathākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya” /
S04bsu018_u:148_0: ratnaketurāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādau vande tadā sarvasattvā evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:148_1: yathā bodhisattvā ye mahābodhiṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya karuṇāyamānāḥ saṃbodhau prasthitā na nivarteyuḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:148_2: evameva kulaputra ratnaketurbodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau vanditvā,
S04bsu018_u:148_3: evameva sattvā evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabdhavanto yaduta karuṇācittāḥ sarvasattvāḥ sthāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:149_0: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato ratnaketuṃ bodhisattvamāha -
S04bsu018_u:149_2: “uttiṣṭha dhairya sumate paramarūpa sattvahetu sudṛḍhakṛta pratijñā /
S04bsu018_u:149_3: sthāpayasi bahujana virajacitte bhaviṣyase naravaro pravarabuddhaḥ” //
S04bsu018_u:150_0: evaṃ peyālaṃ, mārdavapūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcabhi rājaputraśatairevaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:150_1: kṛtvaivaṃrūpā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītā yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:150_3: sarve ca ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:151_0: apare catvāraḥ śatā rājaputrāṇāṃ yairevaṃrūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ yathā vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsena,
S04bsu018_u:151_1: te 'pi sarve ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau anyonyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
