S04bsu018_u:202_5: kleśavyākule loke praśamayiṣyasi duḥkhaskandhaṃ sattvānāṃ jñānatoyena praśamayiṣyasi” /
S04bsu018_u:202_6: sarvāvatī sā parṣatprāñjalībhūtā abhimukhā ekakaṇṭhena vadati /
S04bsu018_u:202_7: “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa, pravarapaṇḍitāsmākaṃ hitakara kuruṣva dṛḍhapraṇidhānaṃ pravarabuddhimayaṃ śṛṇomaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:202_8: purohitaścopasaṃkrāmati yadā ca nikṣiptaṃ purohitena bhagavataḥ sakāśe jānumaṇḍalaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:202_9: tāvaccāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvāvatīdaṃ saṃtaraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ kaṃpati prakaṃpati calati pracalati kṣubhyati prakṣubhyati vedhati pravedhati,
S04bsu018_u:202_11: ye ca mṛgapakṣiṇaste sarve manojñaṃ snigdhaṃ ca śabdamudīrayanti,
S04bsu018_u:202_13: ye kecidasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīṃ niśritya bhūtāḥ prativasanti ye bodhau samādāpitā ye na ca samādāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:202_15: sarve [KpSū_221] hitacittāḥ kalyāṇacittā avairacittā akaluṣacittā maitricittā āścaryacittā babhūvuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:202_16: ye sattvāḥ svargacarāste khe sthā evaṃ paramaprītimanasaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:202_17: puṣpairmālyairgandhairvādyai ratnacchatrairdhvajaiḥ patākābhirvastraduṣyaiḥ snigdhamanojñaṃ śabdaṃ brāhmaṇasya praṇidhānaṃ śravaṇāyodyuktāḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu018_u:202_18: caivaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantā devā jambūdvīpaṃ avatīrya gaganatale sthitvā divyairgandhairyāvadduṣyairbrāhmaṇasya praṇidhānaṃ śravaṇārthamudyuktāḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu018_u:204_2: giri saumya vinardasi siṃharivā na ca kaṃpase dṛḍhamerurivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_3: na ca kṣobhyase udadhīṣarivā guṇadoṣavahī samudravāririvā /
S04bsu018_u:204_5: mala sarva pravāhasi toyurivā dahi kleśvanaṃ muniragnirivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_6: na ca sajjase kvacidvāyurivā muni tattve nidarśaka devurivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_7: muni dharma pravarṣasi nāgurivā jaga sarvaṃ tarpayasi vṛṣṭirivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_8: anyatīrthaṃ pramardasi siṃharivā guṇagandha pramuñcasi puṣparivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_9: madhuragira bhāṣasi brahmarivā jaga duḥkhapramuñcaka vaidyarivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_11: kira māna arī dṛḍha vajrarivā chindi tṛṣṇalatā muniśatrurivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_12: jaga tārayase naditārurivā dahi jñānatṛṇāṃ munināgarivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_13: dadi śītaprabhā municandrarivā nara padma vibodhayi sūryarivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_16: jinabuddha viṣāla samudrarivā samacitta jage tṛṇakāṣṭharivā /
S04bsu018_u:204_18: muni bodhiya vyākṛta sattva tvayā varalakṣaṇadhāri sukāruṇikā /
S04bsu018_u:204_19: tvayi sattva vinīta anantabahū mama vyākari bodhiya agravare /
S04bsu018_u:204_20: varaprajñā mahāriṣi satyaruceḥ mama vyākari bodhiya chindi matīṃ /
S04bsu018_u:204_21: bhavi buddha jage kalikleśaraṇiḥ sthapi sattvaśatāṃśi viśāntapathe” //
S04bsu018_u:205_0: yadā kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamābhirgāthābhiḥ stutvā tasthau,
S04bsu018_u:205_1: tāvadeva sā sarvāvatī parṣā sadevagandharvamāṇuṣā sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu018_u:206_0_0: purohita āha - “mayā bhadanta bhagavan bahuprāṇakoṭyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04bsu018_u:206_1: ime ca jyotipālapūrvaṃgamānāṃ caturuttarasahasraṃ vedapāṭhakāṇaṃ ye tathāgatena bhadrakalpikā vyākṛtāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:206_3_2: apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā akṛtyakārakā apuṇyakarāḥ paralokabhayādarśino viparītatattvabodhino
S04bsu018_u:206_4_0: tathā devamānuṣikābhiḥ śrīsaṃpattibhirudyuktāḥ triṣu duścariteṣu saṃpratipannāḥ daśasu
S04bsu018_u:206_4_1: kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu virahitāḥ sarvakalyāṇamitrai riñcitāḥ sarvapaṇḍitaiḥ prakṣiptā
S04bsu018_u:206_4_3: nirmuktāḥ sarvakuśalakriyāyāṃ sarve śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūjjhitāḥ sakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatāḥ
S04bsu018_u:206_4_4: kumārgavihanyanto mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāstasmin [KpSū_225] kāle sahe buddhakṣetre daśavarṣāyuṣkā
S04bsu018_u:206_6: tatkālaṃ bhavāvartake saṃsāracakre 'trāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā duḥkhabhājanabhūtāḥ sattvāstāṃ parivarjayitvā svakasvakā buddhakṣetrāḥ pradhānapradhānāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:206_7: suvinītāśca pariśuddhāśayāḥ avaruptakuśalamūlāḥ ārabdhavīryā bahubuddhakṛtādhikārā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:206_8: na evaṃ, bhadanta bhagavan?” ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - “evaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:206_9: brāhmaṇa, yathābhiprāyāḥ sattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāśca parigṛhītāstatraiva ca mayā vyākṛtāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:207_0: brāhmaṇaḥ prāha - “mamāpi bhadanta bhagavan hṛdayaṃ kaṃpati tadyathāpi kiṃśukapatraṃ paramadīnamānaso 'haṃ sarvaśarīraṃ ca me āyāsitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:207_1: yadi me bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ karuṇāspadabhūtā bodhisattvaistatkālamutsṛṣṭā mahākaliyugāndhakāraprakṣiptāḥ sarvaparivarjitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:208_1_1: 'vaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye tasmiṃśca bhadrake mahākalpe daśavarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:208_1_2: prajāyāṃ kālaṃ pratīkṣamāṇāstāvacciramahaṃ saṃsāre na parikhidyeyaṃ bodhicārikāṃ
S04bsu018_u:208_4: śrutaṃ ca mayā bhagavataḥ sakāśād “vastunimittaṃ parityāgeyaṃ dānapāramitā” /
S04bsu018_u:208_5: tathārūpamahaṃ dānapāramitāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā janmāntareṣvaprameyāḥ sattvā yācanakā āgamiṣyanti teṣāṃ tathārūpāṃ parityāgaṃ parityajeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:208_7_0: ye ca punaḥ sattvā atityāgayācanakā āgatvā yācayeran tadyathā dāsadāsīgrāmanagararājyabhāryāputraduhitṛhastaparityāgapādaparityāgakarṇanāsānayanajihvācarmarudhirāsthikāyajīvitaśiraḥparityāgaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:208_8: evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ paramaprasannaḥ kāruṇyamānasaḥ aphalābhikāṅkṣī sattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadyāṃ vaineyānukaṃpārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:208_10_0: yanna kadācit pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvena evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ syurna ca
S04bsu018_u:208_10_1: punaḥ paścāt kaścid bodhisattvaḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃrūpāḥ
S04bsu018_u:208_11: yadahaṃ teṣu janmāntareṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ careyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:208_12: yadahaṃ mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatānāṃ paścimakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ parityāganetrīguṇān sthāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:208_14: tathāhamanuttarāyāṃ [KpSū_228] samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇo vividhaśīlavratanirantaraduṣkaracārikāṃ careyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:208_15: yathā pūrvoktaṃ / “yā viṣayeṣvakṣaṇyanatā ātmapratyavekṣaṇā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā” /
S04bsu018_u:208_17: yathā pūrvoktaṃ / “yā vivekatā sarvasaṃskṛtā bhāvanā udyujyanā sarvāsaṃskṛtaśāntamanuttaracaryayā avivartanā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā” /
S04bsu018_u:208_18: “yā sarvasaṃskāreṣu viparyāsaprahāṇāya śūnyatā samudācāraḥ iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā” /
S04bsu018_u:208_21: yathā pūrvoktaṃ, na kaścid bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ dṛḍhotsāhabalavegena
S04bsu018_u:208_23: na ca punaḥ paścātkaścid [KpSū_229] bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ dṛḍhotsāhabalavegena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
S04bsu018_u:208_24: tathāhaṃ careyaṃ; paścimakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatānāṃ netrīguṇaṃ sthāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:209_2: śīlāniśrayatā kṣāntyāmanyanatā vīrye 'nāyūhanatā dhyāneṣvapratiṣṭhitatā prajñāyāmadvayatāṃ careyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:209_4: ekaikasya sattvasyārthe cāhaṃ kuśalamūlabījasaṃtatyāḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ daśamahākalpān [KpSū_230] avīcinarake duḥkhāṃ vedanāmutsaheyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:209_5: evaṃ tiryakpreteṣu yakṣadaridreṣu manuṣyadaridreṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāmutsaheyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:209_6: yathā caikasattvasya santatyāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ tathā sarvasattvānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ riktamuṣṭisadṛśasantānāṃ vaineyāṃ pratigṛhṇīyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:209_9: tāvacciramahaṃ saṃsāre buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsitvā ekaikasya ca buddhasyāhaṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ vividhāṃ
S04bsu018_u:210_0: pūjāṃ kuryāṃ, ekaikasya ca buddhasya sakāśādbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān guṇān adhigaccheyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:210_2: evaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāmevaṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ yathābhiprāyāṃśca sattvān tathāhaṃ samādāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:210_3: asati buddhotpāde loka ṛṣivratenāhaṃ sattvāṃ daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu niyojayeyaṃ samādhāvabhijñāsu ca niyojayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:210_5: nārāyaṇabhaktāṃścandrasūryabhaktāṃ yāvadbrahmabhaktān brahmarūpeṇāhaṃ sattvān kuśaladharmeṣu niyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:210_8: vyasanagatāṃśca sattvāṃ svakena kāyena jīvitena ca paritrāyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:211_0: tāvacciramahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan dagdhasantānānāṃ kuśalamūlaparihīnānāmarthāyātibalavegena cārikāṃ caraṃ,
S04bsu018_u:211_1: tāvacciraṃ cāhaṃ saṃsāre sattvahetorvividhacaṇḍaghoradāruṇāṃ duḥkhāṃ praticcheyaṃ:
S04bsu018_u:211_2_1: gaṅgānadīvāikāsame 'saṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe bhadrake mahākalpe yadā jyotipālo māṇavako
S04bsu018_u:211_2_2: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyati krakutsando nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ
S04bsu018_u:211_2_3: tasmin samaye āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā daśasu dikṣu sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsu
S04bsu018_u:211_2_4: lokadhātuṣu pravartitadhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:211_3_0: ye mayā dagdhasantānā akuśalamūlasamādhānāḥ [KpSū_232] saptadhanavirahitāḥ sarvaiḥ
S04bsu018_u:211_3_2: yāvatkumārge vihanyantaḥ mayā saṅkaṭaprāptāḥ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04bsu018_u:211_4: mayā te sattvāḥ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ niveśitāḥ syurmayā ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatkuśalamūlabījamanuttare nirvāṇe prakṣiptaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:211_6: prajñāpuṇyasaṃbhāre ca niyojitāḥ syustiṣṭhanto yāpayantasteṣu ca buddhakṣetresu buddheṣu bhagavatasūpanītāḥ syuryadānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākaraṇapratilabdhā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:211_7_0: samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhāśca syurbhūmyavakrāntāśca syurmayā ca te sattvā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhā
S04bsu018_u:211_7_1: praṇidhānaṃ samādāpitāḥ śikṣāpitāśca syuryathārūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ
S04bsu018_u:211_7_2: pratigṛhṇeyuste ca tān ahaṃ tasmin samaye 'nupraviṣṭe bhadrakalpe krakutsande jinasūrya
S04bsu018_u:211_7_3: udgate daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:211_7_4: [KpSū_233] tiṣṭhato yāpayataḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:211_12_0: ye ca tasmin samaye dagdhasantānāḥ sattvā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dṛṣṭimārgasaṃpratipannā
S04bsu018_u:211_14: astāṃgate jinasūrye tadāhamanābhogena buddhakāryaṃ kuryāṃ yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu sattvānniyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:211_15: tasmiṃśca kāle 'tikrānte devalokaṃ gatvā devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:211_19_0: āryasaptadhanavirahitā [KpSū_234] amātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā akṛtyakarā
S04bsu018_u:211_19_2: sucariteṣu abhiyuktāstriṣu duścariteṣu anabhiyuktā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu abhiyuktā
S04bsu018_u:211_20_3: muṣṭasmṛtayaḥ kuśalajugupsakā duḥprajñā alpaśrutā duḥśīlāḥ kuhakā matsariṇaḥ parasparābhāṣakā
S04bsu018_u:211_20_5: garbhāśayasmṛtipraṇaṣṭā vividharogapahatāḥ kliṣṭā durvarṇā avahoṭimakā ahrīkā anapatrāpyāḥ
S04bsu018_u:211_20_6: parasparabhītā [KpSū_235] ekapūrvabhaktena bahukāyavācā manasā duścaritaṃ samācaranti
S04bsu018_u:211_21_1: vihiṃsācittāḥ kaluṣacittā rukṣacittāḥ kṣubhitacittā adāntacittā ahitacittā uddhatacittā
S04bsu018_u:211_21_3: dharmavivarjitacittā avipakvacittā dharmeṣu sārambhacittā akuśala utpāditacittāḥ
S04bsu018_u:211_23_0: narakaśabdastiryagyoniśabdo yamalokaśabdo vyādhiśabdo jarāśabdo maraṇaśabdo vadhakaśabdo
S04bsu018_u:211_23_3: kāmamithyācāraśabdo mṛṣāvādaśabda utpātaśabdaḥ paiśunyaśabdaḥ paruṣaśabdaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpaśabda
S04bsu018_u:211_25: evaṃrūpaiḥ parihīṇakuśalamūlaiḥ parihīṇakalyāṇamitrairduṣṭacittaiḥ sattvaistasmin kāle sahālokadhāturākīrṇā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:211_26_1: āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa virahitāstamastamaḥparāyaṇāḥ pragāḍhakarmapratyayena te sattvāstasmin
S04bsu018_u:211_27: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmapratyayena sahabuddhakṣetraṃ hīnaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:211_34: tathārūpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śaṣpauṣadhitṛṇavṛkṣā patrapuṣpaphalā dhānyarasāḥ sattvānāmannapānabhogaparibhogaviṣamāḥ [KpSū_238] kaluṣaparuṣarukṣaviṣasaṃsṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu018_u:211_35: te sattvāḥ paribhaktyā bhūyasyā mātrayā rukṣā duṣṭāścaṇḍā raudrāḥ paruṣāḥ kadaryāḥ paribhāṣakā anyonyāgauravā bhītena cittenāghātacittā
S04bsu018_u:212_0: tatkālamahaṃ tuṣitabhavanādavatīrya viśiṣṭe cakravartikulavaṃśe īśvare rājakule agramahiṣyāḥ kukṣau vaineyasattvakuśalamūlaparipācanārthaṃ garbhavāsamupagṛhṇīyāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:212_1: sarvāvantaṃ tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre udāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:212_2: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyanto 'haṃ heṣṭhaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_3: ye ca tasmin samaye sattvā sahe buddhakṣetre pratyājātā narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā devamanuṣye [KpSū_239] vā te sarve tamavabhāsaṃ paśyeyuḥ spṛśeyuḥ saṃjāneyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:212_4: teṣāṃ saṃsāre vimṛśatāṃ duḥkhodvignānāṃ nirvāṇābhilāṣamantaśaḥ kleśaśamacittānyutpādayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:212_6: yadāhaṃ sarvadharmanayavipaścitaṃ sarvasamādhinirdeśamekadharmamukhamaparāntakalpanirdeśena samāhitacitto daśamāsāṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nivaseyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:212_7: yāvāṃścāhaṃ prāpte buddhatve sattvāṃ parikhinnāṃ saṃsāre parimocayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_8: te sattvā mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ daśamāsāṃ maṇigarbhasaṃdarśanasamāhitacittaṃ paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:212_9: nirgate ca daśamāse sarvapuṇyasaṃcayenāhaṃ samādhinā sarvāvantaṃ sahabuddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:212_10: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ heṣṭimena ca yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantaṃ ṣaḍvikāreṇa cālayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_11: ye ca tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ pratyājātā narakeṣu vā yāvan manuṣyeṣu vā tān prabodhayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_13: punarapi ca sarvāvantaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramudāreṇāvabhāsena aphureyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:212_14: [KpSū_240] tadāpi tasmin samaye sarvān sahe buddhakṣetre sattvān saṃcodayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:212_17: yadā cāhaṃ caraṇatalena dharaṇīṃ spṛśeyaṃ sarvāvatī tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ prakaṃpayeyaṃ kṣobhayeyaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantena;
S04bsu018_u:212_18: tadāhaṃ tasmin samaye sattvān jalaniśritāṃ kṣitiniśritāṃ khaniśritāṃ caturyoniparyāpannāṃ pañcagatisaṃniśritāṃ tān sarvān ahaṃ pratibodhayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:212_21_0: sahajātamātrasya ca me yāvadeva tasmin sahe buddhakṣetre mahābrahmāṇo vā mārā vā
S04bsu018_u:212_21_1: śakrā vā candrā vā sūryā vā lokapālā vā mahānāgarājā vāsurendrā vā aupapādukā vā
S04bsu018_u:212_21_2: maharddhikā vā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā vā sarve mama pūjākarmaṇe upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:212_23: sarvapuṇyasamuccayenāhaṃ samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yattatsarvāvatī sā parṣattribhiryānaiḥ [KpSū_241] prasādaṃ pratilaṃbhayet /
S04bsu018_u:212_24: ye ca tatra parṣadi sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā bhaveyuste caramabhavikā mama vaineyā bhavikā;
S04bsu018_u:212_25: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā bhaveyuste vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:212_26: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuste sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheran,
S04bsu018_u:212_27: tena ca samādhinā tisrā bhūmīḥ samatikrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:212_28: yadahaṃ snāpanamiccheyaṃ ye ca tatra mahānāgarājāno viśiṣṭatarā bhaveyuḥ te māṃ snāpayeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:212_29: ye ca sattvā māṃ snāpayamānaṃ paśyeyuste sarve tribhiryānairevaṃrūpān guṇānadhigaccheyuḥ yathā proktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_30_0: ye ca māṃ sattvā rathamabhirohantaṃ samanupaśyeyurvistareṇa kumārakrīḍavividhaśilpasthānakarmasthānāsanāni
S04bsu018_u:212_32: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ sattvānāṃ sarvapuṇyasamuccayena [KpSū_242] samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yathā te sattvāstribhiryānaistīvracchandā udyujyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:212_33: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikāste sarve vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:212_34: yaiśca mahāyānabījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet te sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā tisro bhūmiratikrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:212_35: svayaṃ cāhaṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlavajrāsane prajñapayeyaṃ niṣīdeyaṃ paryaṅkamābadhvā ṛjukena kāyena;
S04bsu018_u:212_41: yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantena sarve devā ye sahe buddhakṣetre paryāpannāsta upasaṃkrāmeyurmama ca pūjāṃ kurvāṇāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:212_43: yaiśca tatra śrāvakayāne bījamavaruptaṃ syātteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan kleśavyupaśamāya santāne bhaveyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:212_49: ye ca tatra cāturdvīpikāyāmanyatīrthikā lūhatapo vrataduṣkaracārikāṃ caranti,
S04bsu018_u:212_50: teṣāṃ cāmānuṣā ārocayeyuḥ / “na yūyaṃ duṣkarakārakā, yathāsmin pradeśe caramabhaviko bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati,
S04bsu018_u:212_51: tathārūpaṃ dhyāyati hṛdaye manaskāraṃ badhnāti praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāraḥ praśrabdhavāksaṃskāraḥ praśāntāścāsya praśvāsāśvāsāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:212_53: sā duṣkaracaryā maharddhikā sā mahāphalā mahāvistārā,
S04bsu018_u:212_56: te ca tāṃ duṣkaracaryāmutsṛjya mama duṣkaracaryāṃ dṛṣṭvā yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānasantānabījāṅkuraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:212_57_0: yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ / ye manuṣyarājā [KpSū_244] vā bhaṭṭā vā naigamajānapadā gṛhasthapravrajitā
S04bsu018_u:212_59: sa tasya paścimako mātṛgrāmapratilābho bhaved iti,
S04bsu018_u:212_61: ye mṛgapakṣiṇo duṣkaraṃ caramāṇaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyussa teṣāṃ paścimakastiryagyonipratilābho bhaved iti;
S04bsu018_u:212_62: yaiśca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ śrāvakayāne bījānyavaropitāni tenaikajātipratibaddhā mama caiva vaineyā bhaveyurye pratyekabuddhayānā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_64: evaṃ pretā vaktavyāstāvacciraṃ cāhamevaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ ekaparyaṅkena yāvad bahusattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi duṣkaracaryāyāṃ sākṣibhūtā bhaveyuḥ āścaryaprāptāśca,
S04bsu018_u:212_66_0: tathārūpāmahaṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ yathā na pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvasaṃkhyātena anyatīrthikena
S04bsu018_u:212_66_1: vā śrāvakayānikena vā pratyekabuddhayānikena vā anuttaramahāyānikena vā evaṃ duṣkaracaryācīrṇapūrvaḥ
S04bsu018_u:212_67: na ca punaḥ paścāt kaścit sattvasaṃkhyātaścaret anyatīrthikā vā evaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ [KpSū_245] śaktāṃścarantu yathāhaṃ careyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_68: aprāptāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadāhaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kuryāṃ sabalakāyaṃ māraṃ parājayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:212_72: tathā dvitīyasya tathā tṛtīyasya tathā caturthasya dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:212_75: darśayeyaṃ, tasya ca santāne samyagdṛṣṭiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:212_78: vajramayāṃśca sattvānāṃ santāne kleśaparvatāṃ jñānavajreṇa bhindyāṃ triyānena vyavasthānena dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_79: ekasattvasyārthāyāhaṃ bahuyojanaśatāni padbhyāṃ gaccheyaṃ dharmadeśanārthamabhayapade pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:212_81: durbalasya muṣṭasmṛteḥ vibhrāntacittasya mukharapragalbhacittasya praduṣṭacittasya duḥprajñacittasya bahukleśākulacittasya mātṛgrāmasya mama śāsane pravrajyopasaṃpadbhavet /
S04bsu018_u:212_83: bahujanaprabhūtaṃ me śāsanaṃ bhavet devānāṃ satyadarśanaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ nāgānāmasurāṇāmāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upoṣadhavāsaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:213_0: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan ye sattvā mama praduṣṭacittā vadhakacittāḥ śastreṇa vāgninā vā śaktyā va vividhena vā praharaṇenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:213_4: yathā bodhiprāptasya me sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ vaireṇa vadhakopakaraṇaprayogena paruṣavacanavividhapraharaṇaviṣānnapānasaṃsṛṣṭenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ rudhiraṃ ca me utpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:213_5: teṣāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ śīlaśrutasamādhimahākaruṇābhāvitena brahmasvaraghoṣadundubhinarditena svareṇa tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:213_6: yatteṣāṃ cittāni prasādayeyaṃ kuśale ca niyojayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:213_8: āpatyāṃ saṃvaramāpadyeyuḥ, [KpSū_247] na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ svarge mokṣaphale vairāgye āśravakṣaye vā āvaraṇakarma bhaved iti,
S04bsu018_u:214_0_0: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan yāvanto mama romakūpā bhaveyustāvanto divasaṃ
S04bsu018_u:214_1: aśūnyeṣu ca preṣayeyaṃ, pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:214_2: ye cāpi teṣu buddhakṣetreṣvānantaryakārakāḥ sattvā bhaveyuḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ āryāpavādakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānakāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:214_3_0: ye 'pi tatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ
S04bsu018_u:214_3_1: śikṣāyāṃ kalmāṣakāriṇaḥ chidracāriṇaḥ mūlāpattimāpannāḥ dagdhasantānāḥ śubhamārgapraṇaṣṭāḥ
S04bsu018_u:214_4: tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrādeko buddhavigraha ekadivase [KpSū_248] sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet /
S04bsu018_u:214_5: ye sattvā maheśvarabhaktikāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maheśvararūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:214_6: sahe ca buddhakṣetre mama varṇaṃ bhāṣayeyustatra ca sattvānāṃ praṇidhānamudyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:214_7: te ca sattvā mama varṇaṃ śrutvā mamaiva buddhakṣetre praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,
S04bsu018_u:214_8: upapattiṃ cākāṅkṣeyuḥ / yādyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ na tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmaṃ na deśayeyaṃ cittaṃ na saṃprasādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:214_10: yadi me sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatīṣūpapadyeyurna ca mama buddhakṣetre manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:214_11: sarve mama dharmā saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā ca me pratibhāyeyurmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:214_12: ye sattvā nārāyaṇabhaktikā yāvatte sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatiṃ prapateyustanmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:215_0: bodhiprāptasya ca me sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvat kumārge vihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran,
S04bsu018_u:215_1: idaṃ teṣāṃ nimittaṃ pāṃśuvarṇāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:215_2: [KpSū_249] piśācamukhī muṣṭasmṛtayo durgandhā duḥśīlā alpāyuṣkā vividharogopahatā vividhapariṣkāraparihīṇāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti;
S04bsu018_u:215_3: teṣām sattvānāmarthe 'haṃ yāvattasmin samaye sahe lokadhātau cāturdvīpikā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:215_4: sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāyāṃ saṃtuṣitabhavanāvataraṇaṃ māturgarbhe cāhaṃ jātumupadarśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:216_1: ye sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikāste śrāvakayānakathāpiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:216_2: ye sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhavaineyāste pratyekabuddhayānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvā anuttaramahāyānikāste 'nuttaramahāyānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:216_3: ye sattvāḥ saṃbhāravirahitāste dānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitāḥ sukhasvargābhilāṣināste śīlakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:216_9: ye ca sattvā mahāyānikauddhatyavyākulacittopagatāste ānāpānasmṛtivyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:216_10: ye duḥprajñā vā pradīpapratītyasamutpādavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:216_13: vitarkasamudācāropahatā animittavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitāmājānīyurapraṇihitāpariśuddhopahatā apraṇihitavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:216_92_0: ye bodhisattvā aśaṭhā amāyāvino ṛjukā ṛjuka jātīyāśca teṣāṃ caturaśītidharmamukhasahasrāṇi
S04bsu018_u:216_92_2: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ekapadavyāhāreṇa ime guṇāḥ santāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:216_130: apramāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmekapadavyāhāreṇāhaṃ mahatā kuśalaviśodhanasaṃnicayena saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:217_0_0: ye 'pi te bhadanta bhagavan sattvā bhaveyuranyeṣu lokadhātuṣvānantaryakārakā yāvanmūlāpattisāparādhikā
S04bsu018_u:217_0_1: dagdhasantānāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā anuttaramahāyānikā vā praṇidhānavaśena
S04bsu018_u:217_1: akuśalamūlasamavadhānā rukṣāḥ pāpecchāḥ [KpSū_260] krūrakhaṭuṅkasantānā viparītabuddhaya āgṛhītasantānāḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ caturaśītiścittarutasahasrāṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:217_2: yāvat kuśīdacittānāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:217_3: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ vistareṇa ṣaṭpāramitādharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:217_4: dānapāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:217_5: ye ca punastatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:217_14: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvapañcadoṣā bhaveyustāṃ pañcadoṣavairamaṇyopāsakasaṃvare vyavasthāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:217_15: ye sattvā anabhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tāṃścāhaṃ rātriṃdivasamaṣṭāṅge śīle pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:217_18: ye sattvāḥ kuśalān dharmān paryeṣṭukāmāstānapyahaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu samādāpya sakale brahmacaryavāse pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:217_19: evaṃrūpānāmānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvad āgṛhītasantānānāṃ sattvānāmarthe cāhaṃ bahuvividhanānārthapadavyañjanaprātihāryairdharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:217_21: kuśale kṣeme śive śānte 'bhayapure nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:217_22: evamahaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:217_23: ye ca vādārthino bhaveyusteṣāṃ ahaṃ dharmavādaśāstraṃ prakāśayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:217_24: ye ca nābhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu teṣāṃ cāhaṃ [KpSū_262] vaiyāvṛtyakarmāṇi nirdiśeyam,
S04bsu018_u:218_0: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu pūjautsukyamāpadyeyū ratnairyāvadvādyairantaśa ekabuddhanāmaikavandanā ekapradakṣinīkaraṇena ekāñjalikarmaṇā ekapuṣpeṇa pūjāṃ kurvīran,
S04bsu018_u:218_2: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śāsane 'ntaśa ekaśikṣāpadamapi gṛhṇīyuryathoktaṃ samādāya varteyuryāvaccatuṣpadagāthāṃ paryavāpnuyurvācayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:218_3: pareṣāṃ ca deśayeyuḥ, ye 'pi śṛṇuyuścittaṃ [KpSū_263] vā prasādayeyurdharmabhāṇakasya vā pūjāṃ kuryurantaśa ekapuṣpeṇāpi ekavandanenāpi,
S04bsu018_u:218_5_0: yāvat saddharme 'ntarhite saddharmolkāyāṃ nirvāpitāyāṃ dharmadhvaje patite te ca
S04bsu018_u:218_5_1: mama janmaśarīramavatareyuryāvat kāñcanacakre tiṣṭheyuryasmin kāle sahe buddhakṣetre
S04bsu018_u:218_5_2: ratnadurbhikṣaṃ bhavet tasmin samaye ketumatirnāma maṇivaiḍuryamayaṃ agninirbhāsaṃ
S04bsu018_u:218_6: tacca tato 'bhyudgamyorddhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavane sthitvā vividhāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣet,
S04bsu018_u:218_8_0: tataśca puṣpavarṣādvividhā śabdā niścareyustadyathā buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabda
S04bsu018_u:218_11: sarve ca rūpāvacarā devāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ [KpSū_265] svakasvakāni pūrvakṛtāni kuśalamūlānyanusmareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:218_12: sarvakuśaleṣu dharmeṣu mahāsattvā ajugupsanīyāste tato 'vatareyuḥ sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu niyojayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:218_13: evameva sarve kāmāvacarā devāḥ śṛṇuyusteṣāṃ ca tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanaratikrīḍāsaumanasyābhiratāṃścittacaitasikāṃ sarvān praśrambhayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:218_15: te ca devalokādavatīrya sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:218_16: te ca puṣpā ākāśe vividhā ratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:218_18: sarve sahe buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṃ ratnavṛṣṭiṃ abhipravarṣeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:218_19: sarve ca sahe buddhakṣetre kalikalahavivādadurbhikṣarogaparacakraparuṣavāgrukṣaviṣaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ praśameyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:218_20: kṣemārogyā akalahābandhanavigrahāḥ subhikṣāḥ sarve sahe buddhakṣetre saṃsthiheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:218_21_0: [KpSū_266] yāni ca sattvāni tāni ratnāni paśyeyuḥ spṛśyeyuḥ upabhogakarma vā kurvīran
S04bsu018_u:218_21_1: te sarve tribhiryānairavaivartyā bhaveyuste ca punaradho yāvat kāñcanacakre sthiheyurevameva
S04bsu018_u:218_21_2: bhadanta bhagavan śastrāntarakalpakāle samaye punasta indranīlamaṇiratnāḥ saṃsthiheyurūrdhvaṃ
S04bsu018_u:218_23: tadyathā māndāravamahāmāndāravapāriyātrā yāvadevānantaprabhāstasmācca puṣpavarṣādvividhā manojñāḥ śabdā niścareyustadyathā buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdo yāvatpūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:218_24: te punaḥ śarīrā adho yāvat kāñcanacakre sthiheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:218_25: evaṃ tasmiṃ samaye durbhikṣāntarakalpakāle punaste śarīrā ūrdhvamudgaccheyuryāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiryāvat pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:218_27: yathā bhadrake mahākalpe mama parinirvṛtasya śarīrāstṛkāryaṃ kuryuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:218_29: evaṃ pañcabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairmahākalpe vartamānairmama śarīrāḥ sattvān vineyustribhiryānairavaivartikāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:218_30_2: mayā bodhisattvabhūtenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau caryāṃ caratā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:218_31: mayā ca ṣaṭpāramitāsu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ syuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:219_0: bodhiprāptaścāhamapi sattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:219_1_0: ye ca punaḥ parinirvṛtasya śarīravikurvaṇenāpi sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04bsu018_u:219_1_2: dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
S04bsu018_u:219_1_3: mama varṇaṃ bhāṣyayeyuḥ śrāvayeyurghoṣaṃ codīrayeyu”ryacciraṃ bhadrako nāma kalpo
S04bsu018_u:219_2: tasmiṃśca bhadrake mahākalpe 'nupraviṣṭe caturthe jinabhāskara evaṃnāmā tathāgato babhūva,
S04bsu018_u:219_3: yena vayaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā [KpSū_268] niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:219_4: dagdhasantānā akuśalasamavadhānagatā ānantaryakārakā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭikāstena vayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:219_5: yena vayametarhi sarvajñāḥ sarvākāradhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:219_6: nirvarte tu gaticakre bahusattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrān svarge mokṣaphale ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ syuḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:219_7: ye ca sattvā bodhyarthikāsteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśe mama varṇakīrtiyaśaśca śṛṇuyuste taṃ tathāgataṃ pṛccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:219_8_0: “kamarthavaśaṃ sampaśyamānaḥ sa bhagavāṃstathāgata evaṃ pañcakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāne
S04bsu018_u:219_8_1: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?” te ca tathāgatāsteṣāṃ bodhyarthikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S04bsu018_u:219_8_2: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā imaṃ mama mahākaruṇāsamanvāgataṃ prathamacittotpādaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ
S04bsu018_u:219_8_3: praṇidhānapūrvayogaṃ ca bhāṣeyuste ca bodhyarthikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā āścaryaprāptā
S04bsu018_u:219_9_0: evaṃrūpe tīvrapañcakaṣāye kleśakaṣāye kaliyuge buddhakṣetre ānantaryakārakāṃ yāvadakuśalasamavadhānāṃ
S04bsu018_u:219_9_1: vaineyāṃ [KpSū_269] pratigṛhṇīyuste ca buddhā bhagavantastān mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatāṃ
S04bsu018_u:219_9_2: bodhyarthikāṃ kulaputrān vā kuladuhitṝn vā evaṃrūpeṇa vyākareṇana vyākuryuryathābhiprāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:219_9_3: taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā tīvrapañcakaṣāye kleśe kaliyuge praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:219_10: apare buddhā bhagavanto mama śarīravivartanebhiḥ pūrvayogaiḥ sattvānāṃ bodhyarthikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā vistareṇa bhāṣayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:219_12_0: parinirvṛtasya śarīrebhirevaṃ ciramevaṃrūpaṇāṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya evaṃrūpāṇi
S04bsu018_u:219_12_1: vividhāni prātihāryāṇi vividhā ca nānāprakārā vikurvaṇākṛtāstasya śarīravikurvaṇābhirvayaṃ
S04bsu018_u:219_13: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vayaṃ kuśalamūlasamavadhānān prathamacittotpādādidaṃ pāramitāsu codyogaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:220_0_0: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ
S04bsu018_u:220_0_1: sadevagandharvamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ imāṃ mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatāṃ pañcaśatāni praṇidhānāni
S04bsu018_u:220_1_0: sa evamāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā cāhamanāgate
S04bsu018_u:220_1_1: 'dhvani bhadarake kalpe tīvrakleṣe raṇakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāṇe 'ndhaloke 'nāyake
S04bsu018_u:220_2: yadi cāhaṃ śaktaḥ sakalamevaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ yathā ca me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:220_6: na ca punarahaṃ anena kuśalamulena pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prārthayāmi,
S04bsu018_u:220_14: śīlaṃ svargopapattaye śrutaṃ mahāprajñatāyai bhāvanā visaṃyogāya” /
S04bsu018_u:220_15: uktaṃ caitatpunarbhagavatā, [KpSū_271] “ṛdhyati āśayo 'bhiprāyaḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanā puṇyavataḥ sattvasya” /
S04bsu018_u:220_16: yacca mayā bhadanta bhagavan dānamayaṃ vā śīlamayaṃ vā śrutamayaṃ vā bhāvanāmayaṃ vā puṇyamārjitaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:220_17: yadi naivaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ pariṇāmayāmi;
S04bsu018_u:220_18: ye sattvāḥ pracaṇḍamaṇḍaghore 'vīcau narake duḥkhānyanubhavanti te cānena kuśalamūlena tato vyuttiṣṭhantu,
S04bsu018_u:220_21: agratve ca parinirvāyeyuḥ / yacca teṣāṃ sattvānāmaparikṣīṇakarmaphalaṃ syāttadahametarhi kālaṃ kṛtvāvicau mahānarake upapadyeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:220_23: ekaikaśca me kāyaḥ sumeruparvatarājapramāṇo mahān saṃbhavet;
S04bsu018_u:220_24: ekaikaśca me kāya [KpSū_272] evaṃrūpāḥ suduḥkhā vedanā jānīyādyathaitarhi eṣa ekaḥ śarīraḥ suduḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ saṃjānāti;
S04bsu018_u:220_25_0: ekaikaśca me ātmabhāvo buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ tīvrāṃ caṇḍāṃ kharāṃ nairayikāṃ
S04bsu018_u:220_25_1: kāraṇāṃ anubhaveyurye caitarhi buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:220_25_2: lokadhātuṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvadavīciparāyaṇāni karmāṇi samudānītāni syuryacca
S04bsu018_u:220_28: sarve ca te sattvā buddhā bhagavanta ārāgayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:220_29: saṃsārāccottārayeyuḥ, nirvāṇanagaraṃ praveśayeyuḥ; tadāhametaccireṇa narakāt parimucyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:220_30: yāvaddaśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvaistathārūpaṃ karmasamutthāpitaṃ ākṣiptaṃ niyatavedanīyaṃ pratāpane narake upapadyitavyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:220_31: yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ / evaṃ [KpSū_273] santāpane mahāraurave saṅghāte kālasūtre saṃjīvane,
S04bsu018_u:220_33: evaṃ yamaloke vaktavyaḥ, evaṃ yakṣadāridre vaktavyaṃ, evaṃ kumbhāṇḍapiśācāsuragaruḍā vācyāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:220_34: yadā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvairevaṃrūpaṃ karmākṣiptaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:220_35: ye ca manuṣyāndhabadhirā ajihvākā ahastakā apādakāḥ smṛtipramuṣṭacittairutpādyitavyaṃ aśucibhakṣayitavyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:220_36: peyālaṃ yathā pūrvoktaṃ / punarevamahamavīcau mahānarake upapadyeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:220_37: yāvacciraṃ saṃsāre dhātvāyatanaskandhaṃ pratigṛhṇīyustāvacciramahaṃ evaṃrūpāṃ vividhe narakatiryakpreteṣu yakṣāsurarākṣaseṣu yāvan manuṣyaduḥkhopapattibhirevaṃ duḥkhamanubhaveyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:220_38: yathā pūrvoktaṃ; yadi me evaṃrūpā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā na paripūryeta /
S04bsu018_u:221_0: atha khalu ca punarme evaṃrūpānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā paripūryeta yāvat pūrvoktaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:221_2: ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti te mama buddhā bhagavantaḥ [KpSū_274] sākṣībhūtā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:221_3: jñānabhūtā bhaviṣyanti / vyākarotu me bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:221_4: bhadrake kalpe bhaveyamahaṃ viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān;
S04bsu018_u:221_5: śakto 'hamevaṃrūpaṃ buddhakāryamabhiniṣpādayituṃ yā me pratijñā kṛtāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:222_0: atha tāvadeva sarvāvatī parṣā sadevagandharvamānuṣāsuraśca lokaḥ kṣitigaganasthitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:222_1: sthāpayitvā tathāgataṃ te sarve 'śrūṇi pravartayamānāḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvāhuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:222_2: “sādhu sādhu mahākāruṇika, gaṃbhīrā te smṛtirgaṃbhīreṣu sattveṣu mahākaruṇotpannā,
S04bsu018_u:222_4: tadādhyāśayena sarvasattvā mahākaruṇayā saṃcchāditāya bhūyasānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ pratigṛhītā;
S04bsu018_u:222_5: etena praṇidhānena jñāyate yathā tvaṃ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvānāṃ bhaiṣajyabhūtastrāṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:222_6: sattvānāṃ duḥkhapramocanārthaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā te āśā paripūryatu vyākarotu ca bhagavānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:223_1: svayaṃ ca rājā amṛtaśuddhaḥ prarudamāno brāhmaṇasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvāha /
S04bsu018_u:224_1: sattveṣu tvaṃ dayāpannaḥ asmākaṃ tvaṃ nidarśakaḥ” //
S04bsu018_u:231_0: “evaṃ dattaṃ tvayā dānaṃ sattvebhyo mahatī kṛpā /
S04bsu018_u:237_1: yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ tvamāpnoṣi sattva mocayi duḥkhitān” //
S04bsu018_u:254_1: mocesi tvaṃ trayaṃ lokyaṃ prabaddhaṃ bhavabandhanaiḥ” //
S04bsu018_u:261_0: balasandarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prarudamāno brāhmaṇasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvāñjaliṃ pragṛhītavānāha -
S04bsu018_u:262_1: kṛpālu prajvālitā te sattvān mocesi duḥkhitān” //
S04bsu018_u:263_0: sarvāvatī ca kulaputra sā parṣā sadevagandharvamāṇuṣā brāhmaṇasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvā kṛtāñjaliḥ sthitvā vicitrābhiranvayapadayuktābhirgāthābhisabhistavitvā tasthau /
S04bsu018_u:264_1: yadā ca kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati /
S04bsu018_u:264_2_0: atha tāvadeva mahāpṛthivicālaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ samantācca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu
S04bsu018_u:264_2_1: buddhakṣetreṣu pṛthivī calati pracalati saṃpracalati kṣubhati prakṣubhati saṃprakṣubhati
S04bsu018_u:264_2_2: vedhati pravedhati saṃpravedhati raṇati praraṇati saṃpraraṇati /
S04bsu018_u:264_4: vividhā ca puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitāstadyathā māndāravamahāmāndāravaṃ yāvadanantaprabhā evaṃrūpā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitavatī /
S04bsu018_u:264_5_0: yaddaśasu diśāsu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti
S04bsu018_u:264_5_1: dhriyanti yāpayanti pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu apariśuddheṣu vā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
S04bsu018_u:264_6_0: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya
S04bsu018_u:264_6_1: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ dṛṣṭvā punaste bodhisattvāstāṃ buddhāṃ
S04bsu018_u:264_7: “ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya [KpSū_285] loke prādurbhāvāya,
S04bsu018_u:265_0_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pūrvasyāṃ diśi ito buddhakṣetrādekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni
S04bsu018_u:265_0_1: buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya ratnavicayā nāma lokadhātustatra ratnavicaye buddhakṣetre
S04bsu018_u:265_0_2: ratnacandro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavāṃstiṣṭhati yāpayati aprameyebhyo
S04bsu018_u:265_0_3: 'saṃkhyeyebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ puraskṛtaḥ parivṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma yaduta buddhakṣetre
S04bsu018_u:265_2_0: tau dvau bodhisattvau yena ratnacandrastathāgatastenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ratnacandraṃ
S04bsu018_u:265_2_1: tathāgatametadavocatāṃ - “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya
S04bsu018_u:265_4: ratnacandrastathāgata āha - “asti kulaputra paścimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrādekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamān buddhakṣetrānatikramya tatra santīraṇo nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:265_5_0: tatra santīraṇe buddhakṣetre [KpSū_286] ratnagarbhastathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavāṃstiṣṭhati
S04bsu018_u:265_6_0: ekaścātra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenaivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mahākaruṇāparibhāvitā
S04bsu018_u:265_6_1: vāgbhāṣitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākaraṇanirdeśaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathārūpā
S04bsu018_u:265_6_2: praṇidhānā udbhāṣitā yadbahubhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhirbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:265_8_0: sarvataśca sa eko mahākaruṇāsamanvāgato mahābodhisattvo yaḥ sarvāvatīṃ tāṃ parṣadamabhibhūya
S04bsu018_u:265_8_1: kliṣṭaṃ pañcakaṣāyaṃ kleśaraṇikaliyugaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarva ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā
S04bsu018_u:265_9_0: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣat sadevagandharvamāṇuṣāsuraśca lokastaṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamapahāya
S04bsu018_u:265_9_1: tasya mahākāruṇikasya paścimakasya pūjāyodyuktāḥ pañcamaṇḍalena ca vanditvā prāñjalībhūtāḥ
S04bsu018_u:265_10: sa ca [KpSū_287] mahāsattvastasya bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣaṇṇo vyākaraṇaṃ śṛṇvānaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:265_11_0: yadā ca sa mahāsattvastasya bhagavataḥ purato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptavāṃstadā
S04bsu018_u:265_11_1: sa bhagavāṃstathārūpaṃ smitaṃ prādurakārṣidyathā daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā
S04bsu018_u:265_12_0: sarvatra ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prabodhanārthaṃ mahākaruṇābodhisattvapraṇidhānacaryānidarśanārthaṃ
S04bsu018_u:265_12_1: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamebhyo digbhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ
S04bsu018_u:265_12_3: bhāṣaṇārthaṃ tena tathāgatena evaṃrūpāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśitāni” /
S04bsu018_u:266_0: tau ca kulaputra dvau bodhisattvau taṃ ratnacandraṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchate sma /
S04bsu018_u:266_1: kiyaccirotpāditaṃ bhadanta bhagavāṃstena mahākāruṇikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhicittaṃ?;
S04bsu018_u:266_3: yena pañcakaṣāye loke tīvrakleśaraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne kālaḥ [KpSū_288] parigṛhīta ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dagdhasantānāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ?” /
S04bsu018_u:266_4: ratnacandrastathāgata āha - “sāṃprataṃ kulaputra tena mahākāruṇikena prathamacittamutpāditaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:266_5: gacchata kulaputra yūyaṃ tat santīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ tasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu018_u:266_7: taṃ ca mahākāruṇikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ madvacanān pṛcchatha;
S04bsu018_u:266_10: sādhukāraścānupradatta / evaṃ ca prathamacittotpādena tvaṃ satpuruṣa mahākāruṇikavyāhāreṇa daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetrāṇi śabdenāpūritāni,
S04bsu018_u:266_11: tena tvayā sarvatra mahākāruṇika nāma pratilabdhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:266_12: tena tvaṃ satpuruṣa sādhu bhūyaḥ paścimakānāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa praṇidhānanetrīdhvajamucchrayaṇaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:266_13: tena tvaṃ satpuruṣa [KpSū_289] bhūyo buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān anāgatānasaṃkhyeyān kalpān buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān daśadiśi lokadhātuṣu yaśaḥkīrtiśabdenāpūraya /
S04bsu018_u:266_14: yena tvayā bahvasaṃkhyeyasattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītāni,
S04bsu018_u:266_18_0: ye tvayā bodhau samādāpitāḥ sarve te paścād yāvad buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsaṃkhyeyakalpairdaśasu
S04bsu018_u:266_18_1: dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhatvaṃ prāpya dharmacakraṃ
S04bsu018_u:266_19: anena tṛtīyena kāraṇena te sādhu satpuruṣa” /
S04bsu018_u:267_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dvānavatibodhisattvakoṭya ekakaṇṭhena vadanti /
S04bsu018_u:267_1: “vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan santīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchemaḥ tasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S04bsu018_u:267_5: sa ca kulaputra ratnacandrastathāgata āha - “gacchata kulaputrā yasyaitarhi kālaṃ manyadhve,
S04bsu018_u:267_6: tatra ca ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt samādhānamukhanirdeśaṃ caryāvaiśāradyadharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyadhve” /
S04bsu018_u:268_0_0: atha tau dvau kulaputrau ratnaketuścandraketuśca ratnacandrasya tathāgatasya sakāśāccandrarocavimalaṃ
S04bsu018_u:268_0_1: puṣpaṃ gṛhītvā sārdhaṃ dvānavatibhirbodhisattvakoṭībhī ratnavicayāyāṃ lokadhātau
S04bsu018_u:268_1: tadyathāpi nāma vidyutā evameva tato bodhisattvaparṣād ratnavicaye buddhakṣetre 'ntarhitau,
S04bsu018_u:268_2: iha saṃtīraṇe buddhakṣetre jambūvanodyāne ca sthitau /
S04bsu018_u:268_3_0: yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopasaṃkrāme taṃ upetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:268_3_1: pādau śirasā vanditvā vividhābhirbodhisattvavikurvaṇābhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ratnagarbhasya
S04bsu018_u:268_3_2: tathāgatasyāgrato brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāvatīṃ ca bodhisattvaparṣāṃ prāñjalībhūtāṃ
S04bsu018_u:268_4: “ayaṃ sa mahākaruṇāsamanvāgato yasya ratnacandreṇa tathāgateneme [KpSū_291] candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ preṣitāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:268_5_0: atha tau dvau bodhisattvau bhagavataḥ sakāśāt parivartitvā brāhmaṇasya puṣpaṃ upanāmayitvā
S04bsu018_u:268_5_1: etadavocatāṃ - “imaṃ te satpuruṣa ratnacandreṇa tathāgatena candrarocavimalaṃ puṣpaṃ
S04bsu018_u:268_7: yāvadyathoktaṃ pūrvaṃ / peyālaṃ, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyaḥ pūrvāyāṃ diśāyāṃ buddhakṣetrebhyo bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ santīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ saṃprāptāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:269_0_1: tatra niryūhavijṛṃbhito nāma lokadhātustatra niryūhavijṛṃbhite buddhakṣetre siṃhavijṛṃbhiteśvararājā
S04bsu018_u:269_0_2: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati yāpayati śuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
S04bsu018_u:269_2_0: eko jñānavajraketurnāma dvitīyaḥ [KpSū_292] siṃhavajraketustau dvau bodhisattvau
S04bsu018_u:269_2_1: siṃhavijṛṃbhiteśvararājaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchataḥ sma - “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ
S04bsu018_u:269_2_2: kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya mahataśca puṣpavarṣasya?”;
S04bsu018_u:269_3_0: yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ / peyālaṃ, yāvad aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyanyebhyo
S04bsu018_u:269_4: tena khalu punaḥ samayena paścimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrādekonanavatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrānatikramitvā tatra jayāvatirnāma buddhakṣetraṃ,
S04bsu018_u:269_7_0: tatra bhadravairocano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ siṃhavijṛṃbhitakāyaśca nāma dvitīyo
S04bsu018_u:269_7_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvastau dvau satpuruṣau jitendriyaviśālanetraṃ [KpSū_293] tathāgatametamarthaṃ
S04bsu018_u:270_0_1: tatra jamburnāma lokadhātustatra lokeśvararāja nāma tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān
S04bsu018_u:270_0_2: śuddhānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
S04bsu018_u:270_1: tatra dvau bodhisattvau, eko 'calasthāvaro nāma dvitīyaḥ prajñādharo nāma,
S04bsu018_u:270_2: tau lokeśvararājaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchataḥ sma - “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvasya,
S04bsu018_u:271_0_1: tatra vigatatamo 'ndhakārā nāma lokadhātustatra vigatabhayaparyutthānaghoṣo nāma
S04bsu018_u:271_2: tatra buddhakṣetre dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvāveko 'rajavairocano nāma dvitīyaḥ svargavairocano nāma,
S04bsu018_u:272_0_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayenopariṣṭhāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāddve śatasahasre buddhakṣetrāṇāmatikramitvā
S04bsu018_u:272_0_1: tatra saṃkusumitā nāma lokadhātustatra saṃkusumite buddhakṣetre prasphulitakusumavairocano
S04bsu018_u:272_0_2: nāma tathāgata yāvad buddho bhagavāṃstiṣṭhati yāpayati,
S04bsu018_u:272_2: tatra buddhakṣetre dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau prativasata,
S04bsu018_u:272_3: ekaḥ svaviṣayasaṃkopitaviṣayo nāma dvitīyo dhāraṇīsaṃpraharṣaṇavikopito nāma bodhisattvastau dvau satpuruṣau prasphulitakusumavairocanaṃ tathāgataṃ pṛṣṭavantau /
S04bsu018_u:272_4: “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya [KpSū_295] mahatyāśca puṣpavṛṣṭeḥ?” /
S04bsu018_u:272_5_1: dve śatasahasre buddhakṣetrāṇāmatikramya tatra saṃtīraṇo nāma lokadhātustatra ratnagarbho
S04bsu018_u:272_5_2: nāma tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavāṃstiṣṭhati dharmaṃ ca deśayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:272_7: ekaśca tatra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa evaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān,
S04bsu018_u:272_12: sa caiko mahākaruṇāsamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sarvāvatiṃ parṣadamabhibhūya kliṣṭaṃ pañcakaṣāyaṃ kleśāraṇikaliyugaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ [KpSū_296] parigṛhītaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:272_13: sarve cānantaryakārakā yāvad akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dagdhasaṃtānā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:272_14_0: sarvāvatīrca sā parṣā sadevagandharvāsuramānuṣaśca loko ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:272_14_1: pūjāmapahāya tasya mahākāruṇikasya pūjākarmaṇe udyuktāḥ pañcamaṇḍalena vanditvā prāñjalibhūtāḥ
S04bsu018_u:272_15: sa ca mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣaṇṇo vyākaraṇaṃ śṛṇvānaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:272_16: yadā ca tena mahāsattvena tasya bhagavataḥ purato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptaṃ tadā tena bhagavatā tathārūpaṃ smitaṃ prāviṣkṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:272_17: yadā daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā kaṃpitā yāvat puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā /
S04bsu018_u:272_18: sarvebhyaśca tebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prabodhanārthaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:272_20: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamebhyo lokadhātubhyo daśabhyo digbhyastatra buddhakṣetre sannipatanārthaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:272_22: dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣaṇārthaṃ tena tathāgatenaivaṃrūpāṇi [KpSū_297] prātihāryāṇi darśitāni” /
S04bsu018_u:273_0: tau ca kulaputra dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau svaviṣayasaṃkopitaviṣayaśca dhāraṇīsaṃpraharṣaṇavikopitaśca taṃ prasphulitakusumavairocanaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchataḥ sma /
S04bsu018_u:273_1: “kiyaccirotpāditaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃstena mahākāruṇikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhāya cittaṃ?;
S04bsu018_u:273_2: kiyacciraṃ vā sa mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:273_3: yena pañcakaṣāye loke tīvrakleśaraṇike kaliyuge vartamāne kālaḥ parigṛhīta ānantaryakārakā yāvad akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dagdhasaṃtānā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ?” /
S04bsu018_u:273_4: prasphulitakusumavairocanastathāgata āha - “saṃprati kulaputra tena mahākāruṇikena prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:273_5_0: gacchata kulaputrā yūyaṃ santīraṇaṃ lokadhātuṃ tasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu018_u:273_5_1: samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya taṃ ca samādhānamukhanirdeśaṃ
S04bsu018_u:273_6: taṃ ca mahākāruṇikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ mama vacanena pṛcchatha evaṃ ca vaktavyaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:273_7: prasphulitakusumavairocanastathāgatastvāṃ [KpSū_298] satpuruṣa pṛcchate candrarocavimalaṃ puṣpaṃ preṣitaṃ sādhukāraścānupradattaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:273_8: evaṃ ca tvayā satpuruṣa prathamacittotpādena mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaḥ śabdenāpūritāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:273_9: mahākaruṇāśabdaśca pratilabdhastena tvaṃ satpuruṣa sādhu bhūyaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:273_10: paścimakānāṃ mahākaruṇāmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa praṇidhānanetrīdhvajāmucchrepayasi;
S04bsu018_u:273_11_0: tena tvaṃ satpuruṣa sādhu bhūyastvaṃ satpuruṣa buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāgatā
S04bsu018_u:273_12: bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītā, avaivartikāśca sthāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:273_13: kaiścittatraiva bhagavataḥ sakāśe praṇidhānena buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītā vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ svakaruṇāraśmibhirācchāditā;
S04bsu018_u:273_14: [KpSū_299] ye tvayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā na ca vyākaraṇapratilabdhaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:273_16_1: buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhatvaṃ prāpya dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ
S04bsu018_u:273_17: etena tṛtīyena kāraṇena tvaṃ satpuruṣa sādhu” /
S04bsu018_u:274_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahubodhisattvakoṭya evamūcur[”]vayamapi bhadanta bhagavaṃstatra saṃtīraṇe buddhakṣetre gacchema,
S04bsu018_u:274_1: tasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S04bsu018_u:274_2: taṃ ca satpuruṣaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S04bsu018_u:274_5: sa ca kulaputra prasphulitakusumavairocanastathāgatastānāha - “gacchata yūyaṃ kulaputrā yasyaitarhi kālaṃ manyadhve /
S04bsu018_u:274_6: tatra yūyaṃ kulaputrā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt samavadhānamukhanirdeśacaryāvaiśāradyaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ [KpSū_300] śroṣyatha” /
S04bsu018_u:275_0_0: atha khalu kulaputra tau dvau bodhisattvau svaviṣayasaṃkopitaviṣayaśca dhāraṇīsaṃpraharṣaṇavikopitaśca
S04bsu018_u:275_0_2: gṛhītvā bahubodhisattvakoṭībhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃkusumitādbuddhakṣetrāt prasthāpitā iha
S04bsu018_u:275_0_3: buddhakṣetra ekakṣaṇena saṃprāptā jambūvanodyāne tasthuryena ca ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:275_1_0: tena khalu punaḥsamayena sarvāvantaṃ saṃtīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ evaṃrūpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ
S04bsu018_u:275_1_2: mahoragaistadyathāpi nāma ikṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā saṃpannaṃ
S04bsu018_u:275_2_0: evameva tasmin samaye saṃtīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇaṃ sphuṭaṃ mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrairyāvan
S04bsu018_u:275_2_1: mahoragaiste ca bodhisattvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā vividhasamādhānabalena
S04bsu018_u:275_2_2: bodhisattvavikurvaṇena pūjāṃ kṛtvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ brāhmaṇaṃ
S04bsu018_u:275_2_3: dṛṣṭvā sarvāvatyaśca tāḥ parṣāḥ prāñjalibhūtāḥ sthitvā varṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:275_3: teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmetadabhavat - [KpSū_301] “ayaṃ mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya prasphulitakusumavairocanena tathāgatena ime candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpā visarjitās[” /
S04bsu018_u:275_4: ]te ca bodhisattvā bhagavataḥ sakāśāt parāvṛtya tasya brāhmaṇasya te candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpā upanāmayitvāhuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:275_5: “ime te satpuruṣa prasphulitakusumavairocanena tathāgatena candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ preṣitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:275_8: yāni ca tāni puṣpāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravarṣitāni,
S04bsu018_u:275_11_0: yaddaśasu diśāsu teṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tenāvabhāsenāvabhāsitāstatra [KpSū_302]
S04bsu018_u:275_11_1: ye kecit sattvā manuṣyā vāmanuṣyāste sarve ye kecit sattvā yamasadṛśāḥ kecidudakasadṛśāḥ
S04bsu018_u:275_11_2: kecicchikharasadṛśāḥ kecidbrahmasadṛśāḥ kecicchakrasadṛśāḥ kecit puṣpasadṛśāḥ kecidgaruḍasadṛśāḥ
S04bsu018_u:275_11_3: kecit siṃhasadṛśāḥ kecit sūryasadṛśāḥ keciccandrasadṛśāḥ kecit tārakasadṛśāḥ kecidgṛdhrasadṛśāḥ
S04bsu018_u:275_12: yathārūpeṇa kuśalapakṣamanaskāreṇa te sattvāḥ sanniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya,
S04bsu018_u:275_14: tathārūpāśca kulaputra tatra sattvāḥ svakaṃ kāyaṃ paśyanti;
S04bsu018_u:275_15: tathārūpāśca te sattvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya kāyaṃ samanupaśyanti /
S04bsu018_u:275_16: samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ purataḥ sahasrapatre saptaratnamayapadmakeśare niṣaṇṇaṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu018_u:275_17: sarve cātra kulaputra sattvā niṣaṇṇā vā sthitvā vā kṣitau vā ambare vā ekaikaḥ sattvo ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamevaṃ paśyanti;
S04bsu018_u:276_1: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya sādhukāramanupradattaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:276_3: gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ sattvānāṃ tvaṃ asi kāruṇikahitakaraḥ prabhāsakaro loke saṃdṛśyase /
S04bsu018_u:276_4: tadyathāpi nāma brāhmaṇa saṃpannaṃ puṣpakṣetraṃ nānāvarṇaṃ nānāgandhaṃ nānāsparśaṃ nānāpatraṃ nānādaṇḍaṃ nānāmūlaṃ nānābhaiṣajyopakaraṇasthānaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:276_5: kecidatra puṣpā yojanaśataṃ pramāṇena varṇena gandhena tapanti virocanti,
S04bsu018_u:276_7: peyālaṃ, kecidatra puṣpā yāvat sarvacāturdvīpikāṃ lokadhātuṃ varṇena gandhena tapanti virocanti /
S04bsu018_u:276_8: ye ca tatra sattvāścakṣurhīnāste puṣpagandhaṃ ghrātvā cakṣuṃsi pratilabhante,
S04bsu018_u:276_11: ye ca tatra sattvāścaturuttararogaśatopadrutāste taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā sarvarogebhyaḥ parimucyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:276_12: ye ca tatra sattvā mattonmattaparamattāḥ suptacittā vikṣiptacittāḥ smṛtipraṇaṣṭāsteṣāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ gandhamāghrātvā [KpSū_304] sarve smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:276_13: evaṃ ca tatra madhye puṣpakṣetre puṇḍarīkamutpannaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:276_14: dṛḍhasāraṃ vajramayaṃ vaidūryadaṇḍaṃ śatakomalaṃ kanakapatramaśmagarbhakiṃśukaṃ lohitamuktikeśaraṃ,
S04bsu018_u:276_16: tacca puṇḍarīkaṃ daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāllokadhātuṃ varṇena gandhena sphuritvā virocate /
S04bsu018_u:276_17_0: ye ca brāhmaṇa teṣu daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā
S04bsu018_u:276_17_1: dhātuviruddhāḥ kāyā vyādhyupahatā aṅgavihīnā vā mattapramattonmattāḥ suptasmṛtipraṇaṣṭā
S04bsu018_u:276_17_2: vikṣiptacittāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya puṇḍarīkasyāvabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ ghrātvā sarvavyādhayaḥ
S04bsu018_u:276_18_0: ye ca tatra buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā mṛtā acirakālagatā avikṣiptaśarīrāsteṣāṃ kuṇapebhyaḥ
S04bsu018_u:276_18_1: tasya puṇḍarīkasya raśmayo nipatitvā gandhena vā spṛṣṭvā punaste kuṇapā jīvitendriyaṃ
S04bsu018_u:276_19: punaścottiṣṭheyurmitrasālohitāṃśca dṛṣṭvā te sarve udyānaṃ praviśya pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samaṅgībhūtā vihareyusye ca punastataścyaveyusteṣu dve brahmavihāra upapadyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:276_23: yathā sūryodgamanakāle pratyupasthite te puṣpā visaritā prasphulitā bhavanti tapanti virocanti kecidyojanaśatamuccatvena kecid yāvad yojanasahasramuccatvena,
S04bsu018_u:276_25: evameva satpuruṣāḥ tathāgato buddhasūryo loka udapādi /
S04bsu018_u:276_26: yathā te puṣpāḥ sūryoditasya asya raśmibhirvikasitā bhāsanti
S04bsu018_u:276_27: tapanti virocanti, vividharogopahatānāṃ sattvānāṃ rogopaśamo bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:276_28: evamevāhaṃ satpuruṣa loka utpannaḥ sattvāṃ kāruṇyaraśmibhiḥ chādayitvā vikasitvā bhūyaḥ sattvāṃstriṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu niyojayāmi,
S04bsu018_u:276_29_0: tvayāpyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveṣitāḥ
S04bsu018_u:276_29_1: pratiṣṭhāpitā mama ca sakāśamupanītāstaiśca sattvairmama sakāśe svakasvakāni praṇidhānāni
S04bsu018_u:276_31: tathā caivaṃ mayā vyākṛtāḥ / yaiḥ satpuruṣairmama sakāśāt pariśuddhā buddhakṣetrāḥ parigṛhītāstaiḥ śuddhāśayāḥ suvineyā avaruptakuśalamūlā vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ parigṛhītā,
S04bsu018_u:276_35: na ca te bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ karuṇārthāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paryeṣante /
S04bsu018_u:276_37: utsṛṣṭakṛpāste bodhisattvā; ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ parivarjitaṃ buddhakṣetramākāṅkṣanti,
S04bsu018_u:276_39_0: yeṣāmevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā vayaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavarjitā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatairmātṛgrāmairvivarjite
S04bsu018_u:276_39_2: bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaparivarjitāṃ śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:276_41: bahūni kalpāni śūddhāśayānāṃ suvinītānāṃ kuśalamūlasamavadhānagatānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:277_1: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārayitvā pañcabhiraṅgulībhirnānāvarṇā anekavarṇā anekaśatasahasravarṇā raśmayaḥ prāmuñcan,
S04bsu018_u:277_2: te gatvā raśmayo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā purimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrān avabhāsayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:277_4: tatrāṅguṣṭhāyāṃ lokadhātau daśavarṣāyuṣkā manuṣyā durvarṇā drohoḍimakā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā aṅguṣṭhamātramuccatvena /
S04bsu018_u:277_6: sa ca kaliyugapramāṇānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ hastapramāṇena hastamekaṃ tathāgata ūrdhvatvena hastaśca;
S04bsu018_u:277_8: sa ca tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyati yāpayati caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ tribhiryānairdharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:278_0: atha khalu kulaputra tacca buddhakṣetraṃ tāṃśca manuṣyāṃstaṃ ca tathāgataṃ sarvāvatī ca sā parṣādrākṣīt /
S04bsu018_u:278_3: yathābhiprāyāṃ sattvaistasya tathāgatasya purataḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:278_4: kecidbuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītāḥ pariśuddhāḥ kecidapariśuddhāḥ pañcakaṣāyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:278_5: tatra ca tena mahāsattvenāhaṃ samādāpito niveśitaścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksabodhau /
S04bsu018_u:278_6: tatra ca mayā ratnacchatrābhyudgatāvabhāsasya tathāgatasya purato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:278_7: sa ca me tathāgataḥ sādhukāramadāsīt vyākṛtaścāhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:278_8: yo 'sāvasmākaṃ bodhāya samādāyakaḥ kalyāṇamitro 'tīva satpuruṣastīvrapañcakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāne kāle pratikliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:278_9_1: vaineyasattva praṇidhānaḥ parigṛhītastasya satpuruṣasya daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyo
S04bsu018_u:278_11: sa ca mahākaruṇāvairocanasaumyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitro hitakara etarhyacirābhisaṃbuddho 'ṅguṣṭhavatyāṃ lokadhātau aṅguṣṭhapramāṇānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ madhye,
S04bsu018_u:278_12: teṣāṃ evāṅguṣṭhapramāṇānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ hastapramāṇena hastapramāṇakaḥ sa tathāgato daśavarṣāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitavān;
S04bsu018_u:278_13: tasyāpi bodhiprāptasya daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyo lokadhātubhyastiṣṭhadbhiryāpayadbhistaistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdūtāḥ preṣitāḥ pūjanārthāya,
S04bsu018_u:278_14: ye tena prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:278_15_0: ye tena prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ
S04bsu018_u:278_16: paśya brāhmaṇa yathā te buddhā bhagavataḥ sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu dīrgheṇāyuṣā pariśuddhāśayānāṃ sukhavihāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ [KpSū_310] kurvanti;
S04bsu018_u:278_17: sa ca jyotīrasastathāgata evaṃ pratikruṣṭe pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre buddhatvaṃ prāptavān,
S04bsu018_u:278_18: ānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatānāṃ sattvānāmevālpakenāyuṣā bahvatirekaṃ buddhakāryaṃ karoti,
S04bsu018_u:278_20: evameva tvayā satpuruṣa sarvāmimāṃ bodhisattvaparṣāmabhibhūya viśiṣṭataraṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:278_21: pratikruṣṭe buddhakṣetre pañcakaṣāye vartamāne ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:278_22: ye ca te mahāsattvā yaiḥ pariśuddhā buddhakṣetrāḥ parigṛhītā narakatiryagyoniparivarjitāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaparivarjitāḥ
S04bsu018_u:278_23: śuddhāśayāḥ suvinītā avaruptakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītā ime sattvāḥ puṣpopamā ucyante,
S04bsu018_u:278_24: na te mahāsattvāḥ puṇḍarīkopamā ye suvinītānāmavaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ madhye buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyanti /
S04bsu018_u:279_8_0: tadyathāpi nāma brāhmaṇa imān mahābodhisattvaparṣāṃ sthāpayitvā vāyuviṣṇunā yenāpariśuddhaṃ
S04bsu018_u:279_8_1: buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ kleśākulāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītā ekatyo bhadrakalpikāḥ
S04bsu018_u:280_8: tadyathāpi [KpSū_312] tvaṃ brāhmaṇaitarhi aprameyānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ madhye kuśalavyākaraṇakṣetraṃ tathāgatasyāgrataḥ karuṇāpuṇḍarīkamutpannaṃ praṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa /
S04bsu018_u:280_9: yadā tvayā ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstīvraṃ pañcakaṣāyaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:280_10: mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa tvaṃ satpuruṣa daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sādhukāro datto,
S04bsu018_u:280_11: dūtāśca preṣitā, mahākāruṇikaśca te nāma kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:281_0: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mahākāruṇikānāgate 'dhvanyatikrāntānāmekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāṃ parīttāvaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye,
S04bsu018_u:281_1: tasmineva sahe buddhakṣetre bhadrake kalpe viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:281_3: ākīrṇe [KpSū_313] loke tathāgato bhaviṣyasi vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān;
S04bsu018_u:281_4: vivartitagaticakraḥ pravartitadharmacakraḥ vivartitavaśavartimārakleśamāraśca anantāparyantāni daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇi śabdenāpūrayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:281_7: yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ / yathā tasmin samaye 'yaṃ rājāmṛtaśuddho 'mitāyurnāmāprameyaiḥ kalpaiḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:281_8: evameva tvaṃ mahākāruṇika tatra sahe buddhakṣetre bhadrake mahākalpe viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyāṃ prajāyāṃ pañcacatvāriṃśatibhirvarṣairevaṃrūpaṃ sakalaṃ mahābuddhakāryaṃ kariṣyasi,
S04bsu018_u:281_10: parinirvṛtasya ca te satpuruṣānuttaraparinirvāṇenādhikaṃ varṣasahasraṃ saddharmaḥ sthāsyate /
S04bsu018_u:281_11: saddharme cāntarhite tava satpuruṣa te 'pi dhātavaḥ janmaśarīre evaṃrūpaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:282_1: sa evamāha - “teṣu teṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu tava satpuruṣa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasyāhaṃ nityopasthāyaka upakaraṇamaitryānukūlaḥ sahāyako bhūtvā tvāmupasthiheyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:282_4: tvaṃ ca māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:282_6: sāpyāha - “teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasyāhaṃ janetrī mātā bhaveyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:282_7: bodhiprāptaśca tvaṃ mahākāruṇika māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:282_9: sāpyāha - “teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasyāhaṃ kṣīradhātrī mātā bhaveyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:282_11: sanemo nāma śakraḥ, aparastu pāracintī nāma śakraḥ,
S04bsu018_u:282_12: te ubhaye 'pyāhatuḥ / “vayamapi bho mahākāruṇika teṣu teṣu yāvad;
S04bsu018_u:282_13: bodhiprāptasya ca te vayaṃ śrāvakayugaprajñāvanto [KpSū_315] ṛddhimantaśca bhavemaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:282_15: sa evamāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇika teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasya putro bhaveyaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:282_17: sāpyāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇika tāsu tāsu jātiṣu bhāryā bhaveyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:282_18: bodhiprāptaśca tvaṃ satpuruṣa māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:282_19_0: kaduścaro nāmāsurendraḥ, so 'pyāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇikā teṣu teṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:282_19_1: kalpeṣu satpuruṣa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasyāhamupakaraṇamaitryānukulaḥ sahāyo dāsatvenopasthiheyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:282_21: bodhiprāptasya ca te satpuruṣa dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartane 'dhyayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:282_22: ahaṃ ca te dharmadeśanāṃ prathamāṃ saphalāṃ kuryāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:282_23: dharmarasaṃ ca piveyaṃ, amṛtaṃ cauṣadhiṃ gaccheyaṃ, yāvat sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṃ prāpnuyāṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:282_24: peyālaṃ, gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāśca tatra devanāgāsurā mahākāruṇikasyānupravṛtticaryāya [KpSū_316] praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavanto vaineyamupanyastā /
S04bsu018_u:282_26: sa āha - “ahaṃ te bho mahābrāhmaṇa bahūpakaraṇasahāyako bhaviṣyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:282_31: evaṃrūpo 'haṃ mahābrāhmaṇa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasya tava ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sahāyako bhaveyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:282_32: yāvattvaṃ bodhiṃ prāpnuyā ahaṃ ca te śrāvakasthānamāsādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:282_34: tvaṃ ca māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:282_35: śrutvā ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko brāhmaṇo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvā,
S04bsu018_u:282_36: taṃ saṃjñāvikaraṇabhīṣmājīvikaṃ śabdāpayitvāha - [KpSū_317] “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa yastvaṃ mama sahāyako bhaviṣyasi anuttaracaryāya,
S04bsu018_u:283_0_0: bhūyaśca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:283_0_1: purata āha - “sacenme bhadanta bhagavaṃsteṣu teṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvanuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:283_0_2: samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇasya ye mama purato yācanakāḥ sthitvānnaṃ yācanti
S04bsu018_u:283_0_3: mṛduvacanena vā puruṣavacanena vā ullaṅghanavacanena vā spaṣṭavacanena vā yāceyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:283_1: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasyāntike ekacittakṣaṇamapi roṣaṃ utpādayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:283_2: aprasādaṃ votpādayeyaṃ dānasya vā phalavipākaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇo dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:283_3: visaṃvāditā me bhaveyuḥ ye 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:283_5: sacedahaṃ [KpSū_318] bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasya prasannacitto dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:283_8: antaśo vālāgrakoṭīpramāṇamātramapi visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:283_9: yadīdaṃ pratigrāhakasya vālāgrakoṭīpramāṇamātramapi kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvantarāyaṃ kuryuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:283_12: yāvad ye mama yācanakāḥ śīrṣaṃ yāceyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:283_13: mṛduvacanena vā paruṣavacanena vā ullaṅghyavacanena vā spaṣṭavacanena vā śīrṣaṃ yācayeran;
S04bsu018_u:283_14: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasyāntike ekacittakṣaṇamapi roṣamutpādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:283_18: yathā dānamevaṃ śīlaṃ yāvatprajñā parityāgo vācyaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:284_1: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sādhukāramadāsīt /
S04bsu018_u:284_2: “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa, mahākaruṇāpratiṣṭhitena manasā tvayā satpuruṣemaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:284_3: sā ca kulaputra sarvāvatī parṣā sadevagandharvamānuṣāsuraśca lokaḥ prāñjalībhūtaḥ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ prādāsīt /
S04bsu018_u:284_4: “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa, mahākaruṇāpratiṣṭhitena manasā tvayā satpuruṣa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu018_u:284_6: sa ca kulaputra yathā saṃjñāvikārabhīṣmājīviko bodhisattvo dānapratigrāhikayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān,
S04bsu018_u:284_8: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastānyevaṃrūpāṇi praṇidhānāni caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ sakāśācchrutvā saṃjñāvikārabhīṣmeṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:284_9: atha mahākāruṇikaḥ paramaprītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjalībhūtaḥ sthitvā sarvāvatīṃ parṣāṃ vyavalokya paramaprītamanā āha /
S04bsu018_u:284_10_0: “aho āścaryaṃ, bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ dharmadurbhikṣakṣīṇakāle mahākleśaraṇe kaliyuge pañcakaṣāye
S04bsu018_u:284_10_1: vartamāne loke 'nāyake sārthavāho 'vabhāsakaraḥ pradīpakaraḥ atrāṇānāmandhānāṃ mārganidarśakaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:284_11_1: sahāyakāḥ pratilabdhā ye mama janmāntareṣu śīrṣapratigrāhakā bhaviṣyanti nayanakarṇanāsājihvāhastapādacarmāsthirudhiraṃ
S04bsu018_u:285_0_0: punarapi kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:285_0_1: purato niṣaṇṇa āha - “ye ca mama bhadanta bhagavan teṣu teṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu
S04bsu018_u:285_0_2: janmāntareṣu yācanakā upasaṃkrāmeyuryadi vānnaṃ yadi vā pānaṃ yāvacchiraḥ pratigṛhṇīyurantaśo
S04bsu018_u:285_1: sacedahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya na tāṃ sattvāṃ saṃsārāt parimocayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:285_2: na ca punarvyākuryāṃ chrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā,
S04bsu018_u:285_3: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ ya etarhi daśasu dikṣu,
S04bsu018_u:286_0: punarapi kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sādhukāraṃ prādāsīt /
S04bsu018_u:286_3_0: yathā meruśikhariṃdhareṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādena lokeśvarajyotiṣastathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:286_3_1: purataḥ evaṃrūpayā bodhisattvacaryayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ evaṃrūpā bodhisattvacārikā
S04bsu018_u:286_4_0: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā mahākalpā atikrāntā yathā tena satpuruṣeṇa purimāyāṃ diśīto koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetre
S04bsu018_u:286_5: jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvaro nāma babhūva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān,
S04bsu018_u:286_7: tasya khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya varṣasahasraṃ saddharmanetrī asthāsīt;
S04bsu018_u:286_9_0: ye khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya
S04bsu018_u:286_9_4: vā chinnaṃ paudgalikaparigrahe yāvadātmanā paribhuktaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ vā dattaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:286_10: tena khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvareṇa tathāgatena sarve 'nupūrveṇa vyākṛtastribhiryānaiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:286_11: ye kecin mahākāruṇika tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane raktakāṣāyaprāvṛtāḥ sarve te avaivartikā vyākṛtāstribhiryānaiḥ;
S04bsu018_u:286_12: ye 'pi kecin mūlāpattisamāpannā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā pūrvameva te tena tathāgatena śāstṛsaṃjñākuśalamūlavipākena tribhiryānairavaivartikā vyākṛtāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:287_0_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra sa mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:287_0_1: purata āha - “eṣaiva me bhadanta bhagavan praṇidhiryāvadevāhamanuttarāyāṃ bodhicaryāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:287_0_2: caramāṇo yān sattvānahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayeyaṃ samādāpayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ
S04bsu018_u:287_1: yāvadbodhiparyantena caryāṃ caramāṇo na tān sattvāṃstribhiryānairavaivartikabhūmau sthāpayeyamantaśa ekasattvamapi,
S04bsu018_u:287_2: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:287_4: anuttarajñānapratilabdhaścāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan ye me sattvāḥ śāsane raktakāṣāyaprāvṛtā bhaveyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:287_5_0: yadi vā mūlāpattimāpannāḥ syuryadi vā dṛṣṭivyasanaṃ saṃpratipannāḥ syuryadi vā triṣu
S04bsu018_u:287_5_1: ratneṣu skhalitāḥ sāparādhā bhaveyurbhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā ya ekakṣaṇamapi mama
S04bsu018_u:287_5_2: sakāśe śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ vā gauravacittaṃ votpādayeyurdharme vā saṅghe vā gauravacittamutpādayeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:287_6_0: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃstān sattvāṃstribhiryānairavaivartikāṃ na vyākuryāmantaśa
S04bsu018_u:287_6_1: ekasattvamapi riṃceyurvisaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuryāvan mā cāhamanuttarāṃ
S04bsu018_u:287_7: bodhiprāptasya [KpSū_324] ca me bhadanta bhagavan devamanuṣyasatkṛtaṃ gurukṛtaṃ mānitaṃ pūjitaṃ raktakāṣāyacīvaraṃ bhavet /
S04bsu018_u:287_8_0: sahadarśanena sattvāḥ kāṣāyakaṇṭhāstribhiryānairavaivartikā bhaveyurye sattvāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitā
S04bsu018_u:287_8_1: annapānavirahitā yakṣadāridrā vāntaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ sattvā ye kāṣāyamabhilaṣeyurantaśaścaturaṅgulamapi,
S04bsu018_u:287_10_0: ye sattvāḥ parasparaviruddhavairabahulāḥ parasparayuddhasaṃgrāmagatā vā devā vā yakṣā
S04bsu018_u:287_10_1: vā rākṣasā vā nāgā vā asurā vā garuḍā vā kinnarā vā mahoragā vā kuṃbhāṇḍā vā piśācā
S04bsu018_u:287_11_0: te sattvāḥ karuṇācittā mṛducittā avairacittāḥ karmaṇyacittā bhaveyurye sattvāḥ saṃgrāme
S04bsu018_u:287_11_1: vā vivāde vā yuddhe vā kalahe vā kāṣāyakhaṇḍakaṃ rakṣārthaṃ pūjanārthaṃ gauravārthaṃ
S04bsu018_u:287_11_2: hareyuste sattvāḥ sadā aparājitā bhaveyuraskhalitā aviheṭhitā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:287_12: svastinā tataḥ saṃgrāmādvā yuddhādvā kalahādvā vivādādvā parimucyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:287_13: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannebhiḥ pañcabhirāryaguṇai raktaṃ kāṣāyaṃ na samanvāgataṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:287_14: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣu,
S04bsu018_u:287_15: [KpSū_325] yāvan, mā cāhaṃ śaktaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ,
S04bsu018_u:287_16: dharmā me saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā cāhaṃ śaktaḥ anyatīrthikāṃ parigṛhītuṃ /
S04bsu018_u:287_17: ye ca bhadanta bhagavan mamābhisaṃbuddhasya yāvat parinirvṛtasya
S04bsu018_u:287_18: vā namaskāraṃ kariṣyanti, “namaḥ śākyamunaye tathāgatāye”ti vācaṃ bhāṣiṣyante,
S04bsu018_u:288_0: sa ca punaḥ kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayitvā karatalena mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ parimārjayitvāha - “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa,
S04bsu018_u:288_2: evameva te satpuruṣa pañcabhirāryaguṇai raktakāṣāyaṃ sattvānāmupajīvyaṃ bhaviṣyati” /
S04bsu018_u:289_0_0: sa bho punaḥ kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena vyākareṇena sādhukāraprāmodya
S04bsu018_u:290_1: punarapi kulaputra sarvāvatī sā parṣā sadevagandharvamānuṣā prāñjalibhūtā tasthau,
S04bsu018_u:290_2: mahākāruṇikasya pūjākarmaṇe udyuktāḥ puṣpairvādyairmahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā vicitravarṇaiḥ ślokaistuṣṭāva /
S04bsu018_u:293_0_0: sa ca punaḥ kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:293_0_1: pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣasāda
S04bsu018_u:293_1: kiyatā bhadanta bhagavan samādhānamukhanirdeśasaṃbhāraviśuddhimukho dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ?;
S04bsu018_u:293_2: kiyatā bhadanta bhagavan samādhānamukhanirdeśasaṃbhāraviśuddhimukho dharmaparyāyaḥ paripūrṇo bhavati?;
S04bsu018_u:293_3: kiyadrūpeṇa vā bhadanta bhagavan saṃbhāreṇa samanvāgataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛḍhapratiṣṭhito bhavati?;
S04bsu018_u:293_4_0: kiyadrūpeṇa samādhānamukhanirdeśanālaṅkṛto bhavati?” sa bhoḥ punaḥ kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato
S04bsu018_u:293_4_2: mahākāruṇika bhadrakaḥ praśnaḥ kalyāṇaṃ te pratibhānaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:293_5: bhūyasyā mātrayā tvaṃ mahākāruṇikāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ hitakaro bahukaraścotpanno,
S04bsu018_u:293_6: yatra hi nāma tvaṃ mahākāruṇika tathāgatamidamevaṃrūpaṃ praśnaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
S04bsu018_u:293_7: tena hi mahākāruṇika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru ca /
S04bsu018_u:294_0: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ asti mahākāruṇika śūraṃgamo nāma samādhiryatra samādhau sthito bodhisattvaḥ sarvasamādhiṣvanupraviṣṭo bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:294_1: asti ratnamudro nāma samādhiryena sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavanti /
S04bsu018_u:294_2: asti siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiryatra sthitaḥ sarvasamādhibhirvikrīḍati /
S04bsu018_u:294_6: vilokitamudro nāma samādhiḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ murdhānaṃ vyavalokayati /
S04bsu018_u:294_8: niyatadhvajaketau samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhvajaṃ dhārayati /
S04bsu018_u:294_11: samādhirājasupratiṣṭhitena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu rājatvena pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:294_23: sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudre [KpSū_330] samādhau sarvasamādhayaḥ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu018_u:294_31: vairocanena samādhinā sarvasamādhīn bhāvayati tapati virocati /
S04bsu018_u:294_33: vibhajati / animiṣeṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhayo na kadācit samādhidharmā eṣante /
S04bsu018_u:294_34: aniketena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu na kadācid [KpSū_331] dharmasthitiṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu018_u:294_36: niścittena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ prahīyante /
S04bsu018_u:294_51: akṣayavatena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ na kṣayaṃ nākṣayaṃ darśayati /
S04bsu018_u:294_55: aniñjitena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu neñjati na vepati na prapañcayati /
S04bsu018_u:294_56: vivardhanena samādhinā sarvasamādhisamāpattiṣu vivardhamānāṃ jñeyaṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu018_u:294_59: śuddhapratibhāsena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu catasraḥ pratisaṃvidāḥ pratilabhate /
S04bsu018_u:294_60: kārākāreṇa samādhinā kāravihārakriyāṃ karoti jñānaketuṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu018_u:294_61: vajropamena samādhinā sarvadharmānnirvedhīkaroti yasya vedhamapi na samanupaśyati /
S04bsu018_u:294_63: na vedhati na pratibhāsati na vighātamāpadyate,
S04bsu018_u:294_67: ratnakūṭena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu ratnakūṭa iva saṃdṛśyate /
S04bsu018_u:294_70: ratiṃ [KpSū_334] jahena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu ratiṃ jahāti /
S04bsu018_u:294_78: tamoviṣayaṃ samatikrāmati / sarvaguṇasaṃcayagatena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu sannicayaṃ jahāti /
S04bsu018_u:294_93: jñānolkāmatā samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu tena bhāsati tapati virocati /
S04bsu018_u:294_103: vimalaprabhāsena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu saṃskṛtavimalaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S04bsu018_u:294_111: tathāsthitanīścittena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu tathatā na vinivartate /
S04bsu018_u:294_113: vākkalividhvaṃsanagaganapratilabdhena samādhinā [KpSū_338] bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu vākkarma nopalabhate /
S04bsu018_u:295_0: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃbhāraviśuddhimukhasaṃgraho dharmaparyāyaḥ? dānasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ sattvaparipācanatayā saṃvartate /
S04bsu018_u:296_0_0: punarapi kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahābodhisattvaparṣadaṃ vyavalokya mahākāruṇikaṃ
S04bsu018_u:296_0_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntiṃ paripūrayati? paramārthadarśino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāmoghavyāyāmaparigrahacittaḥ
S04bsu018_u:296_0_3: sarvatraidhātuke yo 'parigrahacittaḥ sarvasattvebhyaḥ sa ucyate mahāvaiśāradyaśramaṇadharmo
S04bsu018_u:297_0: kathaṃ ca punaḥ kṣāntyā paripūrirbhavati? aṇurapi [KpSū_342] tatra dharmannopalabhate yadanubudhyeya pratibuddhyeyurvā avipākadharmānadhimucyate;
S04bsu018_u:297_2: karuṇā ca niḥsattvatā ca, muditā ca nirjīvitā copekṣā ca niṣpudgalatā ca,
S04bsu018_u:297_3: dānaṃ ca dāntacittatā ca, śīlaṃ ca śāntacittatā ca, kṣāntiśca kṣamācittatā ca, vīryaṃ ca vivekacittatā ca, dhyānaṃ ca nidhyapticittatā ca,
S04bsu018_u:297_4: prajñā cāpyudāracittatā ca, smṛtyupasthānatā ca smṛtyamanasikāracittatā ca,
S04bsu018_u:297_7: śraddhā cāsaṅgacittatā ca, smṛtiśca svayaṃbhūcittatā ca,
S04bsu018_u:297_10: balaṃ cānavamardacittatā ca, bodhyaṅgaśca buddhiprabhedanacittatā ca,
S04bsu018_u:297_11: mārgaśca bhāvanācittatā ca, śamathaścopaśamacittatā ca, vipaśyanā cāsaṃmohacittatā ca,
S04bsu018_u:298_1_0: asmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe catuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇāṃ ye daśabhyo
S04bsu018_u:298_2_0: śākyamunistathāgata āha - “asya khalu punaḥ kulaputra dharmaparyāyasya ratnagarbhasya
S04bsu018_u:298_4: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasya samādhānamukhanirdeśasya saṃbhāraviśuddhimukhadharmaparyāyasya sakalaparipūrṇaṃ viśuddhajñānādhigamo babhūva” /
S04bsu018_u:299_0: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena prāmodyaprasādena viṃśativarṣasadṛśaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃvṛtto,
S04bsu018_u:299_2_0: sa ca kulaputra rājāmṛtaśuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ [KpSū_345] putrasahasreṇāśītibhiśca koṭṭarājasahasrairanyaiśca
S04bsu018_u:299_2_1: dvānavatibhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya pravrajitaḥ śīlaśrutasamādhisauratyairabhiyogakṛtavān /
S04bsu018_u:300_0: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupūrveṇa caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrāvakayānakathāṃ paṭhitavān paryavāptavāṃśca;
S04bsu018_u:300_2: tataḥ śatasahasramanuttaramahāyānakathāyāṃ tathā kāyasmṛtyupasthānakathāyāmuddiṣṭavān paṭhitavān paryavāptavāṃśca,
S04bsu018_u:301_0: yāvadapareṇa kālasamayena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:301_1: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvaḥ nānāvidhāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā vādyapuṣpacūrṇāmālyagandhavilepanacchatradhvajapatākāratnaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtavān,
S04bsu018_u:301_3: śarīrapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca saptaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtavān pañcayojanamuccatvenārdhayojanaṃ vistāreṇa /
S04bsu018_u:301_5: punarapi tatrāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:301_6_0: sa teṣāṃ saptānāṃ divasānāmatyayena caturaśītibhiḥ prāṇasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya
S04bsu018_u:301_6_2: pravrajya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavān;
S04bsu018_u:301_8: tatra cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvāṃstribhiryānaiḥ samādāpayāmāsa niveśayāmāsa pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
S04bsu018_u:301_10: upāsakasaṃvare ca śrāmaṇerasaṃvare upasaṃpadāyāṃ bhikṣubhāve brahmacaryavāsasaṃvare niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:301_11_0: sa bahūni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi abhijñarddhikauśalye ca niyojayitvā sauratyabrahmacaryavāse
S04bsu018_u:301_11_1: niyojayitvā śatrubhūteṣu ca skandhesu parijñāyāṃ niyojayitvā śūnyagrāmāyatanaparijñāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:301_11_4: darśayitvā āryāṣṭāṅge mārge pratiṣṭhāpayitvā kālaṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu018_u:301_12: evameva ca te sattvāstasya mahākāruṇikasya mahāśramaṇasya śarīreṣu śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtavanto,
S04bsu018_u:301_14: evameva tasmin samaye te sattvā mahākāruṇikasya mahāśramaṇasya śarīreṣu śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtavanto /
S04bsu018_u:301_15_0: yasmiṃśca divase mahākāruṇiko [KpSū_348] mahāśramaṇaḥ kālagatastasmin divase ratnagarbhasya
S04bsu018_u:301_17: kecin manusyeṣu kecinnāgeṣu kecidasureṣu kecit praṇidhānena vividhāsu tiryagyoniṣūpapannāḥ /
