S04bsu018_u:302_0_2: tatra manuṣyā akuśalamūlasamavadhānā raudrā lohitapāṇayaḥ pāpaniviṣṭā adayāpannaḥ
S04bsu018_u:302_1: praṇidhānavaśena mahākāruṇiko mahāśramaṇastatra saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetre caṇḍālakula upapanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu018_u:302_2: sa cātīvadīrghaśarīro 'bhūdatīvabalavān atīvavegavān atīvasmṛtimān atīvapratibhānavān atīvajavasamanvāgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu018_u:302_3: sa dṛḍhena balavegena sattvān saṃgṛhītvāha - “yadi yūyaṃ bho sattvā adattādānāt prativiramata,
S04bsu018_u:302_5: tadahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ jīvitaṃ prayacchāmi jīvitopakaraṇāni ca dāsyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:302_9: “vayamidānīn tava nāthasya vacanenādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvamadattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭyāḥ prativiramāmaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:302_10: sa balacaṇḍālo gatvā rājño vā rājabhaṭṭānāṃ vā nivedayati /
S04bsu018_u:302_11_0: “jīvitopakaraṇena me prayojanamannena vā pānena vā khādyena vā bhojyena vā peyavastraśayyāgandhahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktavaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍarajatajātarūpeṇa
S04bsu018_u:302_12: sa balacaṇḍālaḥ sattvān yāvajjīvaṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:302_14: yaśca tatra rājā sa kālagataḥ tatastai rājāmātyaiḥ sa balacaṇḍālo rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ puṇyabalo nāma saṃskṛtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:303_0: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo na cireṇaiva taṃ viṣayamanuśāsitavān,
S04bsu018_u:303_2: yāvad rājā puṇyabalo na cireṇa sarvajambūdvīpe rājā balacakravartī babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:303_3: yadā ca rājñā puṇyabalena sarvajambūdvīpe rājatvaṃ pratigṛhītaṃ tataḥ paścāt sattvāḥ prāṇātipātaviramaṇe samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:303_5: yathābhiprāyāḥ sattvāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:303_6: atha rājā puṇyabalaḥ sarvajambūdvīpikāṃ sattvāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu saṃniyojya sarvajambūdvīpe ghoṣamanuśrāvayamāsa /
S04bsu018_u:303_7: “ye kecid yācanakā annārthikā yāvad ratnārthikā vā te sarva āgacchantu /
S04bsu018_u:303_8: ahaṃ sarvadānāni dāsyāmi” / tato 'pareṇa kālasamayena sarvajambūdvīpikāḥ sattvā āgatvā rājānaṃ puṇyabalaṃ yācitavantaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:304_4: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mahārāja lokapradīpo jina” iti /
S04bsu018_u:304_6: pāṃśughoṣa ājīvika āha - “ahaṃ mahārāja vidyādharatvamicchāmi mahāsurasaṃgrāmapramardanakalpaṃ sādhayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:304_7: tenāhaṃ tava purataḥ sthitvā vijñāpayāmi jīvataḥ puruṣasya carmaṇā prayojanaṃ cakṣuṣā ca prayojanaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:304_8: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabala evaṃ cintayati /
S04bsu018_u:304_10: gaṇanātikrāntaśca sattvā daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitā,
S04bsu018_u:304_12: ayaṃ ca me kalyāṇamitro 'sārāt kāyāt sāramādadāmi” /

S04bsu018_u:304_16: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo dakṣiṇena hastenobhau netrāvutpādyājīvikasya datvā rudhiramrakṣitena mukhenāha /
S04bsu018_u:304_17: “śṛṇvantu me iha devayakṣamaharddhikā ye kecinnarā ye 'surā ye ca bhūtā ihāgatāḥ khecarā bhūmau sthitā ye narā,

S04bsu018_u:304_21: tāvacciraṃ mama jīvitendriyaṃ mā nirudhyeta mā ca me smṛtirnaśyeta mā ca me vipratisāro bhaved,

S04bsu018_u:304_23: āha - “gṛhṇāhi carma” / sa ca kulaputra pāṃśughoṣājīvikastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā rājño dhriyataḥ kāyaccarmamapanetvā carma gṛhītvā vidyāṃ sādhayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:304_24: tathā saptadivasāni rājñaḥ puṇyabalasya jīvitendriyaṃ na niruddhaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:304_25: na ca smṛtiḥ pramuṣṭā, na ca tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
S04bsu018_u:305_0: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva,
S04bsu018_u:305_1: na cānyo draṣṭavyo 'haṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā /
S04bsu018_u:305_3: prathamacittotpādena ca me gaṇānātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:305_4: ayaṃ me prathamaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca /
S04bsu018_u:305_5: so 'haṃ praṇidhānavaśena tataścyavitvā saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetra upapannaścaṇḍālakule dvitīyaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca /
S04bsu018_u:305_6: tadā me caṇḍālavaṃśe [KpSū_353] sthitvā sattvāṃ kuśale niyojya svabalaparākrameṇa yāvadbalacakravartitvaṃ prāptaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:305_8: āyuśca vardhāpitāḥ / ayaṃ ca me prathama ātmaparityāgaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:305_9: yadā ca me svanetrāḥ parityaktāḥ svacarmaparityāgaśca /
S04bsu018_u:305_10: so 'haṃ tataścyutastatraiva saṃkarṣaṇe kṣetre dvitīye dvīpe praṇidhānavaśena caṇḍālakula upapannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:305_11: peyālaṃ, tatra ca mayaivaṃrūpeṇa dṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇa sattvānniyojayitvā kuśaleṣu karmeṣu,
S04bsu018_u:305_14: āyuśca vardhāpitaṃ / tatra ca svaśarīrāt jihvā karṇau ca parityaktau,
S04bsu018_u:305_15: yāvat sarvan tatsaṃkarṣaṇaṃ mahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:305_16: praṇidhānadṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇānuprabandhena praṇidhānavaśena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu evaṃrūpaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:305_18: triṣu ca yāneṣu samādāpitāḥ, kalikaluṣakalaharaṇavigrahāḥ śamitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:305_19: ityarthaṃ kulaputrānyeṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:305_20: yadā te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhicaryāṃ caramāṇā na parāmāpattyā [KpSū_354] codayanti,
S04bsu018_u:305_23: ityarthaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ paripūrṇābhiprāyāṇāṃ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:305_25: na śikṣāgrahaṇasya, na ca paruṣavacanaṃ śrūyate, na cākuśalaśabdaḥ; anyatra dharmaśabdena tadbuddhakṣetramapagatāmanāpaśabdena sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:305_27: na ca tatra śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya nāma prajñaptiprādurbhāvo 'sti /
S04bsu018_u:305_28_0: yadā ca mayā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu mahākalpeṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:305_28_1: buddhakṣetreṣu paruṣavacanabhayena sattvāḥ prāṇātipātavairamaṇye samādāpitā yāvattriṣu
S04bsu018_u:305_29: [KpSū_355] tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa ma etarhyevaṃ parikliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ akuśalaśabdenāpūritaṃ akuśalamūlasamavadhānagataiḥ sattvaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:305_31: yathā ca me pūrvaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathārūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /

S04bsu018_u:305_33: yādṛśaṃ caiva bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pratilabdhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:306_0: saṃkṣiptena te kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ kathayiṣyāmi yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ,

S04bsu018_u:306_5: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśāyāṃ [KpSū_356] sarvaghoṣāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃkaramardārcirnāma tathāgato varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:306_9: varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtavān gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā kalpātikrāntāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:306_11: adyāpi tasya mahākāruṇikasya śarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakāryaṃ kurvanti /

S04bsu018_u:306_13_1: nāma bhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre tatrāsau satpuruṣo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyati,
S04bsu018_u:306_14: sahetukṛṣṇavidhvaṃsanarājo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān /

S04bsu018_u:306_16: sūryagarbhārcivimalendro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān /

S04bsu018_u:306_18: acintyarocano nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati yāvad buddho bhagavān /

S04bsu018_u:306_24: so 'pi daśavarṣāṇi sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati /

S04bsu018_u:307_0: “virocase buddha yathaiva sūrya abhyudgato merurimasmiṃ loke /
S04bsu018_u:307_1: viśuddhacakṣurvirajā vināyakā ālokabhūtā sugatā namo 'stu te //

S04bsu018_u:308_3: ime ṣaṭsatpuruṣā mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāstāṃ śṛṇu /

S04bsu018_u:309_2_0: tadāhaṃ mahākalpe vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya

S04bsu018_u:309_10: magnaḥ saṃsārapaṅke, punaśca sa devamanuṣyaśrīḥ kadācillabhati,

S04bsu018_u:310_9: śaṣpāni na saṃpadyante, varṣaṃ na pravarṣati, vṛkṣebhyaśca patrapuṣpaphalāni na niṣpadyante,
S04bsu018_u:310_14: “]tato 'ham āśramaṃ parityajya madhyameṣu janapadeṣu gatvā dagapālaṃ parvatamabhiruhya praṇidhānamakarot /
S04bsu018_u:311_3: yathā tyajāmi priyarūpasaṃpadaṃ na śakrabrahmāṇa na mārakāraṇāt /
S04bsu018_u:311_4: arthaṃ karo bheṣyasi devaloke bhaveyaṃ mahyaṃ bahumānsaśoṇitaṃ //
S04bsu018_u:311_5: śṛṇvantu nāgā naradevayakṣā ye devatā śailagirau nivāsiṇaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:311_6: kṛpā mamotpannaya sattvahetoḥ tarpaṣya sattvāṃ svakamāṃsaśoṇitaiḥ” //
S04bsu018_u:312_2: kṣubhitāstrayo lokāḥ, kaṃpitā dharaṇī, calito meruḥ, rudanti devagaṇāstato 'hamātmānaṃ dagapālātparvatātpātayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:312_6: mama ca kulaputra sa kāyaḥ sattvaiḥ paribhujyamānaḥ pratidinaṃ vardhate,
S04bsu018_u:312_8: sarvatra mānuṣaśirāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ sakeśakarṇanayanānāsauṣṭhadāntāḥ sajihvā anekamukhaśatasahasrāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:312_11: mānsaṃ paribhuñjatha, rudhiraṃ pivatha, nayanāṃ gṛhṇatha, karṇanāsāṃ keśauṣṭhadantajihvāṃ gṛhṇatha /
S04bsu018_u:312_12: yasyārthaṃ yenārthaṃ yāvadarthaṃ saṃtarpitaśarīrāḥ paripurṇābhiprāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha,
S04bsu018_u:312_17: [KpSū_365] ye ca tatra vijñāḥ sattvāste kecicchrāvakayāne cittamutpādayanti,
S04bsu018_u:312_20_0: mānsaṃ bhakṣayanti, rudhiraṃ pivanti, kecinnayanāni gṛhṇanti, kecit karṇau, kecinnāsāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:312_20_1: kecidoṣṭhau, keciddāntāṃ gṛhṇanti; gṛhitvā prakramanti; praṇidhānavaśena cānyonyaṃ
S04bsu018_u:312_21: mānsaṃ na cāpacayaṃ bhavati, na parikṣayaṃ gacchati / yāvaddaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sarvajambūdvīpakā manuṣyā yakṣamṛgapakṣiṇo 'pi svaśarīreṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:312_29: kṛtsnaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prajñāpanapramāṇaṃ me tatra svacarma parityaktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:313_1: paśya kulaputra daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ svaśarīraparityāgāḥ parityaktā ekajīvitena;
S04bsu018_u:313_4: evaṃ ca me tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:313_6: iyaṃ me āśā paripūryatu, yathā mayaikadvīpe svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāḥ saṃtarpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:313_7: evameva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā varṣasahasrā asminnarajamerujugupsite buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpo mamātmabhāvaḥ prādurabhavat,
S04bsu018_u:313_8: yathaikadvīpe daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evaṃ sarvadvīpeṣu sattvāṃ svamānsarudhiracarmanayanakarṇanāsauṣṭhajihvākeśaiḥ saṃtarpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu samādāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:313_9: manuṣyāṃ yakṣarākṣasāṃ sarvatiryagyonikān ye kecin mānsarudhirabhojanāhārāḥ pṛthagyakṣā yāvadantaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ tāṃścāhaṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:313_10: yathā cāhamekasmin buddhakṣetre svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:313_11_0: evameva samantaddaśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_367] buddhakṣetreṣu svamānsarudhiracarmanayanāṃ
S04bsu018_u:313_11_1: yāvajjihvābhirevaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān mahākalpān teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04bsu018_u:313_13: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravartitadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:313_15_0: mā cāhaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaramāṇo buddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ mā ca dharmaśabdaṃ mā saṅghaśabdaṃ
S04bsu018_u:313_15_1: mā pāramitāśabdaṃ mā mārabalaparāśayaśabdaṃ mā vaiśāradyaśabdaṃ yāvat kuśalaśabdamapi
S04bsu018_u:313_17: yadi me evaṃrūpaḥ svaśarīraparityāgaḥ sattvasaṃtarpaṇārthe na saṃpadyata,
S04bsu018_u:313_18: naivaṃrūpaṃ ca me praṇidhānaṃ paripūri syādyathā me āśā cintitā /
S04bsu018_u:313_19: ye 'pi cemasmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvatra dvīpeṣvekaikasmiṃ dvīpa evaṃrūpā ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktāḥ sattvāṃśca mānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitā,
S04bsu018_u:313_20: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā evaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena svamānsarudhireṇa santarpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:313_21_0: paśya [KpSū_368] kulaputra tathāgatasya dānapāramitā ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ ya mayānuprabandhena
S04bsu018_u:313_21_1: tatkālaṃ netrāḥ parityaktāḥ teṣāṃ punarayaṃ jambūdvīpe yāvattrāyastriṃśaddevaparyantapramāṇe
S04bsu018_u:314_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādaprameyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena ayaṃ buddhakṣetraścandravidyuto nāma babhūva;
S04bsu018_u:314_2: ahaṃ cāsmiṃ jambudvīpe rājā babhūva pradīpapradyoto nāma balavāṃścakravartī /
S04bsu018_u:314_3: evaṃ ca mayā sarvajaṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu niyojitā,
S04bsu018_u:314_5: tatra cāhaṃ puruṣamadrākṣaṃ, paścādbāhuṃ gāḍhabandhanaṃ badhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayāmātyāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:314_7: amātyā māṃ pratyūcur[ / “]ayaṃ puruṣo devasya sāparādhiko;
S04bsu018_u:314_8: yadetasya puruṣasya saṃvatsare śaṣpaṃ dhānyaṃ cotpadyate tato devasya ṣaṭkāṃśo deyaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:314_9: yathānye kuṭumbino dadantyāyadvāraṃ ye devasya nagaragrāmajanapadakarvaṭeṣu prativasanti [KpSū_369] karmāntena jīvikāṃ kalpayanti;
S04bsu018_u:314_13: te kathayanti / “deva na kaścit suprasannacitto dadāti,
S04bsu018_u:314_14: yaddevasya divasedivase 'nnapānabhojanaparibhogo devīnāṃ devasya cāntaḥpuradevasya putrāṇāṃ duhitṛṇāṃ upabhogaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tatparaḥ sakāśāduddhriyate /
S04bsu018_u:314_19: imaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ pañcabhāgaśatāni kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ pradattaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:314_20: ahaṃ ca tapovanaṃ gatvā riṣipravrajyena brahmacaryaṃ cacāra;
S04bsu018_u:314_21: vanakhaṇḍe uḍumbaramūle dakṣiṇasya mahāsamudrasya nātidūre navamūlaphalāhāro viharāmi dhyāyī anupūrveṇa pañcābhijñaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:315_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśatā jambūdvīpakānāṃ vāṇijānāṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇāstaistataḥ prabhūto ratnaskandha āsāditaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:315_1: tatra ca candro nāma sārthavāhaḥ [KpSū_370] tena bhāgyavatā vijñapuruṣeṇa cintāmaṇiḥ samāsāditaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:315_2: sa tato ratnadvīpādvipulaṃ ratnadhanaskandhaṃ taṃ ca cintāmaṇiṃ gṛhītvā saṃprasthitaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:315_3: tataḥ kṣubhitaḥ samudro nāgā ākulā rudanti devatā yāstatra nivāsinyastatra cāśvasto nāma riṣirbodhisattvaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tatropapannaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:315_4_0: tena mahāsattvena sa sārthaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa ca mahāsamudrāduttāritastasya ca sārthavāhasyānyataro
S04bsu018_u:315_4_1: duṣṭarākṣasaḥ pratyarthiko 'vatāraprekṣī vivaragaveṣī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:315_6: yataste vaṇijaḥ praṇaṣṭamārgā paramabhītāduccasvareṇa krandanti rudanti paridevanti,
S04bsu018_u:315_8: yāvadaśroṣīdahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa yāvattatrāgatvā vaṇijaḥ samāśvāsitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:315_11_0: tadāhaṃ paṭṭaṃ tailena mrakṣayitvā svahastaṃ veṣṭya agninā prajvālya satyavacanamakarot
S04bsu018_u:315_11_2: hitāya navamūlaphalāhāreṇa caturaśītīnāṃ nāgayakṣasahasrāṇāṃ cittasantatiḥ paripācitā
S04bsu018_u:315_12: tena satyena satyavacanena kuśalamūlaparipākena jvalatu me hastaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:315_13: labhantu mārgaṃ vaṇijaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa jambūdvīpaṃ prāpayantu” /
S04bsu018_u:315_15: te vaṇijo jambūdvīpe sthāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ :
S04bsu018_u:315_19: sārthavāho bhaveyaṃ jambudvīpe saptavārāṃ cintāmaṇimānayitvā vividhaṃ ratnavarṣaṃ abhipravarṣayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:315_20: yāvat sarvadvīpeṣvasmin buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu ratnaṃ pravarṣayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:315_21: yāvatpūrvoktaṃ / [KpSū_372] evaṃ ca me āśā paripūrṇā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ mahākalpānāmantareṇa sārthavāho 'bhūvan,
S04bsu018_u:315_22: gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ratnāni pravarṣitāni;
S04bsu018_u:315_24: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ratnaiḥ paripurṇābhiprāyāḥ kṛtāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_1: saṃtoṣaṇe kalpe vartamāne pañcakaṣāye pañcavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ praṇidhānenāhamasmin jambūdvīpe sūryamālagandho nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūvan vedapāṭhakaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_2: tatkālaṃ ca sattvā bhūyasā śāśvatadṛṣṭayo 'bhūvan savairaparākramāḥ sakalahādhiṣṭhānāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_3: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ mahābalavegaparākrameṇa sattvānāṃ śatrubhūtaṃ skandhaprayogena dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu018_u:316_7: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā mamāvavādānuśāsanena pañcābhijñāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_8: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kalahavigrahavairānavasṛjya vanakhaṇḍamāśṛtya vanakhaṇḍe mūlaphalāhārā dhyāyantaścaturbhirbrāhmairvihārai rātridivasamatināmitavantaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_9: tataḥ kṣīyamāṇe kalpe yadā tairdakṣiṇīyaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:316_11: akālavātavarṣāḥ praśamitāḥ, praṇītā ojavatīpṛthivīsaṃniśritāḥ śaṣpā babhūvuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_13: tadāhamevaṃ cintayāmi, “yadyahaṃ sattvānāṃ vyādhiṃ na śaktaḥ śamayituṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:316_14: tasya mamaitadabhavad, “yannūnamahaṃ śakraṃ mahābrāhmaṇaṃ lokapālānanye ca devarṣayo vā [KpSū_374] nāgarṣayo vā śakrarṣayo vā manuṣyarṣayaśca sannipātayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:316_16: tadāhamṛddhyā gatvā śakrabrahmāṇalokapāladevarṣīṇāṃ nāgarṣīṇāṃ śakrarṣīṇāṃ manuṣyarṣīṇāṃ ārocayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:316_17: ekaviḍapatirnāma parvataḥ, tatra saṃnipātayitvā viḍacarakamūrdhani nāma sthānaṃ bhūtasaṃnivāraṇapratiśaraṇaṃ rakṣāvātapittaśleṣmasaṃprasādanaśāstraṃ nirdeśayeyaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:316_19: tatra mahāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā mayaikadivase 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ prajñāvabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:316_20: triṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitā, apāyapathāḥ pithitāḥ, svargapathapratiṣṭhāpitā, vividhāśca vyādhayaḥ praśamitāḥ parimocittāśca /
S04bsu018_u:316_22: saukhye 'vasthāpitāḥ / tadanena kulaputra [KpSū_375] kuśalamūlavipākena iyaṃ me praṇidhānāśā paripūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_25_1: devaloke prakāśite sattvānāmārogyakauśalyamevameva timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu
S04bsu018_u:316_27: devanāgayakṣamanuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sannipātitā yaissattvānāmarthāya vividhā vidyāsthānāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_28: yathena timire buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:316_32: sattvā vyādhitaḥ parimocitā, anuttarā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpā āśā paripūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:316_33: api tatra timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:316_34: apyanuttareṇa [KpSū_376] jñānena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvaikaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto,
S04bsu018_u:316_37: ayaṃ ca tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ sucaritānāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ
S04bsu018_u:317_0: tathā pratyavarakālasamaye 'saṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairadhikatarairantareṇedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vicitadoṣaṃ nāmābhūt,
S04bsu018_u:317_2: purimāyāṃ diśyanupañcāśāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ vaḍaṃ nāma jambūdvīpamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:317_4: caturdvīpeśvaraḥ cakravartī rājā ambaro nāma babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:317_5: tatra ca mayā sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:317_7: tatra ca me yācanakā āgatvā vividhāni ratnāni yācanti,
S04bsu018_u:317_8: tadyathā hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ [KpSū_377] yāvaccendranīlamahānīlajyotīrasadakaprasādakāni yācanakānāṃ tāvatprabhūtāni ratnāni labhyante /
S04bsu018_u:317_12: na kevalaṃ tāttakā nirdeśayanti yāttakā devasya yācanakāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:317_13: tadāhaṃ praṇidhānamakarot / “yadyahaṃ pañcakaṣāye loke vartamāne tīvrakleśāraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:317_14: tadiyaṃ me āśā paripūryatu, yadahamasmin buddhakṣetre nidhidarśako nāma nāgarājā bhaveyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:317_15: sarvatra cāsmiṃ vijitaghoṣe buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu ca ekaikasmin dvīpe saptajanmāni parigṛhṇīyāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:317_16: ekaikasmiṃśca janmani nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi darśayeyaṃ prayaccheyaṃ ca nānāratnaparipūrṇāni:
S04bsu018_u:317_18: ekaikaśca nidhiyojanasahasrāṇi gatvā vistareṇa paripūrṇamapi ratnaṃ sattvānāṃ nidarśayeyaṃ prayacchayeyaṃ [KpSū_378] ca,
S04bsu018_u:317_20: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasmin kṣetre sarvatra dvīpe saptajanmāni pratigṛhṇīyāṃ”,
S04bsu018_u:318_0: yadā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaganatale devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairantarīkṣāt puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā sādhukāraścānupradattaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:318_1: “sādhu sādhu sarvaṃdada, ṛdhiṣyati te evaṃrūpā āśā yathā te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:318_2: aśroṣīn mahājanakāyaḥ rājño 'mbarasya devairgaganatalagataiḥ sarvaṃdada iti nāma kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:318_3: śrutvā caiṣametadabhavat / “yannūnaṃ vayaṃ duṣkaraparityāgaṃ dānaṃ yācemaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:318_4: yadi parityakṣyati tadā sarvaṃdada iti nāma bhaviṣyati” /
S04bsu018_u:318_11: [KpSū_379] atha na dāsyati na sarvaṃdado bhaviṣyati” /
S04bsu018_u:319_0: tatastasyāgrataḥ tatra jyotīraso nāma māṇavako rājño 'mbarasyāgrataḥ sthitvā,
S04bsu018_u:319_2: śrutvā ca rājñāmbareṇa paramaprītimanasā svayameva brāhmaṇaṃ snāpayitvā paṭṭaṃ badhvā rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayitvā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ niryātayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:319_4: yadīyaṃ me āśā paripūryati, yo 'yaṃ mamaitarhi sarvajambūdvīpe rājā pratiṣṭhāpito vartatvasya jambūdvīpe ājñā,
S04bsu018_u:319_5: dīrghāyuṣca bhavatu, rājā cakravartī cirasthāyī / yadā cāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:319_7: roco nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau pādau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:319_8: tasya mayā svayameva prasannacittena tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svapādau chitvā pradattau,
S04bsu018_u:319_10: [KpSū_380] tatra drāṣṭāvo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhe netre yācite,
S04bsu018_u:319_11: tasya ca mayā ubhe netre utpādya datte,
S04bsu018_u:319_12: peyālaṃ, anuttaraṃ pañcacakṣuḥ pratilabhāya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu018_u:319_13: na cireṇa saracchighoṣo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau karṇau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:319_14: svayameva tasya mayā karṇau chitvā dattau,
S04bsu018_u:319_21: svayameva ca mayā dattaṃ, suvarṇavarṇatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya ca me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:319_22: aparaśca kṣīraso nāma parivrājakastena ca me ubhau hastau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:319_23: svayameva ca mayā dakṣiṇena hastena vāmaṃ hastaṃ chitvā dakṣiṇaṃ chedāpayitvā datto,
S04bsu018_u:319_25: yadā cāṅgapratyaṅgāni chinnāni tadā ca mayā rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:320_3: te māṃ gṛhītvā bahirnagaraśmaśānabhūmau choritvā prakāntāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:320_10: na ca me roṣa utpāditastena me āśā paripūryatu,
S04bsu018_u:320_12: ye kecit sattvā mānsāhārā rudhirapānāste māṃsaṃ bhakṣayantu rudhiraṃ pibeyantu /
S04bsu018_u:320_13: yāvacca [KpSū_382] me sattvā māṃsaṃ bhakṣayeyū rudhiraṃ ca pibeyustāvan me praṇidhānavaśena śarīraṃ vardhatu,
S04bsu018_u:320_14: anupūrveṇa yāvadyojanaśatasahasramuccatvena kāyaḥ saṃvardhatu pañcayojanasahasraṃ vistāreṇa /
S04bsu018_u:320_15: tatra mayā varṣasahasraṃ svamānsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā;
S04bsu018_u:320_16_0: yāvabhyaśca mayā jihvāḥ parityaktā yā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ paribhaktāḥ praṇidhānavaśena
S04bsu018_u:320_16_1: cānyonyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ teṣāṃ ayaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇo rāśiḥ syānnityaṃ cānuttarāprabhūtājihvatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya
S04bsu018_u:321_0: tatrāhaṃ cyutvā rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe pūrvapraṇidhānena nāgeṣūpapanno nidhisaṃdarśano nāma nāgarājā babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:321_1: yāmeva rātriṃ nāgeṣūpapannastāmeva rātriṃ nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nidhānānāṃ saṃdarśitāni svayameva ghoṣaṃ cārayāmi /
S04bsu018_u:321_4: yūyaṃ gṛhṇadhvaṃ / gṛhītvā bhoḥ sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartadhvaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:321_8: tatra ca rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe saptanāgajanmaparivartena saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayo nirdarśitāśca pradattāśca /
S04bsu018_u:321_13: evaṃ dvitīye dvīpe saptabhirnāgajanmaparivartairevaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu018_u:321_14: evaṃ tritīye yāvatsarvatra vijitadoṣāyāṃ lokadhātau sarveṣu dvīpeṣu evaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:321_15: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamesu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu,
S04bsu018_u:321_16: ekaikasmin dvīpe evaṃrūpāḥ saptanāgajanmaparivarteṣu mayā yāvat saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayaḥ sattvānāṃ pradattā,
S04bsu018_u:321_17: yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ / paśya kulaputra tathāgatasya bodhicārikāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:321_19: yathātra pūrve na [KpSū_384] ye bodhisattvā evaṃrūpāṃ tīvrabalavīryeṇa bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇavantaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:321_20: na kaścidetarhi, na ca punaḥ kaścit paścādbhaviṣyati bodhisattvo ya evaṃ tīvreṇodyogabalavegenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caret,
S04bsu018_u:322_0: tadā cāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena pratyavarakālasamayenedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pravāḍodupānirnāma babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:322_1: śūnye pañcakaṣāye utpale mahākalpe vartamāne 'syāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmahaṃ śakro 'bhūvan savirocano nāma /
S04bsu018_u:322_3: dṛṣṭvā cāhaṃ paramabhīṣaṇakaṃ yakṣarūpamātmānamabhinirmāyāsmiṃ jambūdvīpe 'vatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ purataḥ pratyasthāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:322_4: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā māṃ pṛcchanti /
S04bsu018_u:322_5: “kena te prayojanaṃ?, vayaṃ te taddāsyāmaḥ” / mayoktaṃ / “āhāreṇa me prayojanaṃ” ta āhuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:322_7: tāṃścāhaṃ na khādayāmi ye manuṣyā yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātādviratā,
S04bsu018_u:322_9: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti pratyekabuddhayānena vā śrāvakayānena [KpSū_385] vā cittānyutpādayanti tānapyahaṃ na khādayāmi” /
S04bsu018_u:322_10: tatra ca me sattvā nirmitakāḥ paribhūktāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā te sattvā bhayena yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātātprativiratā adattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:322_13: sarve cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu triṣu ca yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:322_16: yathā ca me cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvāḥ kuśale mārge niyojitā /
S04bsu018_u:322_17: evameva sarvatrāsmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu sattvāḥ evaṃrūpeṇa bhayena māṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:322_20: evameva samantāddaśasu dikṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:322_22: evameva me kulaputra āśā praṇidhiśca paripūrṇaḥ sarvatra pravāḍodupānāyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā yakṣarūpeṇa vinītāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
S04bsu018_u:322_23: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_386] śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yakṣarūpeṇa mayā manuṣyāḥ kuśalamārgacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:322_24: yathā ca mayā bahavaḥ sattvā bhayāt kuśalacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:322_25: tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa mamaitarhi bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇasya bodhimabhisaṃbodhukāmasya māraḥ pāpīyāṃ mahāsainyenopasaṃkrānto bodhau vyākṣepakaraṇārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:322_27: bodhicaryāṃ caramāṇasya labdhā cāhaṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ kṣāntiṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dhāraṇīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ samādhiṃ pañcalaukikābhijñāḥ pratilabdhāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:322_29: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:322_32: pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ / sthāpayitvā yāvanto mayā bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caramāṇena,
S04bsu018_u:322_34: ekaikasya buddhasyāntike sāgarodakabindupramāṇā mayā guṇāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:322_38: mayā ca kṛpayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena svamāṃsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā,
S04bsu018_u:323_0: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dānaparivarto nāma pañcamaḥ // 5 //
S04bsu018_u:324_1: VI (EPILOGUE) yathāhaṃ kulaputra buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtān,
S04bsu018_u:324_2: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:324_3: ye mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:324_4: evamevaitarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāste buddhā bhagavantaḥ pravartitadhārmikadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanto yāpayanto dharmaṃ deśayanto 'drakṣaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:324_5: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:325_0_1: [KpSū_389] saṃpuṣpite lokadhātau vimalatejaguṇarājo nāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate
S04bsu018_u:325_1: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:325_3: peyālaṃ / purimāyāṃ diśi abhiratye buddhakṣetre akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato,
S04bsu018_u:325_18: etāṃ pūrvaṃgamāṃ kṛtvā kulaputra purimāyāṃ diśyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ deśayato buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:325_19: ye 'nutpāditabodhicittāḥ pūrve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā mayā ca prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā,
S04bsu018_u:325_20: mayā ca prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanītā yatra taiḥ sarvaprathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:326_0: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ saṃpuṣpitāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:326_1: ye tatra bodhisattvāste tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya [KpSū_391] tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tameva tathāgataṃ pṛṣṭavantaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:326_2: “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadi idamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ bhagavata āsanaṃ prakaṃpitam[?”]iti /
S04bsu018_u:326_3_0: sa tathāgatastānavocat - “asti kulaputrāḥ paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrādekonanavatibuddhakṣetrānatikramya
S04bsu018_u:326_3_1: tatra sahā nāma lokadhātustatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S04bsu018_u:326_4: sa etarhi caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:326_5: tena tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādapitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:326_7: tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:326_8: tena tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caratāhaṃ prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto,
S04bsu018_u:326_9: yatra me prathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:326_10: sa ca me śākyamunistathāgataḥ kalyāṇamitraḥ sahe lokadhātau tiṣṭhati yāpayati,
S04bsu018_u:326_11: sa evaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ imaṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:326_13: ko yuṣmākaṃ kulaputrotsahate [KpSū_392] madvacanāt sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gantuṃ śākyamunestathāgatasyārogyakauśalyaṃ paripṛcchanāya?” /
S04bsu018_u:326_15_0: “]ya iha bhadanta bhagavan saṃpuṣpite buddhakṣetre ṛddhimantaḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇapāramitāprāptāste
S04bsu018_u:326_16_0: te ca bodhisattvā āhuḥ / “vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan gamiṣyāmastaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
S04bsu018_u:326_16_1: taṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāya paryupasanāya taṃ ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ
S04bsu018_u:327_2: te 'pyāhuḥ / “tāmapi vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan diśaṃ na jānīmo yatra sahā lokadhātuḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:327_3: tataḥ sa vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārya pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo vividhānyarciṃṣi pramumoca /
S04bsu018_u:327_6: yataste bodhisattvāḥ paśyanti sarvāvadimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvairgaganatale ca devanāgayakṣāsuraiḥ sphuṭaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:327_7: dṛṣṭvā ca punaste bodhisattvāstaṃ vimalaguṇatejarājānaṃ tathāgatamevamāhuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:327_8: “paśyāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvāvantaṃ sphuṭaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:327_9: nāsti tatrāvakāśo 'ntaśo daṇḍanikṣepaṇamātramapi yanna sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:327_10: paśyāmaḥ śākyamunistathāgato 'smān nirīkṣate dharmaṃ ca deśayati” /
S04bsu018_u:327_11: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgatasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmevamāha - “samantacakṣuḥ kulaputrāḥ śākyamunistathāgato /
S04bsu018_u:327_12: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau sattvā bhūmisthitā vā antarīkṣasthitā vā tataścaikaikaḥ sattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
S04bsu018_u:327_13: “maṃ śākyamunistathāgataḥ sarvacetasā nirīkṣate mamaikamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati” /
S04bsu018_u:327_14: sarvavarṇaṃśca sa kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati ekavarṇasthānaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:327_15: [KpSū_394] ye ca tatra kulaputra sattvā brāhmabhaktāste śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ brahmāṇaṃ samanupaśyanti,
S04bsu018_u:327_17_0: yāvad ye mārabhaktikā, ye sūryabhaktikā, ye candrabhaktikā, ye vaiśravaṇabhaktikā,
S04bsu018_u:327_17_1: ye virūḍhakabhaktikā, ye virūpākṣabhaktikā, ye dhṛtarāṣṭrabhaktikā, ye maheśvarabhaktikāste
S04bsu018_u:327_18: yāvaccaturaśītistatra sattvānāṃ varṇasaṃsthānabhaktirūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi te tathā caiva śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti” /
S04bsu018_u:328_0: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi rahagarjito nāma bodhisattvo dvitīyaśca jyotiraśmirnāma bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:328_2: “gacchatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ madvacanādārogyakauśalyaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatha” /
S04bsu018_u:328_3: te bodhisattvā āhuḥ / “sarvāvantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sakṣitigaganaṃ [KpSū_395] bodhisattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:328_4: na cātraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo 'sti kṣitau gagane vā yatra vayaṃ pratitiṣṭhemaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:328_5: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgata āha - “mā kulaputrā evaṃ vadatha,
S04bsu018_u:329_0: ekasmiṃ samaye kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato 'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā madhye śailaparvate indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati,
S04bsu018_u:329_3: sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā tathāgatakāyena sphuṭā,
S04bsu018_u:329_5_0: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhir diśābhirdvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sahe
S04bsu018_u:329_5_1: lokadhātau yastasya parvatasyābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya
S04bsu018_u:329_6: sa ca kulaputra śākyamunistathāgatastatra parśadi ridhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān;
S04bsu018_u:329_7: sā ca sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā caivaṃ vipulā ca prādurbhūtā,
S04bsu018_u:329_8: yadā te dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sālaguhāyāṃ praviṣṭā vistīrṇāvakāśaṃ paśyanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:329_9: ekaikaśca bodhisattvastatra tathāgatasya vividhabodhisattvavikurvaṇena pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S04bsu018_u:329_10: ekaiko bodhisattvastatra saptaratnamayāsanaṃ nirmitavān yatropaviṣṭā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:329_12_0: te ca bodhisattvāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā śākyamunestathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:329_12_1: pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:329_13: aciraprakāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sālaguhā yathā paurvāṇāṃ saṃsthitā /
S04bsu018_u:330_2: sa caturaśītibhistrayastriṃśaddevasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sālaguhā yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati /
S04bsu018_u:330_6: sa ca pañcaśikho madhureṇa svareṇa bhagavantamabhimukhaṃ staviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:330_9: atha pañcaśikho vīṇāṃ manojñena gītavāditena bhagavato 'nubhāvena pañcabhiḥ stavaśatairbhagavato varṇamabhāṣata /
S04bsu018_u:330_10_0: yadā ca kulaputra pañcaśikha ārabdho bhagavato 'bhistavanāya tataḥ sa śākyamunirbhagavān
S04bsu018_u:330_10_1: sughoṣavairocanaketuṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannastena samādhinā ye sahe lokadhātau maharddhikayakṣarākṣasā
S04bsu018_u:330_10_2: vāsurā vā garuḍā vā kinnarā vā mahoragā vā gandharvā vā sarve kāmāvacarā devā sarve
S04bsu018_u:330_10_3: rūpāvacarā devaputrāstatra sannipātā babhūvurye ca svarabhaktikāste svaraṃ śrutvā
S04bsu018_u:330_11: ye varṇayaśobhaktikāste bhagavato varṇaṃ [KpSū_398] śrutvā tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśe tīvrapremaprasādagurugauravacitrīkārajātāḥ prasīdanti,
S04bsu018_u:330_13: tataḥ śākyamunirbhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya sālaguhāyā dvāraṃ darśāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:330_15: “bhagavaṃ kutropaviśāmaḥ?” / sa śākyamunistathāgata uvāca - “niṣīdadhvaṃ yakṣā yāvattasthuḥ samāgatāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:330_16: tataḥ sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā saṃsthitā yathā dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamā yakṣāstatra guhāyāṃ praviṣṭā,
S04bsu018_u:330_17: niṣaṇṇāyāśca tasyāḥ parṣadaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgatastathārūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:330_18: yathā ye tasmin parṣadi śrāvakayānikā niṣaṇṇāste śrāvakayānakathāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu018_u:330_20: ye ca tatra parṣadi anuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhayānikāste śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ śṛṇvanti;
S04bsu018_u:330_21: tatra ca pañcaśikhagandharvapūrvaṃgamā aṣṭādaśanayutā avaivartikāḥ saṃsthitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
S04bsu018_u:330_26: sa ca tatra kauśikaḥ śakro bhayātparimukto,
S04bsu018_u:331_1: na śakyaṃ kenacittasya tathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalasya paryantamudgṛhītuṃ vā gaṇāyituṃ vā /
S04bsu018_u:331_7_0: yāvantaśca sattvā etarhi tatra sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitā yadi te sattvāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:331_7_1: kukṣau praviśeyuste sarve tatra vicareyuste ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasyaikaromamukhe
S04bsu018_u:331_8: te ekaromamukhāttasya tathāgatasya na śaktāḥ paryantamudgṛhītuṃ ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vāntaśo [KpSū_400] divyenāpi cakṣuṣā /
S04bsu018_u:332_1_0: yāvantaśca daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikasamā buddhakṣetrā evaṃ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ
S04bsu018_u:332_1_1: sattvaistadyathāpi nāmaitarhi sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarve te sattvā etarhi sahe buddhakṣetre
S04bsu018_u:332_2: tatkasmāddhetos[? / ] tathaiva tasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:332_4_0: sacetkulaputra yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sahasraṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrā evaṃ vistīrṇāḥ
S04bsu018_u:332_4_1: tadyathaitarhi sahabuddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇaṃ sattvaiḥ te sarve etarhi sahe lokadhātau
S04bsu018_u:332_4_2: praviśeyuste sarve tatra vicareyurevaṃrūpaṃ tasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpāditānuttarajñānapratilābhāya
S04bsu018_u:332_6: ebhiścaturdharmairviśiṣṭataraḥ sa śākyamunistathāgato yathāvadgṛhṇīta [KpSū_401] yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ candrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:332_7: gacchatha paścimāṃ diśaṃ yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ,
S04bsu018_u:332_8: mama vacanena taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ ārogyakauśalyaṃ pṛcchata” /
S04bsu018_u:333_0_0: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgataścandrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā raharājasya bodhisattvasya
S04bsu018_u:333_2: “]vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan gacchemaḥ tathāgatānubhāvena sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ tasya śākyamunestathāgatasya darśanāye vandanāya paryupāsanāya” /
S04bsu018_u:333_4_0: tau ca dvau bodhisattvau raharājaśca jyotiraśmiśca sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya
S04bsu018_u:333_4_1: vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasya riddhibalena tataḥ saṃpuṣpitāyā lokadhātoḥ saṃprasthitā
S04bsu018_u:333_4_2: ekacittakṣaṇenedaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptā gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthātaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:333_6: “asti bhagavan [KpSū_402] purastime digbhāge ekonanavatibuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyatikramya tatra saṃpuṣpito nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:333_8: sa ca punastathāgato bodhisattvagaṇaparivārastathāgatasya guṇavarṇakīrtayamāna evamāha - “śākyamunirnāma tathāgataḥ sahe buddhakṣetre tiṣṭhati yāpayati /
S04bsu018_u:333_9_0: tena ca tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇenāhaṃ sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:333_9_1: samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitastasya ca vacanena mayānuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:333_9_2: samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niveśito,
S04bsu018_u:333_11: yathā teneme candrarocavimalā puṣpāḥ preṣitā ārogyakauśalyaṃ ca pṛcchati” /
S04bsu018_u:334_1: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipattitaste cāpi dṛṣṭvākṣobhyasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ paripṛcchanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:334_2: peyālaṃ yathā pūrvoktaṃ / [KpSū_403] sarveṣāṃ evaṃ vaktavyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:334_3_0: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ purimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatadūtā bodhisattvā imaṃ sahaṃ
S04bsu018_u:334_3_1: buddhakṣetraṃ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya paripṛcchanāya
S04bsu018_u:335_0: samanantaraparivāsito bhagavataḥ purimāyāṃ diśi buddhakṣetranāma parikīrtanaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:335_2_1: tatra sarvaśokāpagato nāma lokadhātustatrāśokaśrīrnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyati
S04bsu018_u:335_3: mayā sa bhagavān sarvaprathamaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito,
S04bsu018_u:335_4: yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ / jaṃbūprabhe buddhakṣetre dharmeśvaravinardirnāma tathāgataḥ,
S04bsu018_u:335_18: peyālaṃ yathā pūrvoktaṃ / evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyāsanāni kaṃpanti /
S04bsu018_u:335_19: sarve te buddhā bhagantaḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya varṇaṃ yaśaḥ kīrtimudīrayanti /
S04bsu018_u:335_20_0: yāvattena samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi tathāgatadūtā bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ
S04bsu018_u:335_20_1: puṣpairimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya pṛcchanāya yāvaddharmaśravaṇāya” /
S04bsu018_u:336_0_0: punaśca bhagavān āha - “paśyāmyahaṃ kulaputra paścimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāt saptānavatibuddhakṣetranayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya
S04bsu018_u:336_0_1: tatropaśāntamatirnāma buddhakṣetrastatra ratnagirirnāma tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyati
S04bsu018_u:336_1: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito,
S04bsu018_u:336_5: haritālakīrtiḥ, samantagarbhaḥ, brahmakusumaḥ, karadharavikramaḥ, dharmaveśapradīpaḥ, asamantaramerusvaravighuṣṭarājaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:336_6: brahmendraghoṣaḥ, yathā pūrvoktaṃ / evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ paścimāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yeṣāṃ śākyamuninā tathāgatena nāmāni parikīrtitāni teṣāmāsanāni kaṃpanti /
S04bsu018_u:336_7: yāvattena samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhadūtā bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpairimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptā yāvanniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu018_u:337_2: mayā sa tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito,
S04bsu018_u:337_3: yāvatṣaṭsu pāramitāsu; yāvanmayā sarvaprathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto,
S04bsu018_u:337_6: yāvaccaturaśītisattvānāṃ varṇabhaktisaṃsthānarūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi tathā śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti /
S04bsu018_u:338_1: ekaḥ vigopaśikharo nāma dvitīyaḥ saṃrocanabuddho nāma;
S04bsu018_u:338_2: sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājo nāma tathāgatastau dvau bodhisattvavāmantrayitvaivamāha - “gacchata yūyaṃ kulaputrau sahe buddhakṣetre,
S04bsu018_u:338_4: tāvāhatuḥ / “sarvāvantaṃ bhadanta bhagavannāvāṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sakṣitigaganaṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:338_5: na ca tatraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo 'sti kṣitau vā gagane vā yatrāvāṃ pratiṣṭhevahi” /
S04bsu018_u:338_6: sa ca tathāgata āha - “mā kulaputraivaṃ vadata,
S04bsu018_u:339_0: ekasmin samaye kulaputra sa śākyamunistathāgato 'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā viṣamaśailendraparvatamadhye indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati sma,
S04bsu018_u:339_2: vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedī / sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā [KpSū_409] sphuṭā tathāgatakāyena,
S04bsu018_u:339_4: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhyo digbhyaḥ dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sahe lokadhātau saṃprāptāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya /
S04bsu018_u:340_0: gṛhṇīdhvaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ candrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:340_2: yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ;
S04bsu018_u:340_4: sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājastathāgataḥ candrarocavimalān puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā vigopaśikharasya bodhisattvasya dadāti saṃrocanabuddhasya ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S04bsu018_u:340_5: evaṃ cāha - “gacchata kulaputrau mamarddhibalādhānena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:340_7: [KpSū_410] “vayamapi bhagavan gamiṣyāmastathāgatasyānubhāvena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya” /
S04bsu018_u:340_9: tatastau dvau bodhisattvau sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya tathāgatasya riddhyanubhāvena tato virajādbuddhakṣetrātsaṃprasthitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:340_13: yathā pūrvoktaṃ / tena tathāgateneme candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ preṣitā,
S04bsu018_u:340_16: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipatitāste cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanaṃ tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchanti,
S04bsu018_u:340_17: yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ / evaṃ sālendrarājā vikramaraśmiḥ padmottaraḥ [KpSū_411] candano merurājaḥ sāgaraḥ sārajyotirjñānavikramastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu018_u:340_18_0: yāvattena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā uttarapurimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatāste bodhisattvāḥ
S04bsu018_u:341_0: tāvadeva śākyamunistathāgata ṛddhyanubhāvena sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ye sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitāsteṣāṃ ekaikasya sattvasya yojanapramāṇamātramātmabhāvaḥ saṃsthitaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:341_1: sarvāvantaṃ ca sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ evaṃrūpaiḥ sattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:341_2: na kaścidbuddhakṣetre kṣitau vā gagane vāvakāśo yaḥ sattvairasphuṭo 'ntaśo 'ñjanaśalākāpradeśamātramapi yaḥ sattvebhyo na sphuṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu018_u:341_3: sarve ca te sattvāḥ śūnyamākāśaṃ paśyanti,
S04bsu018_u:341_4: na ca parasparaṃ paśyanti; na caiṣāṃ parvatasumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍaparvatāścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti,
S04bsu018_u:341_5: na lokāntarikā [KpSū_412] divyā vimānā ūrddhaṃ yāvadadho kāñcanacakraṃ tatorddhaṃ pṛthivī cakṣuṣo nābhāsamāgacchanti,
S04bsu018_u:341_7: te tathāgataṃ paśyanti / tatra ca bhagavān ākāśasphuraṇaṃ dharmāvacchedapraśrabdhisamādhiṃ samāpanno /
S04bsu018_u:341_8: yataste candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ sarvaromamukhesu bhagavataḥ praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:341_9: sarve ca te sattvāḥ paśyanti sahe lokadhātāvantargatā vigatāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaitasikeṣu manasikārarūpasaṃdarśanatāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:341_10: te caiva bhagavato romamukhe nirīkṣante sma /
S04bsu018_u:341_11: tatra codyānamadrākṣuḥ, nānāratnavṛkṣaṃ nānāpatraṃ nānāpuṣpaṃ nānāphalākīrṇāṃ nānāvastraṃ nānācchatradhvajapatākākeyūramuktikāhārālaṅkṛtāṃstāṃ vṛkṣāṃ paśyanti,
S04bsu018_u:341_15: sarve ca te sattvā ye [KpSū_413] sahe lokadhātāvantargatāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:341_17: sarve pariśiṣṭāḥ sattvāstasya tathāgatasya romamukhebhyastathāgataśarīre praviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:341_21: maitreyo bodhisattva āha - “saṃprajānaṃ tataḥ sattvāḥ samanvāharata sarve vayaṃ tathāgatasya kukṣau sannipatitāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:341_22: tataste sattvāḥ sāntarabāhiraṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ pratyakṣībhūtā “yathā vayaṃ tathāgatasya kukṣāvantargatāḥ sannipatitāśca”,
S04bsu018_u:341_24_0: kenāsmin praveśitāḥ?” / tato maitreyaḥ sarvāvatī parṣadaṃ svareṇa vijñapayannuvāca
S04bsu018_u:341_24_2: śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati tadyuṣmābhiḥ sarvacetasā samanvāhartavyāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:342_16: imasya khalu punardharmaparyāyasya bhāṣyamāṇasyāśītikoṭīgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāḥ sattvāstathāgatasya kukṣigatā avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
S04bsu018_u:342_17: gaṇanātikrāntāśca tatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye nānāvidhadhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā abhūn /
S04bsu018_u:342_20: daśadiśaḥ prakāntāḥ, svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatāstathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalakāyapramāṇajñapanārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:343_0: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ purimāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:343_1: purimāyāṃ diśi yadbuddhakṣetrānatikrāmanti na ca śākyamunestathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalaṃ pratihanyate,
S04bsu018_u:343_2: evaṃ ca tatra svaraṃ śṛṇvanti vicitrapadārthavyañjanāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:343_5: [KpSū_416] api ca tatrāpi śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā na prajñāyate,
S04bsu018_u:343_6_0: śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyaḥ sphuṭo dṛśyate bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiścāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā
S04bsu018_u:343_7: evaṃ dvitīye romamukhe, yāvatsarvaromamukhebhyaḥ praviśanto niṣkrāmantaśca saṃdṛśyante,
S04bsu018_u:344_0_0: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā yāvadbhagavataḥ kāyāntargatāḥ sā bhagavataḥ kāyaromamukhebhyo
S04bsu018_u:344_0_1: niṣkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇī kṛtvā bhagavato
S04bsu018_u:344_1: atha tāvaccaiva kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā vicitrāṃ ca gandhamālyavilepanavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣitā,
S04bsu018_u:345_0: tatra vaiśāradyasamuddhāraṇirnāma bodhisattvo yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - [KpSū_417] “kiṃ nāmāyaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahāvyākaraṇaṃ sūtrāntaḥ?” /
S04bsu018_u:345_2: bahubuddhakaṃ nāma, bahusannipātaṃ nāma, bodhisattvavyākaraṇaṃ nāma, vaiśāradyamārgottāraṇaṃ nāma,
S04bsu018_u:346_0: punarapyāha - “kiyantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:346_1: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi?” /
S04bsu018_u:346_4: yaḥ kaścidimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi,
S04bsu018_u:346_5: yaśca punaḥ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāmantaśo likhitvā dhārayiṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:346_7: na tvevaṃ ṣoḍaśamahākalpān ṣaṭpāramitācaramāṇasya bodhisattvasya puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:346_9: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sayakṣanāgagandharvakumbhāṇḍapretapiśācakinnarāsurāṇāṃ duṣṭacittānāṃ prasādanaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:347_1: ko mamemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ rakṣiṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:347_2: adharmabhūmiṣṭhānāṃ sattvānāṃ bhinnaśīlānāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ [KpSū_419] karṇapuṭe prakāśayiṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:347_4: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya;
S04bsu018_u:347_6: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ merupuṇyaṃ yakṣariṣiṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītavān /
S04bsu018_u:347_7: bhagavān āha - “udgṛhṇa tvaṃ maharṣa imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:347_8: yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ deśāntaragatānāmavaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ karṇapuṭeṣu prakāśasva /
S04bsu018_u:347_9_1: atikrāmantā yanmayā bhadanta bhagavan pūrvaṃ praṇidhānena yakṣariṣitvālabdhyānuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:347_9_2: samyaksaṃbodhau bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇo gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvā mayā caturṣu brāhmavihāreṣu
S04bsu018_u:347_11: [KpSū_420] ahaṃ ca sattvānāṃ svayameva paripācayāmi yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ udgṛhīṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:348_0: idamavocadbhagavān āttamanāḥ sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
S04bsu018_u:351_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣāṃ tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu018_u:351_1: hevadatteṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādi mahāśramaṇaṃ //
